title: Trip.com: Flights, Hotels, Train & Travel Deals
description:
Trip.com is your one-stop travel app! Book with us for great deals on:

■ Flights: International and domestic flights at great rates with no booking fees.
■ Hotels: Choose from over 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world.
■ Trains: Book tickets for the UK, Germany, Mainland China, Taiwan and Korea.
■ Tickets & Tours: Book attraction tickets in seconds, or take a private tour instead.
■ Rental Cars: Reserve your rental car online. Select from hundreds of makes and models.
■ Airport Transfers: Get picked up straight from the airport, no need to wait for a taxi.
■ Travel Guide: Not sure where you want to go yet? No problem – we can help!

The Trip.com app makes it easy to book hotels, flights, and trains at great prices. Quickly find the latest deals, check out exclusive member offers, and enjoy zero booking fees on flights and hotels. Join the thousands who already use Trip.com and save on your next trip! 

**Detailed Features List**

Find cheap hotels in minutes
- Select from more than 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world — you name it, we’ve got it!
- Still unsure about your plans? Cancel or modify your booking directly in the app.
- Sort by what's important to you: hotel prices, deals, ratings and more.
- Advanced filters help you find accommodation in your price range, in the ideal location, and with the facilities you want (like free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool).
- Over 30 million verified hotel reviews help you make your decision.
- Access your booking information offline for extra convenience.

Book the perfect flight
- Book cheap flights to over 5,000 cities around the world.
- Our advanced flight search engine allows you to find the ideal flight filtering by price, duration, departure or arrival time, or airline and stops.
- Cancel or modify your bookings easily right in the app.
- Need to fly into one city, but then fly out of another? Our multi-city search function can piece together your perfect flight.
- Have a fixed budget, but not sure where to go? Check out our Explore the World feature for the some great suggestions.

Search train tickets
- Easily book train tickets for Mainland China, Taiwan, the UK, Korea, and Germany all in one app!
- We connect directly with local train information centers, so you’ll see the most up-to-date information and prices.

Tickets and tours
- Whether you’re looking for Disneyland tickets, a skip-the-line pass to the Louvre, or an air ballooning experience, you’ll find it on the Trip.com app.
- Book a multi-day tour to see the sights of China, or a day trip for your Dubai stopover.

Reserve a Rental car
- Rent a car in thousands of destinations across the globe for a bargain price.
- Free cancellation is available on most bookings.

Arrange Airport transfer
- Never wait in a taxi queue again. Arrange for a professional driver to pick you up from the airport for an easy experience.
- Cancel up to 24 hours before pickup free of charge.

Manage your trips in app
- Track your flight status on the go.
- Add your itinerary to your calendar or save it as a photo for a smooth vacation.
- Get notifications on booking changes and much more!

We speak your language
- The app is available in 19 different languages, with payment available in 22 currencies.
- 24/7 English customer service is always at hand to help. Call, email, or chat to us directly in the app.

Need a luxury hotel in New York, or a last minute hostel in Prague? Maybe a budget flight with Air Asia or the luxury of first class on Emirates? Taking the train from London to Edinburgh? Or maybe heading down to Busan from Seoul? Wherever your journey takes you, Trip.com is the only travel app you’ll need!

developerAddress: Unit 3003, 30/F, Paul Y. Centre, 51 Hung To Road, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Trip.com!
We’re always improving and fixing bugs, update now to see our latest and greatest features for the perfect trip.
comments: More than the app the problem is their costumer service. 5 mails sent, 5 times they replied without spending one second to understand my needs, and without solving my problem. In other words, if you book with them, forget the chance to indicate your frequent flyer number, as in my case, and for 4 different flights, it was not possible. Never again.

The APP is not real time and definitely useless . I purchased ticket on february for a march 25 flt. I supposed to be asking for rebooking or refund because of flt cancellations due to covid, however my flt is not even listed in the app. My hard earned money will be wasted! I also emailed several times but an automatic reply has been sent with a useless message. Not useful at all!

This app is soo hard to cancel and the design is confusing. And because of the design, I was able to purchase additional baggage to my return flight instead of from origin flight. I tried to cancel it right away, just 2 minutes but there was no support, no customer support at all. And they still purchase it without minding the customers side. It would be better to purchase your flight right away to flight companies than making use of their useless service. Their service is only for making money

SCAM! Very deceptive and trashy app. It will change the price right as you're getting ready to pay. I checked actual airline site as well as others (couldnt use them because of my foreign credit card) mulptle times and the price hadnt change. The only amount that changed was the fees which began at 10 dollars and jumped up to 30. Pathetic they would stoop so low. That kind of trash should be criminal. Especially during a crisis!
I booked my ticket in this app but i cannot find my booking number in the airline official website. Now i cannot requesta refund for my cancelled flight. This company is only after your money.

title: TripIt: Travel Planner
description:
AN EASIER TRIP, EVERY TIME

Quickly make sense of all your travel plans and create a single itinerary for every trip with TripIt. Stay one step ahead from planning to landing with the world’s highest rated travel organizing app.

YOU HANDLE THE BOOKING, WE'LL TAKE IT FROM THERE

Unlike other travel apps, TripIt can organize it no matter where you book. As soon as you book a flight, hotel, car or other reservation, simply forward it to plans@tripit.com and we’ll instantly add it to your master itinerary.

ACCESS AND SHARE YOUR PLANS IN AN INSTANT

No more frantically searching through your inbox for important details like when your flight gets in, or your confirmation number. Get to them instantly in TripIt, even when you’re offline. Plus, we make it easy to sync travel plans to your calendar, or share them with anyone you choose.

TRAVEL STATS & CARBON FOOTPRINT

Take a trip down memory lane with Travel Stats! See your distance traveled, trips taken, countries visited and more.

Our Carbon Footprint feature tracks carbon emissions for each of your flights and suggests practical ways to reduce or offset that environmental impact.

TRIPIT PRO 

Manage all your plans for free with TripIt, or for about the price of checking your bags, upgrade to TripIt Pro to get stress-free travel all year long.

When you upgrade, TripIt Pro will do all this for you (and more!):
 
WHILE YOU'RE PLANNING YOUR TRIP

Help you find a better seat
Monitor for flight refunds
Remind you when to check in
 
BEFORE YOU'RE OUT THE DOOR

Tell you when to leave for the airport
Send real-time flight status alerts
Let you know how long the security lines are
 
WHILE YOU'RE ON THE MOVE

Provide interactive airport and terminal maps
Send terminal and gate reminders
Tell you baggage claim info 

TRIPIT PRO FOR SAP CONCUR USERS

If your company uses SAP Concur, you may receive complimentary TripIt Pro benefits that most travelers have to pay for. Make sure you’re connected to TripIt to get itineraries created for you as soon as you book, and receive a complimentary subscription to TripIt Pro, if you’re eligible. 

For more information, see the TripIt User Agreement (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/userAgreement) and Privacy Policy (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/privacyPolicy).

Suite 100
San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges:
• TripIt now shows your flight’s carbon emissions and provides practical ideas for reducing or offsetting its environmental impact.
• We fixed a bug that repeatedly asked for the PIN when viewing your passport and driver license information.
comments: Updated - Needs a lot of work. It should provide boarding passes after they are sent to tripit. It doesn't let you enter your phone number from your phone (laptop works). Not even from desktop mode on phone because it does it "automatically". Except it doesn't. It also won't let you delete a single flight that it has in error. The app is okay at finding flights in email though. It couldn't see one leg of my trip, is there a maximum of 5 flights?

Disappointing. Basic info shows up in one place, which is nice. No integration of frequent flyer or rewards memberships in trip content. Keeps losing email scan capabilities so I have to reset it every time. And now the option to reset it from the app setting has just disappeared. Right now I could type info on a plain document and get the exact same capabilities I am getting from tripit.

Badly let down by the map functionality. Yes, you can plot points on a map but despite Tripit's claims, you cannot view the whole itinerary on a map. Going into map view displays itinerary points within the immediate vicinity of the start point but you can't view anything further afield. The app links into Google maps but normal zoom functionality (+/- buttons, pinch etc) is missing so it is not possible to zoom out. I could only see half my itinerary on the map. Pointless.

App keeps freezing after editing trip and I have to lock my screen and then unlock just to be able to close the app. I wouldn't use it except for the fact it has the simplest and easiest way for the parents of 20 students to see the info on a trip abroad I'm organizing. Pain for me but provides the best way to view for them. I have a Samsung Note 10+. Just as a note, the web version appearance is unsightly and overly complicated. If it had the same kind of view as the app, I'd stick with that.

The itinerary for the flight works decent. Now, the "enter name" for hotel location and car rental for example, it would be nice to have the cursor in the field already rather than having to touch the field. For the names and fields, please have the field auto-capitalize the first letter automatically :) Otherwise, the search feature works well only typing say the "Hotel Name" with street number generally pops up the information quickly. I think the overall UI for each section such as car rental, flights, etc can use more icons and colors. It looks a little bland. Overall functionality compared to other trip planner app seem to work well so giving it 4-stars. Looking forward to more improvements! Thanks :D

title: Roadtrippers - Trip Planner
description:
Roadtrippers is the only map built for travelers. Plan your summer road trip with friends or find an amazing place nearby you never knew existed. You're always 5 minutes away from something awesome!

Discover millions of places, like local diners and quirky roadside attractions, or scenic points, national parks, and hotels. Get inspiration from our pre-made trip guides of some of the most interesting and once-in-a-lifetime routes you need to see at least once.

You can use Roadtrippers for free to find these great places and come up with some big ideas. Start plotting your route with up to 7 waypoints. When you're ready to go beyond 7, you'll need to upgrade to Roadtrippers Plus, which gives you up to 150 waypoints per trip and a ton more including collaborating with friends, exclusive deals, custom map styles, and offline maps.

Any trips you've saved or places you love will sync automatically across devices.

Note: Content currently USA, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand-focused only. Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

summary: The companion app to Roadtrippers.com - the fastest growing trip planning site.
recentChanges:
There are over 18 million acres of state parks in America, and we can help you visit every single one of them… or at least help you find one hidden in your neck of the woods. With the latest update, the map has the most popular places built in, so you'll always be a swipe and zoom away from discovering someplace new. Download to start exploring what's around you today!

Happy travels :)
comments: Meh - Register in but did not buy the full $30 / yr app. The " introductory app only allows for 5 way points. Did not read my home setting correctly, difficult to reroute. Save your money and stay with Google maps until they have the ability to save your personal route. I still find I'm using the Microsoft streets and tips (dated)

Have used this app for a few years. Enjoy it as a useful tool to find activities/attractions. Really like it. Recently found out that if i share a trip with someone, if i am logged into my account when they open the shared link, they have complete access to my profile and my other saved trips. They can modify/delete my personal info. and trips. This does not occur if i am logged out. Major privacy issue.

Seems useful. Unfortunately, everything keeps resetting when I spend any extended period of time on the time or close it. I have to sign in again everytime I open the app. My trips don't save. I cant add another stop to my trips. I regret spending money on this app. Hopefully the technical issues are sorted out.
It came in very handy on our road trip! I would have preferred route options to choose alternate routes, but as for searching nearby and finding anything along the route it was awesome!

We are using Roadtrippers plus while we are planning a 6500 mile road trip. Its really helpful for planning the sequence of stops. Not all of our hotels or stops are default choices but we can enter the address, date of stay, hours open, and any other notes.

title: Culture Trip: For Curious Travelers
description:
Travel may be restricted, but inspiration isn't. Discover exciting places, from comfortable spaces. Stay curious!

The App for Curious Travellers 

“I really enjoy this app. Since downloading this app, I used it for every town I visited: Paris, Amsterdam, Den Hague, Singapore, Brussels and even my hometown. Locals really give the best insights! I would recommend using this.” Play Store review by Bo Heylen, January 24th, 2020

Culture Trip inspires curious travellers like you to go beyond their cultural boundaries and connect with the world around them. We make travel planning easy and fun, covering the world with award-winning travel stories and videos, insider guides to vibrant cities, trusted recommendations for unique things to do, memorable experiences and handpicked places to stay in the coolest neighbourhoods.

FEATURES:
● Your Essential Travel App - Go from inspiration, to planning, to booking all in one place
● Trips with a difference - Book memorable experiences and live the story 
● Book handpicked hotels -  Over 15,000 curated places to stay in the coolest neighbourhoods
● Inspiration On The Go - Use the Near Me feature to find trusted recommendations wherever you are
● Put Your Ideas into Action - Use My Plans to save places you want to visit and create your own travel plans
● Local Tips for Authentic Trips - insider recommendations from local experts in 450+ destinations
● No WiFi? No problem - Access your saved articles and travel guides even when you’re offline
● Share Trip Ideas - Easily share articles, videos and more with friends via social, email or instant message


Check out our reviews and ratings

summary: Explore insider travel guides to the world's most exciting cities and places
recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and background updates.
- We love your feedback! Don’t forget to rate and review us in the app store
comments: This is an awesome app!! I was able to save restaurants, bars, shopping mall, museums, and free thing to do for my trips this year. This is a great app for traveling abroad. Especislly since you can save articles, pictures of locations, and get good deals. I just wish that I was able to do the same for traveling in the states. I was able to save articles but the articles did not have pictures of the restaurants. I would like to see listings of restaurants and be able to save that restaurant.

It's simply amazing. Used their website for a while, now discovered the app. Been helpful for Vietnam and Cambodia so far, I'm sure it doesn't end there. Improvement ideas: allow to copy the address, that way I'd be able to quickly past it to the ride hauling app (or better yet, integrate buttons for the ride hauling apps installed - if that's technically feasible)

Incredible, interesting, easy to use content. Culture trip have never let me down on any trip worldwide. There research has always been accurate in my experience and I find it very easy to use especially for short trips where you need to cram in as much of the good stuff as possible, this app has saved me time.
This app is absolutely amazing, every information is there and all really well written, it's one must to have app if you like to travel, less than 5 starts would be a crime for such a good app.

Tried a London Art Nouveau walk yesterday. It was helpful but a little sparse and some buildings were more or less interesting. Plus some long walks between them, where perhaps links to City Mapper might help.

title: TripCase – Travel Organizer
description:
Organize all of your trip details and travel plans into one streamlined itinerary. TripCase lets you manage flight itineraries, hotel bookings, and rental car reservations in one app. Get airport terminal and gate information in one glance on your phone, and receive notifications on your phone, tablet or smartwatch if there is a change to your flight. Great for business travelers and frequent fliers.

BEFORE YOUR TRIP
• add reservation details to your account so you can access your itinerary from anywhere
• share your trip with others and TripCase will keep them updated on your behalf

AT THE AIRPORT
• view flight information and receive notifications if anything changes
• locate your seat on the plane or check out what’s available with real time seat maps
• search alternate flights when you need to make adjustments

AT YOUR DESTINATION
• quickly access directions or request an Uber ride to get to your next destination
• uncover something new with helpful messages specific to your destination
• instantly add new locations to your itinerary to remember them later

summary: The travel app to organize trip items, with free flight alerts & travel tools
recentChanges: We regularly improve performance, fix bugs, and deliver features to help you take better trips. Any major updates will be highlighted for you inside the app.
comments: All of a sudden, the fight informaton is removed automatically. We don't know if they are canceled or not. If I rely on the information I entered for future reference, this will be disastrous as I can't find it anyone. I will look for another app since this behavior will get me surprised. I cannot trust this app anymore.

Forwarding emails to trips@ doesn't work 4 out of 5 times. Also adding flights with only alphabetic characters works, but many flights also have digits in there (eg are alphanumeric and not alphabetic). I end up putting most of my itinerary in there manually. Oh and it looks like the app is from the nineties - very old design.

I use this app for ever trip! Helps me see all things I want to do or see. Use information from past trips to plan future trips based on notes I entered. Love it. Will always use. Only wish there was a way to make that a day's plans have been confirmed completely.

A nice app, very much like WorldMate. Unfortunately there is one BIG FAILING. The trips are all stored in cloud, rendering the app useless once traveling, unless you have roaming data or available WiFi. Such a big let down, as WorldMate stored all your trip details on your device. Why TripCase can't do the same is beyond me. A bid step backwards.

Not impressed. The issues I had years ago still are there. Does not merge reservations automatically. When merging manually still is clunky and doesn't put things in the correct order (flights completely out of order timewise, hotels on wrong days, doubling of entries for not explicable reason you name it and no way to fix manually). One trip and not impressed.

title: Trip Plans
description:
The Trip Plans app lets you view your detailed itinerary from your travel advisor on your device. No data or internet connection? No problem! All your trip details will still be there presented in a beautiful and easy to understand format.

- See a summary of your trip with how many events you have on each day.
- On each day, view detailed information for each event.
- Quickly pull up phone numbers and navigation for the places on your trip.
- Quickly contact your travel advisor if issues come up.

Your travel advisor will send you an email with a link to open your specific trip. Bon Voyage!
descriptionHTML:
The Trip Plans app lets you view your detailed itinerary from your travel advisor on your device. No data or internet connection? No problem! All your trip details will still be there presented in a beautiful and easy to understand format.

- See a summary of your trip with how many events you have on each day.
- On each day, view detailed information for each event.
- Quickly pull up phone numbers and navigation for the places on your trip.
- Quickly contact your travel advisor if issues come up.

Your travel advisor will send you an email with a link to open your specific trip. Bon Voyage!
summary: View your detailed itinerary from your travel advisor on your device.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
comments: Since the update to 4.0.3 the app didn't start up anymore :-( I need this app for my upcomming trip, my travel agency uses it as the only communication... [update] After quick contact with the developper and doing an uninstall and re-install it started working again. Rate 5 stars now.
This app is absolutely brilliant the fact you can access it offline makes it the traveller's dream. All you need to know in the same place outstanding!
Horrible new account/trip response time! It has been almost 3 days and nothing. Cannot add new trip until contacted.
Great little app that is easy to use and keep you on track with your trip itinerary.
I like this app. It is really a nice overview of your trip and the visuals are nice and clear

title: CheckMyTrip
description:
CheckMyTrip brings all of your trip details together in one master view.  Ideal for business travelers and frequent fliers to stay productive and enjoy unique local experiences.  Essential for leisure holiday seekers to navigate unfamiliar destinations and maximize the fun.  It's free, easy to use and loaded with trip alerts, planning tools and more to get you safely from door to door.

BEAUTIFUL FEATURES AWAIT YOU

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES - Stay Organized
• Flight, hotel, car, rail, meeting, dining, tour & activity details organized into one elegant itinerary view
• 3 simple methods to add & organize your itinerary details:  forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com; enter booking reference with first and last name; or manually enter the trip information through a form

HANDY TRIP TOOLS - Be Prepared
• Direct access to many airline check-in systems and seat maps
• Real-time notifications via push, in-app and email of flight status, terminal and gate details plus layover times
• 5-day weather forecast for each point in your journey
• Search and reserve taxi and parking options in 40 countries

AWESOME DESTINATION TRIP PLANNING SERVICES - Feel Like a Local
• First-hand local discovery of places nearby through Foursquare
• Search and reserve over 50,000 epic tour & activity options worldwide available through Viator
• Search and reserve over 41,000 great restaurant options in major cities available through OpenTable

READY TO TRAVEL FEARLESSLY?  
Getting started is easy.  Create an account using your Facebook ID or e-mail address.  Like Us on Facebook to access curated travel planning news, inspiration and tips.

We respect your privacy - [https://www.checkmytrip.com/cmtweb/web-desktop.html#/privacypolicy]

By downloading the app, you accept our Terms & Conditions of use - [https://www.checkmytrip.com/cmtweb/web-desktop.html#/termsandconditions]

WHO IS BEHIND CHECKMYTRIP?  
CheckMyTrip is brought to you by Amadeus - the technology company powering the travel industry.  We facilitate the entire travel journey, improving the travel experience so millions of people can travel fearlessly every year.  For more information, visit amadeus.com

**IMPORTANT REMINDER**
CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY

We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account.  If you need to modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, dining or tour & activity booking - you must contact the provider directly for assistance.
descriptionHTML:
CheckMyTrip brings all of your trip details together in one master view. Ideal for business travelers and frequent fliers to stay productive and enjoy unique local experiences. Essential for leisure holiday seekers to navigate unfamiliar destinations and maximize the fun. It's free, easy to use and loaded with trip alerts, planning tools and more to get you safely from door to door.

BEAUTIFUL FEATURES AWAIT YOU

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES - Stay Organized
• Flight, hotel, car, rail, meeting, dining, tour & activity details organized into one elegant itinerary view
• 3 simple methods to add & organize your itinerary details: forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com; enter booking reference with first and last name; or manually enter the trip information through a form

HANDY TRIP TOOLS - Be Prepared
• Direct access to many airline check-in systems and seat maps
• Real-time notifications via push, in-app and email of flight status, terminal and gate details plus layover times
• 5-day weather forecast for each point in your journey
• Search and reserve taxi and parking options in 40 countries

AWESOME DESTINATION TRIP PLANNING SERVICES - Feel Like a Local
• First-hand local discovery of places nearby through Foursquare
• Search and reserve over 50,000 epic tour & activity options worldwide available through Viator
• Search and reserve over 41,000 great restaurant options in major cities available through OpenTable

READY TO TRAVEL FEARLESSLY?
Getting started is easy. Create an account using your Facebook ID or e-mail address. Like Us on Facebook to access curated travel planning news, inspiration and tips.

summary: CheckMyTrip is the World's Leading Travel App
recentChanges:
* App Shortcuts:
Simply long tap on the CheckMyTrip app icon to have immediate access to some of your favorite features: Add your trip, open your next trip, and book your next taxi and activity!
* Bug fixes
comments: Thank goodness for CheckMyTrip. Part of our flight was canceled, and another part of it re-routed. We have yet to be advised by the airline, but we got prompt updates with CheckMyTrip. We would have started the 2.5 hour trip to the airport without being aware of the changes. Love this app!

Promising but buggy. I downloaded it today considering it's from Amadeus, which is a well-known industry standard software, I was really expecting more. I have recently booked a return train journey and accommodation through well known booking sites. I have forwarded the details to the email address provided and only accommodation appeared in the app, but it didn't register half of the accommodation details and wouldn't allow me to edit and add those details manually.

Really enjoy the app, has made keeping up a lot of travel easier, but not 100% but that maybe due to the back end information source that is pulled was not updated timely. Have seen a few funky bugs. But for a free product - excellent. Would love to see a desktop interface portred.
Love this app and use it for all of my trips! Highly recommended! (we had a flight delay and this app alerted us before the airport or airline app even did!).
Great App. Keeps me up to date with my travel schedule. Sends timely reminders. Makes traveling much easier.

title: Expedia Hotels, Flights & Car Rental Travel Deals
description:
Exclusive savings on hotels, flights, cars, and travel for the ultimate travel experience. 
Book your hotels, flights, rental cars, things to do and bundle deals on the app and get Double Expedia Rewards points! Over 500,000+ hotels worldwide  including some of the best hotels in the US, including boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs and resorts. Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

From planning to booking, the Expedia App is designed to enhance your travel. Save with mobile-exclusive hotel deals and stay one step ahead with flight, hotel and car alerts and view your trip details anytime, anywhere.

Save big when booking bundle deals:
- Select your perfect hotel and ideal flight 
- Keep an eye out for Unreal Deals
- View your flight and hotel details together and marvel at all you’ve saved 

Save big on hotel rooms:
- Save up to 40% with mobile-exclusive hotel deals for tonight, or any night
- Sort by price, deals or reviews to find a hotel perfect for you
- Read real reviews from verified hotel guests

Find your perfect flight:
- Choose from hundreds of airlines
- Sort by price, duration or departure and arrival time
- Book all class types, from economy to first class seats

Get going as soon as you land:
- Enjoy round-trip car rentals from any airport – with no cancellation fee
- Reserve a car rental up to 30 minutes in advance
- Choose from our selection of standard car rentals, luxury autos, SUVs and more

Discover and book things to do:
- Browse and book activities for hundreds of destinations worldwide 
- Get tickets for tours, shows and theme parks, museums and more 
- Reserve airport shuttles and ground transportation

Book in a flash and get rewarded for your travel:
- Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
- Earn Expedia Rewards points on all your purchases

Your trip companion, no matter the device: 
- View upcoming trip details, hotel address information and get maps for directions 
- Receive alerts for flight delays, hotel check-out times and more
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
- Get inspired with our curated tablet travel collections

Download the Expedia App for hotels, flights, cars rentals, activities and bundle deals today! 

*Limited quantity, while supplies last. Terms and conditions apply. Only available for customers residing in the US.

*Savings based on all vacation package bookings with Flight + Hotel on Expedia.com from September 2013 through February 2014, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

Becky Roth
Expedia
114 Sansome St. Suite 1100
San Francisco, CA 94104
recentChanges: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly.
comments: Terrible. Chat never available. Cancel feature broken. Called multiple times to hear a recording that the service was not available. When I finally got through, the agent uttered I was being unresponsive and quickly hung up while I was talking. She literally gave me 1 second to reply while on hold for over 2 hours. Now I'm stranded outside the country in this crisis because the airline canceled a flight and put me on a connection before the first flight. I'm not a time traveler. Thanks Expedia!

This app sucks, how did it get 4.5 stars? You will NOT GET ANY REFUND if you cancel a flight. You will only get CREDITS can only be redeemed by calling them. You cannot use your credits on the app!!! And they have some technical issues so you cannot call them to book a flight. So your refund money is gone. The app sucks.

DO NOT BOOK TRAVEL WITH THIS APP!!! Due to covid19, we had flights booked. The airline canceled our flights but cannot refund us because we booked with Expedia. Expedia's robotic call system will not allow us to speak to an agent and there is STILL no option on the app for a refund. We are trapped in a foreign country as they have our money and we cannot book another flight. We are not the only ones. UPDATE: Your reply matches Expedia's Mar 12 email, but nothing has changed with ref to refunds.

I found the travel insurance that is offered to be useless in the face of a real emergency. I purchased my trip long before the COVID virus was announced. I am outraged that the travel insurance company was allowed to add a bunch of exclusions concerning COVID-19 long after my purchase. AIG altered the policy to avoid paying out. In my opinion, the insurance offered is a scam.

I found the travel insurance that is offered to be useless in the face of a real emergency. I purchased my trip long before the COVID virus was announced. In my opinion, the insurance offered is a scam.

title: Tripoto: Travel Community, Plan Trips & Holidays
description:
Tripoto is the world’s largest community of travel bloggers and a unique travel app where you can discover and share itineraries, travel stories, location information, hidden travel destinations, attractions, experiences, hotels, tour packages and more.


Explore travel guides
Get information on places to see & things to do for any location
Start a travel blog to share your travel story or itinerary
Earn credits for your blog, photos & videos
Discover top hotels & tour packages
Redeem credits on tour package bookings
Use trip planning features like route map, itinerary planner & nearby explorer


With over 10 million+ users, Tripoto is a hub of travel information with many cool features to help you plan or get inspired for your next trip. Listed below are things that Tripoto is known for:

Trip Planning App: On Tripoto, you can discover itineraries, reviews and travel stories by real travellers. With comprehensive travel guides containing information on attractions, activities and experiences, you can plan a trip to any location in the world.

The Community of Travel Bloggers: If you’re a travel blogger or want to be one, you can share your travel story with the world by joining our platform. You can even share pictures of your trip through our photo blogs. For every blog shared, you’ll earn credits to buy hotels and holidays from our platform. No strings attached!

Travel Information Provider: Get accurate information about places around the world, read itineraries and reviews written by real travellers, and explore travel guides. Find and filter places by your interest, region, season and budget. With Tripoto’s travel guides, you can discover popular as well as hidden destinations around the world. 

Travel Forum: Have a question related to travel? Our community of travellers will give you the answer. With a robust community forum, you can connect with travellers who will be able to provide the correct answer to all your travel questions. 

Social Media App for Travellers: Connect with travel enthusiasts, holiday-makers, backpackers and solo travellers from around the world. Create your own social travel circle with Tripoto. 

Hub of Cool Places to Stay: Discovering hotels that suit your vibe can be a daunting task, but not on Tripoto. Our team creates hotel collections by handpicking hotels from various service providers. These collections allow you to explore the best budget hotels, backpacker hostels, luxury stays, resorts, and homestays around the world. 

Tour Packages Discovery App: If you’ve been searching for the perfect honeymoon package, family vacation, or any other package, you should check out Tripoto. Our team curates holiday packages from numerous online holiday package providers, including providers in the domain of trekking, biking, and other experiential trips. Through our platform, you can get a custom quote from several holiday package providers and even customize your holiday as per your preference. 

Package Aggregator: We work as tour package aggregators that bring together some of the best packages from offline as well as online travel agencies. On Tripoto you can find and compare packages, send details to several providers without directly booking and connect with multiple providers simultaneously.

Route Planner: Ready to travel? Plan your itinerary, map route and distance with the help of Tripoto. With a hub of information provided to us by real travellers, we can help you find accommodation, food, and transport information even in the remotest corners of the world. 

Nearby Explorer: With our ‘Near Me Now’ feature, you can find attractions, events, experiences, activities, dining options, and nightlife options, with just one click. 

Don’t wait! Log in to the world of travel with Tripoto - travel planning app.

recentChanges:
Looking for some intense travel inspiration? Tripoto's got you covered!
We have launched a brand new feed where we feature the best travel photos and videos from destinations across the world. Go through these posts created by travelers just like you to experience the beauty that awaits you. Publish your own travel photos and videos now to get featured on this feed!
comments: I haven't booked a holiday yet, but app experience is very good! Might add a more helpful review after a holiday experience!
Wonderful app, Every travel bug must have this app. Very helpful to search nearby visiting places with map links.
User friendly app. I had also started blogging on this app. Loved it.
A good platform for travellers to plot their story according to thier trips.
Very easy to use & quick service. Best service providers. I recommend 100% to use this service for your happy trips.

title: Trips by Lonely Planet
description:
Explore every day with Trips by Lonely Planet — a beautiful, simple and intuitive way to share travel experiences. Upload photos and videos to your timeline, then share your trip with your friends, family and fellow travelers. Discover new places, be inspired by stories from the Lonely Planet community and start planning your next adventure.

------------

We extend our warmest thanks to the contributors whose photography appears in our Play Store screenshots:

* Share:
    * Alex Howard ("Hiking the Na Pali Coast")
* Create:
    * Brad Haynes ("The wonderful wildlife of South Africa")
* Explore:
    * Emma Sparks ("Classic Venice")
    * Annie Spratt ("48 Hours in Sydney")
* Discover:
    * Unsplash; Tommy Lisbin ("Adventure")
    * Pieter Ras; 500px ("Wildlife and Nature")
    * Annie Spratt ("Cities")
    * Wanaporn Yangsiri ("Unsplash Community")
    * Brad Haynes ("Ruins")

    * Michaela Potterbaum ("Iceland: A Bucket List Road Trip")

recentChanges: This version includes bug fixes and notification updates
comments: The concept of the app is very good. I like the app. But one small request, if you can change the text display font for the user story inside the app to something soothing and clear font like "roboto" or "rubik" then it will be very easy to read. Otherwise  the stylist font looks good but very difficult to read. Thanks in advance.

What an infuriating app. Every time I download I try to log in using my Lonely Planet ID. Nope, this app is only interested in new accounts. Cant even do that as of course my email address already exists in an account! Waste of my time. I shall go back to Google's trip planner instead. At least they let you use their one!

The app is great and when it works it is good and interesting but most of the time I use the search it crashes with 'no network connection' and the option to 'try again'. This happens when I have a good connection and other apps have no problems etc..?

[Edit] so you say I can edit my trip offline, and then publish it all at once? How do I edit a photoblog, 100 photographs all at once? How many days do you have where there is enough time to add 50? Or let's say 30? In reality the design of the app is flawed, if it can't scale to more than one trip uploaded in its entirety, what about the people using the three minutes of airtime they could scrounge, each day, in Bali, under a volcano, trying to tell the story the world wants to hear? Must they sweat it out, not having the USA's 300mb/sec, but a paltry 2mb/sec line they are only too grateful for. You need to travel, you need to experience frustration of watching gmail take 20 minutes to display one screen in Malawi and then tell me I must edit my story offline. This is lonely planet, a travelers go to site, not the Aldi app I put my shopping list into. Imagine trying to explain an earthquake in Haiti in twenty words, and the half a jpeg that managed to upload.

I had a really frustrating experience. i had written a pull post up (took me probably 2 hours) and becuase there is no draft saving mode I lost everything when the app closed out. I uninstalled it becuase of this. i was really excited to use it too 😔

title: Sygic Travel Maps Offline & Trip Planner
description:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, cafés, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

360° VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360° videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360° videos also support Cardboard.

MAPS DESIGNED FOR TRAVELERS
Detailed maps based on OpenStreetMap.org data adjusted for walking and exploring your destination. Built-in search and GPS-based walking directions and tight integration with the Sygic GPS Navigation.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com

recentChanges:
Updated translations and a few small improvements.

Do you enjoy Sygic Travel? Please help others discover it. Rating it in Google Play means a lot. Your feedback is also much appreciated. Thanks!
comments: Complements well with the web version. In fact, it's best to plan your trip in front of the PC and use this app to view/modify your trip while traveling. That said, the UI could use some improvements

First impressions planning a RV trip (FREE): Pros: Most destinations were listed and easily added to my trip. Itinerary relatively easy to edit. Places easy to add. Cons: No satellite, terrain, etc. views on maps. Maps not current for navigation...a major highway near me doesn't show completion...that's inexcusable. Weather forecast was COMPLETELY inaccurate... Unable to download. No easy NAVIGATE option from the itinerary...have to go deeper. This app has potential, but is really basic.

I'm currently enjoying how easier it makes to plan a trip. The only thing I think is missing is a section to calculate expenses and maybe time indicators for each place added in a day. Also integrations with Omio and Airbnb

I was interested in sygic travel Maps offline & trip planner, but after trying out the free ones, I found that many stores names were not on the map, even when searching they were not available, and sadly my place of residence address were not on the maps..malaysia

Great app to plan any trip, by allowing you to lay out the sites you want to see, places you want to go, and seeing on a map how close/ far apart. This lets you plan your day in the most effecient sequence - LOVE it.

title: TripMate - A Trip Expense Manager
description:
You have lots of expense managers, but wait... no one customized it for travel, the way we did it. TripMate is a simple, free, intuitive, feature-rich travel expense manager specially designed for group travelers. We provide you a lot many features to manage your business and personal trip expenses without any hassles.  

Some simple clicks may ease your brain a lot by our trip expense manager. Get free from all the annoying calculations while in the trip and save your valuable time. All your travel expenses will be organized by our trip expense manager. Keep track of all the expenses covered in your trip by our detailed statistics.

Key features which make your trip enjoyable and comfortable with us:
1. Intuitive and easy to use user interface.
2. Create trips in just a few clicks.
3. Add expenses covered in the trip and get a glimpse of all the expenses organized wisely.
4. Get a quick summary of expenses made by each person separately.
5. Add/Remove persons in the middle of the trip.
6. Visualize your expenses with our detailed statistics.
7. Add notes/checklist for each trip separately.
8. Create a shortcut for each trip to access it easily.
9. Share detailed reports as you wish.
10. Sort the trips by date, amount and name.  
11. Search trips from the trip list.
12. Get a detailed information regarding hotel and travel booking sites.
13. Customize the app with our stunning themes.
14. Backup and restore (Google drive and Local) your data with a couple of clicks.


Key Words : Travel expense manager, Trip expense manager, TripMate, Expense manager, trip mate.

Please send feedback directly to the developer. Your concern makes the app better.
descriptionHTML:
You have lots of expense managers, but wait... no one customized it for travel, the way we did it. TripMate is a simple, free, intuitive, feature-rich travel expense manager specially designed for group travelers. We provide you a lot many features to manage your business and personal trip expenses without any hassles.

Some simple clicks may ease your brain a lot by our trip expense manager. Get free from all the annoying calculations while in the trip and save your valuable time. All your travel expenses will be organized by our trip expense manager. Keep track of all the expenses covered in your trip by our detailed statistics.

summary: Manage your travel expenses with our powerful and complete trip expense manager.
recentChanges:
• Now you can distribute money unequally among multiple persons.
• Multicurrency support.
• Share expenses list as you wish.
• Add/edit/delete categories.
• UI Improvements.
• Bug fixes
comments: This is a superb app. Great for cost tracking and splitting .. supports all kinds of permutations and combinations which are needed like let's say in a trip, Mr X pays for some cost which is actually Mr Y's expense, this app manages all these calculations accurately Loved it

Used for a trip to Europe with a friend. So very easy and intuitive. This app was great. Allowed unequal splitting and split paying. Awesome. The only thing that I can think to improve is allowing a default exchange rate and currency while traveling as it got repetitive to have to pick the traveling currency for each entry.
There should be option to add attachment as pdf or images which will store on memory or into google drive if option made available.
Very bad app.Data Restore option doesn’t work. Fix it asap. Uninstalling the app.
Work well and make me able to monitor my expenses. A suggestion is to add tracking expenses when using credit card.

title: KAYAK Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
KAYAK searches hundreds of other travel sites so you don’t have to. Book the perfect flight, hotel or rental car and save money with mobile-only rates and Private Deals. KAYAK Trips lets you organize all of your travel plans in one place including free flight status updates, airport terminal maps and security wait times. KAYAK is the only app you need for planning, booking and traveling.

SEARCH: Find great deals on flights, hotels and rental cars
• Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings
• Effortlessly and securely book via the app without the need to re-enter your traveler data and credit card information.
• Pick a destination and choose flexible dates to find out when it’s best to fly.
• Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, amenities and much more.
• Book at the right time. Price Forecasts let you know whether your airfare is likely to go up. Price history charts show airfare trends over the last 90 days.
• Have big travel dreams but can’t decide on a destination? Use Explore to set your max airfare and see all the amazing places in the world where you can travel (whatever your budget, let us help you search!).

TRIPS: Your free personal travel assistant
• Organize your travel plans in one place, regardless of where you booked.
• Book on KAYAK or forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com to begin building your trip. Optionally auto-import bookings from your Gmail account.
• Stay up-to-date with real-time flight status, gate change and baggage claim notifications.
• Get security wait time estimates for your flight.
• Navigate around the airport with step-by-step directions.
• Find shops, duty free, food, coffee, chargers, restrooms, lounges and more. See actual photos of each and learn whether they are before or after security.
• Countdown timers keep track of your flight’s progress and remaining layover time.
• Share your travel plans with family and friends.
• No internet access, no problem. View your itinerary and airport maps with no internet connection.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
• Let us do the searching for you. Create a flight or hotel Price Alert and we’ll notify you when the price changes.
• Not sure where to go? Create a Price Alert for top world cities or specific regions and let the deal determine your next adventure.

FLIGHT TRACKER: Track the status of any flight
• Know if you’re arriving early or late by viewing the status of departure and arrival times.
• Monitor the flight’s progress in the air with the convenient map view.
• Easily track friends and family with the flight number or airline.

AWARDS
• Winner of 10 Webby Awards including:
• People's Voice Award for Travel Mobile Apps & Other Handheld Devices (2015)
• Webby and People's Voice Award for Travel Tablet Apps & all Other Handheld Devices (2014)
• Time Magazine: 50 Best iPhone Apps (2014)
• Wired Magazine: The 8 Best Apps for World Travelers (2014)

Discover helpful travel tips, tools and information by following our blog: https://www.kayak.com/news/

We'd love to hear from you:
https://twitter.com/kayak
mobile@kayak.com

summary: Find, compare & book flights and hotels with KAYAK’s all-in-one travel app
recentChanges: Tired of repeating the same search filters over and over? So are we. Logged-in users can now easily re-apply recently-used search filters to any flight, hotel, or car search to see the results you care about quicker.
comments: It doesn't always show the lowest fare, but it does show current flights and has a great interface.
As others have said, android legacy systems cannot use this app. Running android 7 here, and getting no results. Uninstalling and switching elsewhere
Its easy and convenient. But some tickets can be difficult to buy
So many options. So much choice. Various tweaking methods. Price comparison, KAYAK is designed to suit your needs A*
I appreciate how there is multiple choices. For each local! Thanks Kayak!

title: Traveler Buddy - Trip Planner and Flight Checker
description:
TravelerBuddy is an innovative, time-saving and easy-to-use trip planner app. 

You can get one stop travel checklist for check flight status, flight delay, flight cancellations, local weather, currency exchange, customs regulations, visa requirements, passport validity, packing list and expense management
You can navigate easily to places such as hotel address with travel map even offline.
Our goal is to save time and provide paperless, stress-free travel for every traveler. 
You will get the following benefits. 

#1 Travel paperless
• Easy access your travel itineraries and its travel checklist on well-arranged trip card
• Have secure, PIN-protected access to digital copies of important travel documents

#2 Make your travel plans smoothly
• Create your trip checker automatically by simply forwarding all your booking emails (e.g. flight, hotel, restaurant) to trips@travelerbuddy.com 
• Manually edit and additional travel plans and its details, notes, and attachment

#3 Check flight status and save time
Always stay informed yourself before your trip about:
• Required passport validity and necessary visa requirements
• Health risks and necessary vaccinations
• Customs regulations

See at a glance:
• Validity of your passport and visa
• national weather forecast for all destinations
• Currency exchange rates between home and local currency
• Time difference between country of residence and travel destination, including world time zone

Receive promptly:
• Notifications about next step in your journey
• Alerts about possible flight information (e.g. flight delays, flight arrivals)
• Reminder for flight check-in and departure
• Ground navigation support with map to next destination (e.g. hotel)
• Information assistance to fill immigration forms 

#4 Manage your travel plan expenses swiftly
• Receive automatically generated, editable expense reports from booking emails, add expenses by uploading photos or files and edit them easily

#5 Protect your business travel and personal data
• Your data is encrypted and safe with us
• PIN code protected personal profile

#6 Access via easy-to-use, secure one stop Solution
• Your road trip planner is always updated in real-time
• You can access relevant information both online and offline 

Plan your trip and get important notifications in all in one travel app.

summary: Make my trip. Check itinerary, flight plan, local weather, exchange rates & more
recentChanges:
Travel Risk Information
UX/UI improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Would've been a perfect app, but: 1) too many required fields for everything. What if I don't know ferry terminal? What if there is only one terminal? What if pick up and return address for car rental is the same? Why separate fields for address, city and country? Should be simplified. 2) doesn't work offline. Lots of apps allow offline editing and syncing to the cloud when you get back online, but not this one...
This app is really great as your Travel Companion, It's Literally my Travel Virtual Assistant. 100/100
Love Traveler Buddy!!! IT'S A GREAT APP TO HAVE ESPECIALLY GREAT FOR PEOPLE WHO TRAVEL ALOT AND HAVE MULTIPLE TRIPS THERE TAKING!! YOU'VE KEPT ME ORGANIZED AND SECURE IN ALL MY TRAVELS...HAGD!!!!
I used to like tripit. but traveller buddy is simply better on all aspects.
Travel buddy is the greatest app for help in travels. Download and try it.

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.

summary: Browse traveler photos for inspiration and map out your own travel plans.
recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here’s what’s new:

• Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: Very good app! If you're planning a trip or even looking for local options, you need this app. It's definitely one of my most used apps for a reason. It's very informative and helpful. It allows you to save things you find at a location to your "places" list that you create so when you go, open your saved destination and have at it. I planned a weeklong Vegas trip of things to do, places to eat, etc this way and never missed a thing. I ran out of vacation before I did options! Highly recommended

This app is slowly improving. Most things you can do via the web interface, you can do with the app. However irritations such as embedded links not always opening, and the Inbox being slow to update private messages, mean that its not quite there yet.

Have used this app for years. It has generally been very good. However I would suggest it would be more user friendly if a review writer was able to get into a review he has made. The reason being that some times after a report has been posted a writer picks up an error he has made. At present time it is a real drama to try and sort it out. If the writer could get into the review and edit it there and then, no dramas that would be a real plus. Just a thought. Regards Kiwi nev No action yet.

This app is not very good. It tries to do a lot, but does it poorly. To search for a specific listing you're better off using Google. I tried writing a review and adding photos, and the app is painful in this regard - it just doesn't work properly. If you can, use the desktop version of the website, because it's less painful. You would after all these years that the developers might finally get it right. Sadly, this is not so.

For checking out Hotel reviews it's fine. But I don't like it for booking a trip. Does not give clear per person pricing. Mostly just per night cost of a room. I want to know exactly what I am paying for. Even for rides to the Airport it says may include an extra charge. Then doesn't say how much. Think I will keep using a Travel agent. I don't want any surprise charges later.

title: Travelocity Hotels & Flights
description:
Book with confidence with the Travelocity Customer First Guarantee: 24/7 social support at your fingertips!

TRAVELOCITY APP FEATURES:

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome & free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Airport shuttles & more

MY TRIPS
- Share your travel plans with friends and family via Travelocity's itinerary sharing feature!
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.

MANAGE
- Connect with a Customer 1st Guarantee specialist, directly through the app via Twitter or Facebook!
- Sign in through Facebook, and use the same account across all devices.
- Use the booking tracker to see your past, current and future bookings, even when you’re offline.

Travelocity gets you to your next destination cheaper than other apps thanks to the Travelocity Price Guarantee.


MOB15 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 15% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Travelocity app by December 31, 2020, for 1 or more nights for travel by December 31, 2021. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 15% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. After the booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Travelocity reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see https://www.travelocity.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Travelocity app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

summary: Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.
recentChanges: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly.
comments: Spent over 3 hours on hold just to get hung up on. That has happened several time's now! Dont waist money on the waiver it's a gimmick and you're just spending money to lose your money. I was told this app was garbage but didn't listen. Lesson learned!! Hopefully nobody else has to go through this. Book airlines and hotels on your own through Google and save the headache

Booking was easy. Good luck with customer support. I've been trying to call for 2 days now with no response. I can't even get a hold of a real person and the AI support just keeps sending me on a loop so I can't cancel my flight. Once this trip is settled I'm never using this again

Incredibly frustrating to try and cancel a reservation using this app. In fact, it was actually impossible for me. I ended up having to cancel the hotel and the flight individually with the providers. I have since deleted and uninstalled this application and will never use Travelocity again in my life. What a joke.

Booked hotel for 3 days, due to weather, needed to cancel one night, but app only allowed total cancellation, could not contact Travelocity by phone to cancel just 1 day due to "technical difficulties" on their end. Contacted hotel to cancel 1 day, but hotel said they would do it but couldn't due to it being booked through Travelocity. After trying for 3 hrs to contact representative had to cancel through app costing me $200.00. I missed cancellation mark by one hour. Thx Travelocity for nothing

Would NOT recommend using this company! When I went to book one hotel room, the site told me that it had timed out and not went through, so naturally I did it again. I ended up being charged for 2 rooms and have been trying for days to get ahold of them to get refunded , with no luck yet. The phone lines always say "we are having technical difficulties, please call again later", no response from FB messenger, or email either. I just want my money back from my unused hotel room..

title: Trip Expense Manager
description:
Trip Expense Manager is a perfect and unique app to manage your trip-related expenses. This app is perfect for group and solo traveller. 

I have a story about this app. "We are a group of 6-10 friends who are a travel enthusiast and do a lot of trips together. We were always facing a problem to manage expenses because managing expenses by paper and pen is not an easy task. I searched in Google Play but did not find any good app for travel expense and which fulfil my requirement. So, I decided to create an app which specially made for group/solo expenses." 

This app has following features:
• Create multiple trips to manage expense
• Add places in visit list
• Add description/note
• Create a shortcut to easily access any trip detail
• Split expense between people
• Share By option to add expense for selected people
• Add deposit amount for any person
• Import/Export trip expense
• Share trip expense in excel sheet format
• View trip stats by category, date and person wise in Pie and Bar chart
• Add/edit/delete expense category
• Add background image for any trip
• Add expense in multiple currencies
• Edit/delete expense details
• Sort expense details according to person/date/category/share by
• Search trip

This app is easy to use and almost cover all requirements related to the group expense and single person trip. 

Please email question/feedback and suggestion directly to the developer.

• Add places in visit list
• Add description/note
• Create a shortcut to easily access any trip detail
• Split expense between people
• Share By option to add expense for selected people
• Add deposit amount for any person
• Import/Export trip expense
• Share trip expense in excel sheet format
• View trip stats by category, date and person wise in Pie and Bar chart
• Add/edit/delete expense category
• Add background image for any trip
• Add expense in multiple currencies
• Edit/delete expense details
• Sort expense details according to person/date/category/share by
• Search trip

This app is easy to use and almost cover all requirements related to the group expense and single person trip.

Please email question/feedback and suggestion directly to the developer.
summary: This app is for traveler to manage trip expenses with unique features.
developerAddress: 150B Sukhrali, near sector 17C gate, Gurgaon, India
recentChanges:
- fixed some bugs
- added privacy policy
comments: Love this app. Use it every travel and it is awesome. Highly recommend it kf you like keeping an eye on what your money goes to. Also really good to better set the budget for future trips! Love love love it! Only wish it had a barcode reader or scanner for tickets, but still easy to use as it is. 👍

Usefull app. But I can not export do GDrive - it creates file of 0 bytes size. Useful functions would be: duplicate item, category review by list/table (not only graph), average spent per day for categories (e.g. for holiday), date of item - not today's date, but selected according to last item's date (e.g. if adding all spendings at once after holiday).

This is one fantastic app for group travelers who want to save themselves from all the budget distribution among all,which is most painful thing to divide and distribute amount. You can use this app which is very user friendly and easy to use. I have just now used for my jaisalmer new year trip.

This is an amazing app! I am tempted to give 5 stars but it can improve on two things - 1. It is not immediately clear how to assign an admin (long press). Mention it or make this available on menu. 2. At the end of trip, it would be awesome to have a table that says who pays how much yo whom to settle dues.

Hi ... Please explain how do we put an expense limit to the categories and the with ongoing trip spending, we get to see the remaining balance amount for the category ? Unanle to find the feature in the 'Manage category'. Thank you...

title: Trip Planner and Assistant - Sam
description:
Organize all your travel info in one single app with Sam. ➡️ Your business travel assistant. 

✈️  How can Sam help me?

Besides organising all your business trips in a beautiful itinerary, Sam is a trip planner that gets in touch with you anytime there’s something you need to know, like your flight status, a change of gate or a delay. 

It’s more than a travel planner: it’s like having a 24/7 pocket travel assistant :)

✈️  How does Sam work?

Just add your reservations to your itinerary and you will start receiving notifications. You can connect your inbox, forward individual reservations or add your trips manually. Your flight schedule is now at your fingertips!

✈️  Key features:

- Travel itinerary: keep all your travel plans in one place without having to check dozens of apps. Departure time, terminal and boarding gate info, baggage claim, flight status, etc. 

- Free trip notifications: Sam accompanies you during your whole trip by sending you updates and travel related info, whether it is your flight status or a restaurant recommendation. 

- Receive automatic check in reminders.

- Share details of your trips via any platform. 

- Sync your travel schedule with your calendar.

- Request a ride with Lyft or Uber to any of your itinerary locations.

Selected clients of the following Flight Centre Travel Group brands (FCM, Corporate Traveler, FCBT, Stage and Screen)  will be able to enjoy the enterprise version.  Contact us at sam@meetsam.io if you are interested in it. The enterprise version contains the following additional exclusive features:

- Automatic itinerary synchronization
- Share location with your company’s security provider
- Get in touch with your dedicated travel consultant via phone or chat
- One tap access to your integrated report expense tool


To know more, visit us at meetsam.io  or follow us on Twitter (@meetsamio)

recentChanges:

comments: I've been using Sam for my last 3 trips, but it's seems like it's intended to be used for flights, since if I don't add an airport, it doesn't show the trip the same way. Lately, the app keeps closing itself after switching between apps (or even if I take more than a minute to upload a file!)
Just installed it. I like it so far. - would like a widget though, showing upcoming trips. It does a decent job scanning and auto adding items to the trip.
Very helpful especially when you need to go to an airline website. The link is right in the app. Just click and go.
Great app, updates you on important info regarding your trips like delays and cancellations
Useful app to keep track of all aspects of my business travel trips/itineraries. Also very useful if you fly on muli-carriers on different alliances etc as it is Airline agnostic.

title: Tripshot
description:
Tripshot helps you commute with ease. See all of your travel options in one place: shuttle, carpool, vanpool, on-demand, walk, bike share and more, all with real-time arrivals. 

Up-to-the-second accuracy for vehicle locations and arrival times ensures you have the information you need exactly when you need it so you can arrive on time, stress-free.

Simply download the app, login securely with your account and you're ready to go!

KEY FEATURES:
* Advanced Trip Planner—from your home to your final destination, know the route you’re going to take and when you will arrive when using fixed-Route or on-demand services. 

* Real Time Tracking & ETAs—complete visibility to all commute options with  real-time tracking and arrival times for fixed-route and on-demand vehicles. 

* Schedule & Route Review—view route schedules on a stop-by-stop basis on all available routes so you can plan every trip ahead of time. 

* Intelligent Notifications—subscribe to routes or stops to get arrival, departure and delays sent directly to your device via SMS, email or push. 

* On Demand—request an on-demand ride and get a real-time view of all available vehicles.

* Fare Payments—use Tripshot pay for fare-based ticketing to securely purchase a transit ticket. Purchase tickets using Google Pay, Apple Pay, credit cards, and credit cards from pre-tax transit subsidy programs such as: WageWorks and Commuter Benefits.  

Have questions? Need some help? Let us know! Contact the Tripshot support team at support@tripshot.com

recentChanges: * Linkify general alert message.
comments: Horrible tells me every email I try to sign up with is invalid. Awful app.
It works as intended, especially the live gps were you can actually see exactly where the shuttle are currently at.
Crashes with "unfortunately Android system stopped" when trying to log in. Lg g6+, Android 8
This app sucks. I cant even get past login it says my email is not a valid domain.

I'm unfortunately forced to use Tripshot by my employer. This app has terrible user experience and it is very difficult to basic info, because it is so overengineered with unnecessary features. For example, its home page shows a live map with every single bus stop near me, the next 10 arrivals for all lines and their respective delays. Unfortunately, that info is useless 99% of the time, I just really wanted to know when is the next shuttle for my usual line. It's pretty simple.

title: Trip.ir
description:
تریپ “trip” یک آژانس مسافرتی آنلاین است که خدمات گردشگری از جمله بلیط هواپیما، رزرو هتل، خدمات ویزا، تور، ترانسفر فرودگاه، گشت و تفریحات را به صورت آنلاین ارائه می نماید. این وب سایت متعلق به آژانس هواپیمایی "نقطه پرواز " با مجوز رسمی از سازمان هواپیمایی کشوری و سازمان میراث فرهنگی میباشد.

خرید بلیط هواپیما و یا رزرو هتل از اصلی ترین اجزای سفر بوده که تریپ با فراهم کردن بلیط ارزان هواپیما، بلیط چارتر هواپیما، بلیط هواپیما سیستمی و بلیط هواپیما خارجی و داخلی، و همچنین هتل های مختلف سعی در ارائه بهترین نرخ ها و خدمات دارد. تریپ تمامی تامین کنندگان بلیط هواپیما و رزرو هتل را جهت یافتن ارزانترین قیمت ها به خصوص قیمت بلیط استانبول، قیمت بلیط دبی و هتل استانبول ، هتل دبی و ... جستجو کرده و می کوشد با بالاترین استاندارد ها، بهترین خدمات رزرو هتل، خرید بلیط هواپیما ارزان و خدمات سفر را در سراسر جهان، به مشتریان خود ارائه دهد و «تجربه ی لذت بخش سفر» را تداعی می کند. 

تریپ با امکان خرید بلیط ارزان هواپیما همیشه در تلاش است تا هزینه های سفر را در کنار حفظ کیفیت برای مشتریان خود کمتر کند. مطمئنا خرید آنلاین بلیط هواپیما و رزرو آنلاین هتل هوشمندانه ترین روش تهیه خدمات گردشگری می باشد چرا که با چند کلیک تمامی ایرلاین ها از جمله بلیط ماهان، بلیط ایران ایر، بلیط ترکیش و ایرلاین های ارائه دهنده بلیط هواپیما چارتر و همچنین هتل ها را با قیمت و ساعات و شرایط مختلف به کاربران نمایش داده و به این ترتیب امکان یافتن بلیط هواپیما لحظه آخری و ارزان و مقایسه و رزرو بهترین گزینه را به کاربر می دهد. ما در تریپ معتقدیم که سفر از درب منزل مسافر شروع و با رسیدن مسافر به درب منزل خاتمه می یابد.

summary: Tryp is a website for buying airline tickets and online booking with accelerated payment
developerAddress: 10720 Yonge Street, Suite 226 Richmond Hill, ON
