comments: Undoubtedly, the best case among many apps that offer similar services
it's very easy to use Thanks a lot to app developer go on .
it suggests all the flights with good prices
easy book and good price
the best app for online ticket shopping

title: Road Trip Ryan Trip Guide
description:
The Road Trip Ryan Trip Guide is the source for canyoneering, slot canyon hiking and climbing information, as well as many other unique adventures. Route descriptions include detailed offline maps and GPS waypoints to keep you on the right path. Way better than a paper guidebook!

Interested in canyoneering, hiking, roadside attractions, and floating mighty rivers in Utah and surrounding areas? The Road Trip Ryan Trip Guide is your source for accurate and up to date information.

Install the app and download an area to see a list of adventures and explore popular destinations included in the free samples. Full information for each area can be purchased for a fraction of the cost of a guidebook- and purchases include updates with new trips added to your area on the Road Trip Ryan website! 

The premiere app for exploring Zion, Arches National Park, Moab, Escalante, North Wash, Capitol Reef, Cedar Mesa, and more!

**Conditions in the outdoors can, and frequently do change. Like life, danger may lurk around any corner. The information in the app is provided free of any warranty or liability. Be careful, be prepared, and use good judgment.**

recentChanges: Download fix on some devices.
comments: This app is worth every cent! This app and the work Ryan has done collecting coordinates will help lower the number of people descending the wrong canyon by mistake. I'm happy to support that effort.

About halfway functional. The map to the trailhead doesn't work without an internet connection even if you've downloaded local maps through Google. One of the canyon routes on their website for Moab isn't in the app (bow and arrow). Pictures don't work without an internet connection. The gps trail map is fairly low quality and in at least one case (dragonfly) the map was offset from the real world. All in all, fairly disappointing for a pay app.
I've visited some excellent remote places due to this app. Much thanks!
Definitely the best app of its kind. The map function with location can literally save your life. It is easy to make sure you are in the right Canyon. Also, the photos and beta are excellent.
I love this app as it has saved us multiple time with route finding and it just has great beta

title: TripSource
description:
TripSource by BCD Travel is designed exclusively for our clients and their travelers. 
* To register for TripSource, you must have booked a trip with BCD Travel in the past six months.

Your ultimate travel companion, TripSource keeps you organized, informed, and in control of your business travel. No more paper. No more organizing multiple emails. Everything you need, all in one place. After you book your trip, just log in with your corporate email address – your trip details will be there waiting for you. 


• Access your trip details in a simplified timeline view – even reservations booked outside of BCD Travel.
• Book your trip using TripSource for the best rates, the best selection and the best experience.
• Receive real-time flight notifications and risk alerts.
• Available in English, French, German, Spanish, and Brazilian Portuguese in key markets across Europe, North America, Latin America, and Asia Pacific.

recentChanges: - We’re working behind the scenes to improve your TripSource experience.
comments: Edit 12 Feb 2020 Thank You for fixing the problem! The current version has lost all of my bookings, yet I am still getting notifications! Please fix asap.
App wont open, just sits at the loading screen with the initial animation playing over and over.

Lacks Basic Functionality. Thought I'd try this TripSource app since my work uses BCD travel. I've been a "TripIt pro" subscriber for years. This app doesn't pull in your name & AA Flight record # into the AA check-in page. That is an immediate no go for me. That's 1 of the main things I look for from basic automation functionality. Scrape the info you have on my trip & auto-populate it for me. Seems extra basic yet this app fails miserably. Don't waste ur time; uninstall.
Love this app, it has not connected my account and unable to show me my booked trips, but I was getting notifications. Other than that hiccup, I love the app.
Absolutely useless! It's pretty, but useless. It only crashes when you use it. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Still crashes every time. Don't waste your time downloading.

title: Priceline - Hotel Deals, Flights & Travel Bookings
description:
Hotels, rental cars and flights - explore travel deals, book flights, access exclusive offers and save on your travel and accommodation, with the Priceline app.

Vacation vibes or business trip? 5-star hotel or budget hostel? No matter what your travel plans are, you can save on your hotel room, flights and even car rental when you book with Priceline. And thanks to our handy app, you can compare, book, and save, wherever you are.

Hotels, cheap flights & car rental - 5 reasons you need to download before your next trip. Seriously: 

1. Hotel room offers, exclusive to our app users. You won’t find them anywhere else!
2. Accommodation for you - get deals on hotels that matter to you with our personalized, relevant hotel recommendations.
3. Travel ready - Have everything you need for your trip or vacation in one place - hotel deals, rental cars and cheap flights.
4. Hotel booking - Book your next hotel room in a matter of seconds.
5. Hostel or 5-star hotel? We’ve got the right accommodation and hotel deals for any trip and any budget.

Love to travel? Join millions of happy travelers who book great travel deals with us every day - download now! Our exclusive offers and cheap flights can help you save some serious money.

HOTEL DEALS - EXCLUSIVE OFFERS FOR APP USERS
You’ll save up to 60% off with Express Deals® and even more with Name Your Own Price®. Seriously. Plus, you can save even more with exclusive offers and hotel deals you can only find in our app.

BOOK FLIGHTS  - COMPARE & SAVE
Travel across the globe with super travel deals on thousands of domestic and international flights across the globe. Book flights with ease, straight from your phone. Pace yourself.

RENTAL CARS - FAST & EASY BOOKING
Hit the road with deals on rental cars - choose from 290 car rental brands in 28,000+ locations. We also offer free cancellation on most bookings and no credit card fees. That's how we roll.

COMPARE, BOOK & SAVE
Finding the perfect accommodation and travel deals is easy as pie. Search by city, address or point of interest to book the most conveniently located hotels and rental cars. As you search more, we uncover even more deals just for you.

HOTEL BOOKING - FROM HOSTEL TO HOTEL
In a rush? Our app features super-quick travel and hotel booking, especially when you’re signed in! Whether it’s a hostel for the night or a vacation next month - we do fast well.

TRAVEL BUDDY
Easily access and make changes to your trip wherever you are with our My Trips feature. Need to check your hotel booking or car rental details on the go? Get all of your reservation and travel info right on your phone, even if you booked on your computer, are offline or don’t have service. Like magic.

Our app is rated as Best App for Travelers by Travel + Leisure! Whether you want to book flights or your hotel room at the touch of a button, find new and exciting accommodation or simply want to explore vacation destinations out there, the priceline.com app is the best place to start.

Priceline is part of Booking Holdings, which includes leading online travel brands such as Booking.com, Agoda, Kayak & OpenTable.

Get all of your reservation and travel info right on your phone, even if you booked on your computer, are offline or don’t have service. Like magic.

Our app is rated as Best App for Travelers by Travel + Leisure! Whether you want to book flights or your hotel room at the touch of a button, find new and exciting accommodation or simply want to explore vacation destinations out there, the priceline.com app is the best place to start.

Priceline is part of Booking Holdings, which includes leading online travel brands such as Booking.com, Agoda, Kayak & OpenTable.
summary: Book flights, find hotels & save on rental cars. Get travel offers & save!
recentChanges:
We’re always working to find you great deals! We made updates to help you save even more money on every trip:

We streamlined the experience to book a great hotel even more quickly

As usual, we tackled some bugs to improve your experience

If you love the priceline app, spread the word! Add a review in the Play Store and help other travelers find the best deals.
comments: Save your time from using this app, and using priceline. I have booked a hotel with priceline. Chat and called because I could not make it to my reservation due to the quarantine, and both hotels and priceline declined my refund. Not only that, the representative for Priceline stated that I would receive a call in 15 mins. 45 minutes has passed by, and no call. Please reframe from using this application and Priceline in general. They are a rip off, and only about the company policy. Unbelievable

This app seems more for buying a new trip then tracking one. I love priceline and all the people in custermer support, the deals, updates in the email but the app is not geered for that service. It seems to really want bew business. I am un installing it.

There were a few problems I experienced while trying to book this same room for a second night. But I think its because I am not familiar with doing things for myself eith today's technology. But I think "Yeah, I Got This" now. It's great yo know one can save so much time and money with such ease!!

I used like 5 different apps back and forth trying to find a decent flight, and this one ended up being not only the easiest, but definitely the cheapest. Doesn't direct you to another site to book, and you individually choose departure and return flight. Super helpful and informative.

It's great except using it for flight. The date of birth is not the most efficient. Scrolling several pages to get to my birth year was ridiculous. At the end, it kept the correct month and date but stayed with 1990. I tried three times. It needs to be fixed. Other apps use easier ways to get dob.

title: Funliday - Travel planner, collaborative editing
description:
Fun + Holiday = Funliday
The best trip planning App in the world!!!

Funliday is a trip planning app that makes your trip easier, helps you to manage your trips, find local attractions, and get directions. We support iOS, Android and desktop platforms. Funliday providers thousands of destinations, you can easily explore all of the places you are interested in and simply add them to your itinerary. You can also organize schedules and routes, as well as access all other useful information for your trip.

------Key Features-------
☆ Explore attractions all over the world.
☆ Easy to organize your trip.
☆ Support travel group (collaborative editing).
☆ Invite friends to join travel group.
☆ Offers offline trip.
☆ Provides driving/walking/public transit direction.
☆ Share your trip itinerary by email , WhatsApp and Line.
☆ Support desktop platform.


Like it, love it? Leave us feedback and a rating to let us know! We're all ears for your suggestions on how to improve, so if you've got any (or even if you just want to say hi!), drop us a message at prevengers@funliday.com. Have fun on holidays!

comments: I like some function of this app such as calculate travel time and selection type of transport, can drag and drop to change sequence, but I need some function such as can change location icon and adding picture because some place your data base not match with google map so no picture and detail for that location and It always loading to calculate travel time I think it will be better if it have the function to stop calculate time. It will be better if you data base of location link from google.

This is easily the most useful trip itinerary app I have used. It offer a very personal flexible approach to scheduling itineraries for trips without trying to be a travel agent. The app deserves 5 star rating for its innovative take on trip planning.
The app is good but I wish it would show the driving itinerary on the map and not a as the crow flies version of it. Also ads displayed in a different language are a bit distracting.

Went to delete unnecessary days from itinerary, explicitly selected to delete day 1, it asked was I sure I wanted to delete day 1, I confirmed selection, and it instead deleted 2 days that I did not select, one of which included my entire day's itinerary.
A convenient trip planner for traveling .

title: 🚀 TRIPA: Trip Itinerary Planner & Travel Expense
description:
Trip itinerary plan sharing with friends, track and split expenses with TripA. TripA can help to create travel itinerary based on popular places around the world as well as places of your choice. TripA is the best app for planning vacation travel.
You can plan personal & group trip planning with TripA:
·       Multi destination trip planning
·       Explore destination and add directly to trip
·       Travel itinerary planning
·       Trip itinerary map
·       Travel expense tracking
·       Invite friends to co-edit travel itinerary as trip admin
·       Share travel itinerary plan with friends and family
·       Share & split travel expenses.
·       Automatic currency conversion during split expenses
·       Find places to explore & visit
·       Create travel packing checklist
·       Discuss with travel companions and plan your travel itinerary
·       Currency converter with latest currency rates
·       Receive push notifications when your friends post new updates to travel itinerary or 
        travel expenses

TripA provides google map, itinerary map view, explore places map view, packing list / travel checklist, itinerary planner discussions, trip members read view and admin view, track personal expenses, shared expenses tracking, split expenses & places to explore.

TripA has following modules & features: 

👉 Itinerary Planner
Create a trip from must see tab or create from home screen. Once trip is created, User can see tabs: route and route map. User can go to any of page like travel checklist, and travel discussion, must see.  

👉 Places to explore
Explore thousands of places to add to your travel itinerary. You can view places map and nearby places. 

👉 Invite Friends & Share Trip
Share trip itinerary plan with friends & families. Trip member can create & edit travel itinerary. 

👉 Share & Split Travel Expense
Add travel expenses & spit with friends. Personal travel expenses only visible to you and shared trip expenses can only viewed by with whom you shared. Shared travel expenses will be divided equally. View travel expenses break down in graphical report.

👉 Trip Discussions
Chat with your friends and families while you plan your trip or on the go.

👉 Travel Checklist
Create custom travel packing list or add new from list of travel checklist. This travel checklist will help you to plan your trip, so you don't miss anything. This packing checklist can be useful for international traveler.

👉 Push Notifications
Receive trip notifications when your friend send you message or make changes to travel itinerary or travel expenses.

👉 Money Converter
Convert between currencies for travel countries.
 Trip itinerary planner apps works in online and offline mode. Support Google and Facebook login.

TripA is the best app for planning travel trips.  Download now and start planning your trips.

Frequently Asked Questions
1.     How can I share a trip?
Tap on the created trip -> tap on share icon to share the trip.

2.     How can I share travel expenses?
Tap ‘+’ icon on travel expenses page ->Fill up the form -> Switch on ‘Shared’ button ->Select persons to share expenses with -> Tap check mark on upright corner of screen.

3.   How can I add destination from ‘Must See’ to trip Itinerary?
Tap ‘Must See’ in trip -> Explore Country-> Tap ‘+’ button on the destination to add to travel itinerary or tap ‘Map view’ icon in ‘Explore destination’ -> Tap place icon on map -> tap destination name to add to travel itinerary.

4.   Can I add my own places to trip itinerary and how and mark them as complete?
Tap ‘Itinerary’ tab in trip -> tap ‘+’ icon to add place. To mark place as complete, check ‘check box’ on the place in travel itinerary.


Icons by  Icon8

Download TripA travel trip itinerary planner to start Travel itinerary planning, create Trip itinerary map & Travel expense tracking

title: Trip Planner: India's Best Travel App by Holidify
description:
Holidify is the best travel app to plan trips in India and search for travel guides in India. Holidify is the highest rated trip planner app and has been designed by travel experts from India. This app lets you plan your travel itinerary by giving the best travel guides on all tourist places in India.

Decide Where To Travel With Holidify

Planning your trip with friends and not yet decided where you should go? Don’t worry, we will help you first decide you on your perfect travel location and then help you plan your travel. 

You can use filters to customize results based on number of days of the trip, your current location, best time to visit, popular and offbeat locations and region where you want to travel. Personalized travel recommendations also help you get great suggestions. 

Explore Places For Your Next Trip

Discover popular tourist destinations, offbeat places that are not crowded, places for adventure sports, trekking, skiing destinations, rafting, mountain biking, paragliding, road trips and more

Explore holiday ideas and plan the perfect summer vacation holiday with your family. Find beautiful honeymoon destinations, adventure hubs, exotic beaches, hill stations, deserts, wildlife sanctuaries, tiger reserves, caves and more on Holidify travel app

Some popular trip ideas: 

•Holiday in Leh Ladakh, Shikara rides in Srinagar, Kashmir Valley, Mcleodganj, Khajjiar, Manali and Shimla Tourism in Himachal Pradesh

• Golden Temple in Amritsar, World Heritage Sites in Delhi, Havelis and Forts of Rajasthan, Taj Mahal in Agra, Ghats of Varanasi, Temples in Mathura and Vrindavan, Toy Train Rides in Darjeeling

• Travel to unexplored places in Sikkim, an exotic trip to North-East, waterfalls in Meghalaya, trekking in Nagaland

• Plan a trip to hills and beaches of Kerala or plan a trip to exotic islands of Andamans or Lakshadweep

Travel Guides And Top Things To Do

Plan your travel with well-researched information about various places like best time, top things to do, HD photos, tourist maps and where to stay, top restaurants with local food, vegetarian food, etc.  You can also get the cheapest and best travel quotes for your trip from highly rated travel agents for free. 


Plan Weekend Trips

Using Holidify’s Trip Planner app, you can explore 100s of weekend getaway places near Delhi, Tourist places near Bangalore, road trips near Mumbai, treks near Pune, beaches near Chennai, hill stations from Chandigarh and many more. 

How To Reach Between Any Two Places In India

Holidify Trip Planner also helps you find best ways (cheapest and fastest) to reach any place in India from anywhere in India. 

Travelogues and Amazing Blogs Curated By Travel Experts
Browse through various articles and listicles to explore new beautiful places every day. Read informative travel stories to plan your trip and ask questions from travellers and travel experts.

 Beautifully Designed App
Sleek and Smooth UI of Holidify Trip Planner App has been rated India’s best travel app by thousands of people. It has been designed in a way that consumes less battery and very little data. It even works in offline mode and can help you plan your trip in matter of minutes.

Download it now – it’s Free and less than 10mb and consumes very low battery

comments: Whenever I search for any location, it opens up & again returns to the home page. This has been a routine for the last 6 months. I also complaint about it but nothing happened. So uninstalled it!! Horrible 😣

Overall good app, but frustrating that default settings for hotel search cannot be changed. (Number of people in room, and filters). Every search requires the settings to be configured again and again. It would also be helpful to have a map showing all the accomodations together, to compare distance.
I liked a lot. I have a suggestion, if you add an option to plan holiday based upon weather conditions.
Best tourism guide app but need improvement on international spots how to reach tab bcz it shown wrong information.
It's better to know more about the place you are visiting and this app is good in showing that with possible near by loacations as well. Enjoy using.

title: Trip Planner
description:
Trip planner is an android app which helps you to organize everything you need for a trip. It is an easy and fast way of adding the required items you want to carry for a trip. By checking the Trip planner you can easily pick up all the required items for a trip without forgetting a single one. We provide default categories , you can also add new categories. Checklist is provided for selecting the items in the sub categories, which is an ease for the users to select the required items.


Features includes :
✓9 main categories  and 60+ default sub categories .
✓Items can be added,edited and deleted easily.
✓Using checklist the items can be selected easily.
✓After completing a trip you can clear the data’s of the previous trip in a single touch.

For any questions and suggestions contact us on 
android@igosttech.com

very good and very halpfull for travel 👍👍👏👏👌👌

I give this app. Three stars because it's a great starter list but lacking alot.  If your looking for a list you can customize to your lifestyle then it's a five star.  Looking for ideas of thing you may have missed it's a 1 star.  Toiletries does not even include deoderant.  And food has water twice but no breakfast food.  Better pack a large kerchief  that it has but forget seeing pants or shirts going almost nude now that's my kind of vacation.

title: PackPoint travel packing list
description:
Google Play Editor's Choice Award Winner

As Featured In The Washington Post, BBC, LA Times, CNN, Lifehacker, Fast Company's Co.DESIGN, and The Next Web
"A Travel App That Practically Packs Your Bags For You"

Never Forget Your ______ Again!

PackPoint is a free travel packing list organizer and packing planner for serious travel pros. PackPoint will help you organize what you need to pack in your luggage and suitcase based on length of travel, weather at your destination, and any activities planned during your trip.

Once your packing list is built and organized, PackPoint will save it for you, and then you can choose to share it with your friends and family in case they need help packing too.

Punch in the city you're going to travel to, the departure date, and the number of nights you'll be staying there.  

PackPoint will organize a packing list and luggage checklist for your luggage that takes into account:
- Business or Leisure travel
- Activities you plan on doing
- What you need for an international trip
- Warm weather clothes
- Cold weather clothes
- An umbrella if the forecast calls for rain
- If you're willing to repeat wearing basics like shirts and pants
- If you will have access to laundry facilities

Some expert packing organizer user tips:
- Check out the Customize menu within PackPoint for PackPoint's Premium features
- Connect PackPoint to TripIt and create your packing lists automatically!
- Put the PackPoint widget on your home screen
- Swipe to remove packing list items
- Tap to the right of each item to change its quantity
- Pack smart to avoid airline luggage overage fees
- Create a luggage checklist now, and then edit it later as you pack

Have a feature request or feedback?
Visit http://ideas.packpnt.com or e-mail info@packpnt.com

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/packpoint
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/packpnt @packpnt

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: No way to edit a trip date. unintuitive UI - not clear what greyed out items mean, whether checked or not. Not clear how to bring back previously swiped items. Previous trips are archived and effectively dead. You can't copy them as a basis for a similar trip. I think I'll stick with ColorNote.

I tried this one because it has the highest rating (4.7) and is the editor's choice. I am uninstalling it because you can not edit the travel dates and more importantly you can not edit the preset list you are provided with based on the categories you choose. All the extra items I don't need is distracting and time consuming which I don't need as a last minute packer! I am using PackKing instead, which has more flexibility regarding the concerns discussed above.

Gets the job done. Reviews the destination weather, length of stay, purpose of travel, special activities and gives packing suggestions. Allows one to add additional items. Not thoroughly personalized but I use it every time I pack.
It makes my travel easier every time I use it. Its great because along with being easy to use , it also reminds me to pack small stuff that I usually forget about.
This is awesome, I always struggle with what to take, now I have an automatic list that gives great ideas. Some things I will alter but many things I will take.

comments: This is a nice app to keep records of everything about your trip. Please add a few more functionalities like the ability to insert or rearrange paragraphs inside the diary. Sometime you forget to write about something and you want to insert a paragraph between earlier paragraphs and I don't think it is easily feasible right now. Trips are arranged by days like from 5 jan to 10 Jan you travel. But is it possible to take into account the time? Like before 5 Jan 3pm is considered before the trip.
I love this app so much, very easy to use and many features are great. Even you have to pay for export to PDF, Excell
Like the features it offers but it's quite buggy. Particularly annoying not being able to change the plan item location or time once created.
This is the best app i was looking for. I just also wanted one more features where I could store the tickets PDF/Images wherever required.
Requires you to pay just to search for your destination on the map. What a scam.

title: TRIP Driver app
description:
TRIP Driver is a location-based app for drivers who want to provide convenient and safe taxi service.
It provides great pay allowing to convert free time into earnings. The application is focused on drivers working in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

If you have a car and some free time, this application will help you earn some money during spare time.  Simply download, register and receive orders directly in your TRIP Driver app, wherever and whenever you want. Make your dreams come true.

Any questions? Contact us!
Email: info@mytriptaxi.com 
Phone: 251932214742
http://mytriptaxi.com/

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Automatically track your route and places you've visited while you are traveling. Just carry your phone in your pocket and the app creates your own beautiful travel journal.

Once connected to the internet, your travel routes, locations and photos are seamlessly transferred to your personal traveler profile, where your route is plotted on a colourful world map that can easily be shared with friends and family.

PRAISE FOR POLARSTEPS

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"There are many apps that you can use to record different moments from your travels, but none are as all-inclusive and easy to use as Polarsteps." - Refinery29

"Polarsteps replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

KEY FEATURES

■ Easily track your travels
Automatically keep track of your route and places you’ve visited without taking your phone from your pocket.

■ Ride along with your friends
Follow your family and friends on their trips and feel like you're in the passenger seat.

■ Get an instant photo album
Generate a beautiful printed photo album that includes your travel stats and route.

■ Minimal battery consumption
Our Travel Tracker uses very little battery because we use smart technology to determine your location.

■ Full privacy control
Log your trips privately, share them with friends and family at home or inspire the rest of the world!

■ Tracking works offline
Track your entire route without being connected to the internet. The app automatically synchronizes when you're back online.

COMMUNITY
Follow us on Instagram, Facebook & Twitter for the latest app updates and travel inspiration.

www.instagram.com/polarsteps
www.facebook.com/polarsteps
www.twitter.com/polarsteps

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACK?
The more you tell us, the better the app gets. Please send your feedback to support@polarsteps.com or on Facebook: www.facebook.com/polarsteps.

PERMISSIONS
Your privacy is really important to us. We only ask for the permissions we need for the app to serve at its best as your personal travel journal app / travel diary app / travel blog app.


If you have any more questions get in touch with us - see the help section.

recentChanges: We improved video performance, and we gave the app some tender lovin’ care. If you notice anything off, drop us a note to support@polarsteps.com. We’re listening!
comments: There aren't a lot of good apps out there for showing where you've been in a step-by-step process AND allowing you to post a lot of pics AND allowing you to tell your story. After a bad experience with an app that kept deleting my hard work, I downloaded a bunch of new ones and this is the only one I kept. It isn't perfect. Its tracking often stopped following me, so I had to enter a bunch of locations and times by hand. Suggestions for steps aren't great either. But uploading pics is intuitive.

Downloaded the app on my 2 phones - one doesn't sync with the other after making changes. I have now one account on two handsets with different contents. I still think it's a good application and rate it highly. UPDATE: Very nice for the app authors to contact me when the fix was found. Now changing from 4☆☆☆☆ to the ultimate 5☆☆☆☆☆! Highly recommended! The more you populate your account with your travels, the more you will like it!

Such a cool idea! I've made 3 trips with it far with the 3rd being over 5500 miles trip across U.S. and hundreds of pictures and vidoes. Still on 3rd trip and continuing to add. Originally Got app for the travel tracker...it works great. If your traveling long distances or taking a vacation, I would highly suggest.

Really like the app: tracks you, reminds you to place a step and keeps you close to people at home. However it can do with some improvements: being able to like and reply to single comments (like in fb/insta) would be great and editing pictures in the app.

Really nice way to record your trips and for your family and friends to keep up with where in the world you are. You can add photos and a description of each place you visited and it creates a nice little map of the route you took.

title: Cleartrip - Flights, Hotels, Train Booking App
description:
More than 25 million people have chosen Cleartrip APP to plan, search and book their trips. Save time and money when booking air tickets and hotels with the Cleartrip travel APP as you tick those beautiful locations off your travel bucket list.

Book exciting and unique experiences in your city or when you are travelling with Cleartrip Activities. Choose from amazing things to do, and enjoy great events happening in your city of choice. All with one awesome app.

Award Winning Flight Booking APP

- Search and book cheap domestic and international flights with the best deals available with this easy-to-use flight booking APP.
- Find the cheapest flight by searching for flights by city or airport using the APP.
- Set a fare alert for your search and we will alert you when the price drops or when it is about to increase through the APP.
- Pick from all popular airlines, including IndiGo, Jet Airways, SpiceJet, Air India, Air Asia, Emirates, Etihad, Singapore Airlines, Lufthansa, Qatar Airways, Thai Airways, British Airways and more with our one-stop Domestic and International flight booking APP.
- Cleartrip Expressway: Now save time with 1-touch flight ticket bookings in less than 60 seconds when you save your cards (protected using industry-leading encryption technology).  
- Pick from multiple payment options including credit cards, debit cards, net banking and popular wallets like PayTm, PayZapp, PayU Money, OlaMoney and MasterPass.
 - Carry your trips with you wherever you go, even when offline, and travel paperless with this lightweight travel APP.
- Cancel or reschedule your flight bookings right from the APP.

Super Fast Hotel Booking APP

- Get great deals on hotels in 15000+ cities through the hotel booking APP.
- Search and book rooms from a huge choice of hotels, for all budgets. 
- Pay@Hotel Book your hotel room on Cleartrip and pay directly at the hotel.
- Use price, star rating, traveller ratings (powered by TripAdvisor) and location filters to quickly find the best hotel. This hotel search APP makes it very easy to find and book your dream hotel.
- Read TripAdvisor reviews by other travellers - Another useful feature of this complete hotel booking APP to help you pick the right hotel.

IRCTC train bookings

Book IRCTC train tickets easily and conveniently using Cleartrip’s train ticket booking mobile app.
-Train travel bookings in India are now simplified with Cleartrip.
- Search for trains that you need. You can quickly book tickets using the railway reservation app with a few clicks and even cancel the booking if your plans change.
-  All major train routes are available on the app. You can easily find trains for your required route.
- Pay for your online bookings through the app. The IRCTC powered app offers a user-friendly railway ticket booking experience.

Cleartrip Activities - discover your city

Cleartrip Activities presents the most comprehensive set of experiences to go out and enjoy when you’re in your city or away travelling. With Activities, we deliver awesome experiences in your city.

- Discover and book amazing experiences & find your passion, be it in your city or on a trip. Go out and do something you love or try something new.
- WonderLa and other theme parks, Harley Davidson rides, scuba diving, kids workshops or food tours, there is something for everyone.
- Enjoy delicious meals at the best restaurants in your city. Be spoilt for choice.
- Know what’s happening in your city. Discover events. Music, comedy, workshops - it’s all here in the Cleartrip travel APP.

Permissions

An explanation of the permissions we seek when you install the Cleartrip app: http://www.cleartrip.com/android-permissions/

Don't forget to rate us on the Play Store and share your feedback.

recentChanges:
Presenting the new search results page in an effort to make the discovery of the hotel of your choice easier than ever.
Filter by star rating and sort by price with just a tap as soon as you think you are lost.

Not sure of the travel dates or is your shortlisted hotel sold out? The enhanced flow on the details page of the hotel of your choice allows you to explore/change dates with just a tap.
comments: Worst application.please do not download clear trip. There is no point in having cancellation option under check refund menu.Before cancellation there is no confirmation pop ip asked which makes the customers to cancel the ticket. Clear trip has refunded only partial amount though I requested them to retain the booking right immediately after cancellation. Please go with make my trip app who supports customer. No star to be given. Stupid UI designing. Please learn from other trip app

Very terrible customer service, while booking the ticket it is very easy through their app but in case if we need any modifications in booking the customer care people will not answer the phone I spend hours by calling to speak with customer care team, If I call 5-10 times then only they are taking phone, this happened twice, I fedd up with cleartrip service I will never do a single booking with cleartrip app, good buy cleartrip

My Money is looted by Cleartrip!! Worst platform to book your tickets. I suggest you to use other platforms which help resolve customer issue quickly. My refund was never paid back to me after calling them multiple times raising my issue nobody responded.

This app is operated by professional robbers they have not refunded the amount even after 15 days of cancellations, where as the airline refunded the aomount on 19-02-2020. beware one should think twice before booking thorough this app
If i could rate it zero stars i would. Keeps on hold for more than 30 minutes on the phone then hangs up! You're better off with skyscanner

title: TravelAce - Smart Trip Planner
description:
Going on vacation and looking to plan a trip? In view of the discontinued Google Trips app (as of 5th Aug 2019), TravelAce is the best alternative for Google Trips users!

TravelAce is an automated travel planning app aimed to transform travel planning into a simplified task. With its unique layout and appealing design, TravelAce helps travel audience to generate travel plans within minutes. These travel plans are intended to make travel planning quicker and with much less headaches of finding places to visit and activities to do. TravelAce comes with a full set of features that equip the traveler enthusiast to plan trips and keep themselves well organized during travelling. All places to be visited are pointed out on maps including route information to arrive at destination.

TravelAce is powered by Google Maps Places information in order to acquire the best travel plan for you from day one to the very last day of your holiday trip. Travel places range from tourist attractions, points of interest, adventure activities, parks, museums, natural attractions and everything else a traveler can do during their trip. Travel plans are fully customizable and highly flexible - you can modify day plans as required. That means you can add places/activities, edit or remove any undesired places or activities. Don't worry about WiFi unavailability or data charges, as all traveling plans can be safely exported in PDF format so they can be accessed offline anytime especially during your vacation.

Besides planning trips, one can also use TravelAce to record the beautiful moments of the trip using the in-built travel journal - take numerous photos, document pleasant visits to museums and natural features, and record geographical locations of every amazing location you step onto.

Here is a summary of the main features covered by the app:

★ Generate Travel Plans using the right tools: Generate Trip, Trip Wizard, Day Trip or Blank Trip*
★ Add, alter, remove places/activities as you please in your travel plans
★ Add Flight/Accommodation information to your trip for quick access
★ 3 view modes for your travel plan - Normal, Map and Day view
★ Fully customizable travel plans to suit the traveler's day plan needs
★ Create a checklist of items so you never forget them behind!
★ Routes information on maps and traveling times
★ Export an entire travel plan or a single day plan for print-ability/offline access*
★ Track your expenditure during your trip, add a budget and never spend a penny more than expected*
★ Popular Destinations Detailed Information to get you inspired
★ 'Nearby Search' is a great tool which comes in really handy in cases where you need to quickly find other nearby places to visit, find shopping outlets, restaurants or perhaps other tourist attractions in a specified location*
★ Travel Destination Information with regards to current weather/climate information, things to do, cost of living and other related information**

* Premium Features (limited usage to non-premium users)
** Partially Free - Subscription required for full access
  
Follow us on Social Media
https://www.facebook.com/travelaceapp

comments: Everything I need for my travel adventures all in one place. I love it. It makes my life so easy

This app is absolute garbage. It won't load anything that uses internet or location, even though I have them both turned on. It also won't let me sign in with Google. This is 100% trash, DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!

BROKEN! I tried to plan my upcoming vacation with this app but once I got to the section to input your flight the screen doesn't scroll down to finish adding information making it unable to useless. I didn't even bother trying to do anything else as any app that doesn't understand basic scrolling is poorly designed. AVOID!

Hopelessly complicated interface. Wanted multi city trip. It seemed to want me to plan each day out without first adding the cities. Tried two different ways, the thing crashed repeatedly and I gave up. Edit. So if I want to visit seven different cities, I need seven different trips? Ludicrous! I took it off due to the crashing, but wouldn't even reinstall it now due to its design.
Nice try, but the UI is just extremely complicated. Also the free version doesn't seem to have a map view, so I can't use it at all to get around in the city.

title: Klook: Travel Activities, Day Trips & Sightseeing
description:
Get HKD10 off select activities on your first purchase with the promo code MOBILE10*!
*Terms & conditions apply

Discover and book amazing things to do at exclusive prices!

Klook is a world-leading activities platform where you can book tickets at the best prices and enjoy savings on day tours, trips, and holidays. Klook provides you a seamless way to discover the best travel activities, amazing tourist attractions, and local experiences around the world!

Plan holidays you’ll love by choosing from a wide selection of fun sightseeing tours, family travel activities, transportation tickets, and captivating shows. With over 200 destinations globally, you’ll never run out of things to do! Browse and explore museums in Hong Kong, take guided tours of London, get Broadway tickets in New York, find local adventures under the sea in Bali, and more!

KLOOK: TOP 5 FEATURES


Browse experiences and activities from all over the world and read real user reviews.
Enjoy exclusive deals for amazing attractions — from sightseeing tours and shows to theme park tickets.
Book tickets safely, securely, and hassle-free with our global credit card and Apple Pay coverage.
Cutting-edge technology for booking rail tickets — travel to your favorite destinations in Japan and Europe without any worries.
Plan holidays and create wonderful new adventures you’ll cherish wherever you are!

Klook will guide you as you plan your holidays, read reviews, and purchase tickets while getting the best savings. Whether it's going to museums and tourist attractions or exploring new cities with sightseeing tours and travel activities, you can turn your holiday into an adventure you’ll never forget!

Try out thousands of experiences, fun travel activities, day trips, guided tours, and shows! Scroll through user reviews and let that guide you toward finding the right experiences just for you. 

Download Klook today and be the first to know about exclusive sightseeing tours, fun day trips, and exciting shows at the best prices! Keep looking and travel more!

comments: Well, I use many apps for travelling but this app is totally different it not only provides you tickets and other stuff in lower price but also tell places to visit and things to do,in the area, loving it
Klook is a very easy app to use. Very convenient. Some times cheaper than the original sites. Also if you are in certain countries such as the UAE, you need a VPN to use this service

My credit card got hacked and it's suspicious that I can no longer access the app immediately after the fraudulent transactions, anyone else experiencing this? The last online transaction I've made with my credit card was with klook.

App allowed me to book activities of the place I'm travelling to which was convenient, but I suggest the app to include tracking status of those bookings e.g. I've booked a simcard which will delivery to me but I can't track it using the app But its still a nice app

Booking is easy, only if updating the activity can be done on the same app. One of my scheduled activity was canceled at 3 days before the scheduled date, however the status of my booking in the app was still shown as "Confirmed" without an indication of it has been canceled. The cancelation notice was send to my email instead. How I wish if the status update can also be made available in the app so that the user experience and expectations can all be managed at one place.

title: Vehicle Trip Logbook Tracker
description:
Make Your life easier by using this app to track trips for personal, business, reimbursement or tax deduction purposes. It's easy to use and makes most of work for you.

TRIPS
* Create trips using GPS tracking. App automatically determines trip distance, travel time, start and end addresses.
* Driving route on the map.
* Dashboard: current speed, elapsed time and distance.
* Create trip entries manually: You can use template trip, copy an existing trip or enter manually all data.
* Add notes to the trips.

AUTOMATIC RECORDING
* Automatic trip start, pause and resume on bluetooth device connect/disconnect events.

LOGBOOK
* Filterable logbook: Filter by vehicle, trip type, trip reason or by predefined/manually defined trip periods.
* Grouping: Group logbook entries by day, week or month. Groups can be expanded/collapsed.
* Automatic determination of gaps between trips.

REPORTS
* Supported formats: PDF, XLS and CSV.
* Designed reports which includes company, driver, car and trips data
* Include reimbursement or fringe benefit amounts to reports
* Choose report period by predefined or manually picked ranges
Note: To use reports functionality You have to make in-app subscription (1 payment per 6 months). But before purchasing, the app offers to see sample reports so You can see if the reports suits for You.

APP PERMISSIONS
* Location: for using GPS.
* Full network access: for getting trip addresses automatically.
* Read/Modify the contents of SD card: for database backup.
* Bluetooth: for automatic recording on bluetooth connect/disconnect events.

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
* English
* Estonian

* Dashboard: current speed, elapsed time and distance.

* Add notes to the trips.

AUTOMATIC RECORDING
* Automatic trip start, pause and resume on bluetooth device connect/disconnect events.

LOGBOOK
* Filterable logbook: Filter by vehicle, trip type, trip reason or by predefined/manually defined trip periods.
* Grouping: Group logbook entries by day, week or month. Groups can be expanded/collapsed.
* Automatic determination of gaps between trips.

REPORTS
* Supported formats: PDF, XLS and CSV.
* Designed reports which includes company, driver, car and trips data
* Include reimbursement or fringe benefit amounts to reports
* Choose report period by predefined or manually picked ranges
Note: To use reports functionality You have to make in-app subscription (1 payment per 6 months). But before purchasing, the app offers to see sample reports so You can see if the reports suits for You.

APP PERMISSIONS
* Location: for using GPS.
* Full network access: for getting trip addresses automatically.
* Read/Modify the contents of SD card: for database backup.
* Bluetooth: for automatic recording on bluetooth connect/disconnect events.

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
* English
* Estonian
summary: GPS mileage tracker for personal, business, tax deduction purposes.
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: I like it. I tried 3 different mileage trackers and this one was the easiest to use. I have it set to start and stop trips manually, which works well for me, because I can immediately designate if this trip is business or personal. If I forget to start or stop a trip, it's very easy to edit. It leaves me in control.

Very well made, and easy to use. Needed it for work trips. Tried several overdeveloped applications, but this one just/only did what I needed: - Automatically starts trip based on Bluetooth connection - Easy to switch trips between business and private - Ability to export (needed subscription). - Recognized stored places and adjusted private/business notation based on stored places automatically. Possible improvements: - Export is in a old excel version, please update to latest version. - Issue with odometer. Sometimes I used the bike to travel. Cannot turn off odometer registration or switch between vehicles. Just ignored this registration because i just needed the traveled distance.
It's been great so far. Automatically starts when my phone connects to the bluetooth in my car.
It's ok but not 100 percent reliable. I find I have to make a few manual edits to correct entries.
Really good app but need to check for auto start. Sometimes it doesn't log due to poor GPS signal.

title: Pin Your Trip: Travel Planner & Wikivoyage guide
description:
Imagine Wikivoyage guides combined with a travel planner. It enhances the great source of travel knowledge on Wikivoyage with awesome additional features.

Developed by a traveler for travelers
During my year long world trip, I missed an app with my requirements as a backpacker. This app is especially useful for independent travelers who want to research and plan their own unique trips.

Easy concept
Start in any country or more than 14.000 cities and read and explore the plenty of information and guides provided. The second step is to pin your favorite places from the guides and create your itinerary, schedule and budget. The travel planner will assist you here. Last step is to enjoy and follow your itinerary on the provided map.

No log in, No personal data, No unecessary permissions
Your travel plans are the focus

In the spirit of backpacking
As a backpacker your trip plans progresses with your travel. Start your plan as a bucket list but go into as much detail as you want as your trip continues.

Offline Wikivoyage guides
Read all guides from Wikivoyage in a mobile friendly way. Take places directly from the guides into your travel itinerary as you read them. And everything also offline.

Interactive map
See all guides and places from Wikivoyage on an interactive map based on OpenStreetMap, so you can easily find not well known travel gems around you. Also track your itinerary, schedule and places on the map. 

Community based
Not only Wikivoyage and OpenStreetMap allows you to share your travel knowledge but also the internal recommendations system is based on how much a place has been pinned by other users. Share your trips with friends or fellow travelers via WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and many more.

recentChanges:
The long missing feature to filter the city places by type is here. You can now filter the places by all museums for example.

The next step will be:
- Got some ideas to make trips to regions possible. I will try some things in the next time
comments: This app looks really nice! Very easy to use, lots of features and good information about sights and cities. But it's still not really useful for day plans: 1) there's no option to sort the places automatically by distance from each other, so the "route" view in the map is totally chaotic with lines going upside in all directions 2) there is no way to see the "real" route from one place to the next on, there are just straight lines. 3) no saved places from Google maps. Can you somehow show them?

The app is about 80% to a good trip-planning app. It lacks a few features, but mostly only little things. The major issue I have with it is that it only allows national or city-wide plans. States, regions, provinces, etc. should be included, too. Some nations, like the US or China, are too big to see in a single trip, and others that serious travelers usually only focus on one region at a time (France and Greece spring to mind). Please add in-between planning abilities!
If you like be annoyed by advertising than install this app!
Absolute garbage. Lost my entire itinerary after an update. Worst travel app I can imagine.

Nice travel planner. Easy to use with drag and drop. I plan on country, city and daily level and this app allows me to do so. I also get country insights straight from Wikivoyage. Sharing the trip with friends makes it easier to talk about without writing down everything. Cool end to end planning that lots of other apps lack. I planned my Canada, Morocco and Germany trip with it and will continue to do so. Plus, the app doesn't require unnecessary or loads of privacy permissions! Can't beat!

title: TripFiles - Trip Advisor for Trusted Friends
description:
A travel app that lets you explore amazing destinations, treasure your own experiences, and share them safely with friends and family.  A trip advisor for trusted friends.

• Collect travel photos and videos and organize them by trip.
• Post your experiences in real-time or all at once when you are safely back home.
• Check into locations so that you can remember where you've been and the activities that you've enjoyed.
• Review places and let your friends know what you really think of the places.
• Connect with friends, family or share with only specific people.
• See where your friends are going.
• Find interesting things near by when you are traveling.
• Get inspired by others' adventures.
A trip Advisor for trusted friends

Looking for something but not sure exactly what - search broadly and use tripFiles filtering tech to find your perfect something.

tripFiles - trip advice from people you trust. Your personal trip advisor!
comments: This is the best app I have on my phone, very useful to me, the only problem is that I cannot find it in Google Play and when I lose it I find it in internet by searching Google
Seems a good app for travellers like me who want to journal our adventures. However, when making notes, it doesn't allow to make new paragraphs to look organise.
Great app which would be a 5 star but keeps having errors so wasting time. A pain putting on information then it says 'oops, something wrong'

Can I link this app with my TripAdvisor account? I cannot login with my TA account. Cannot upload directly from Google Photos, so failed to create even a single trip. Linking with FB personal albums would also be helpful.
Very bad app. Pop up and effect mobile uses. Pop up hundred times.

title: Visit A City
description:
Planning your trip should be simple and fun with Visit A City App.
It’s free and it works offline.

You’ll be getting:

* Free access to 1000+ travel guides created by experts.

* Access to your plans and maps online and offline.

* Easy navigation between the locations based on your personal plan.

* Detailed guides which will help you find what to see and what to do.

Try it out, we guarantee this is one App you will surely enjoy.

Planning your trip should be simple and fun with Visit A City App.

summary: Planning your trip should be simple and fun with Visit A City App.
recentChanges:
-Complete guides to over 1000 cities around the world!
-Purchase Tours & Tickets using the App!
-All guides are available online and offline
-Up-to-date opening hours
-Easy navigation
-Much more
comments: On the surface this app looks great. I planned my itineraries, but didn't book anything with the app. However, once I got to my destination I found out almost all the information was wrong. It couldn't pinpoint my location (I have an international plan) and instead of informing me of that, it would just show me in a wrong location. I couldn't adjust it either. Then every single one of the times to get from place to place was wrong. This app ended up being a huge disappointment.

Visit A City is an extremely useful app for trip planning. The #1 feature is its ability to automatically arrange stops by proximity to limit the extra walking back and forth. It allows you to make your own by highlighting what you want to see but also has suggest itineraries for a number of different days and styles.

Make your experience visiting a new city organized and easy. You can be militant with your schedule, or as care free as you want. Customization is good. I would give it a 5 if through the customization it would also help optimize your walking path.
I've been using this app for my trips. I really like the options they give you depending on the length of your stay. The idea of being able to change times and places is very smart.

Very handy app! I've loved using it so far. The only thing I would say is when moving an activity from one day to a different day according to personal choice, it would be useful for the app to rearrange the other activities in terms of travel to and from it, as it does that in the first place, as I then struggled to rearrange the day to make most sense. Other than that, very useful app! Would recommend.

title: Hotels.com: Book hotels, vacation rentals and more
description:
Love to travel? From cheap hotels to vacation rentals, Hotels.com has the best travel app to book your summer vacation resort, business trip hotel, or last minute room for tonight. 

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book vacation rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and, yes, hotels - from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Search and compare travel deals and hotel prices before making your reservation 
• Make a reservation and book your travel in a few easy taps

GET LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS 
• Get instant savings on reservations with Secret Prices
• Save 5%* on selected hotel bookings and vacation rentals when you book on the app with code MOB5 
• Traveling tonight? Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales on your last minute holiday escapes
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WHEN BOOKING WITH HOTELS.COM
• Collect 10 nights and get 1 reward night** with Hotels.com® Rewards
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more

EASY RESERVATION & BOOKING
• Save payment details for fast booking on your next trip 
• Get instant notifications to confirm your booking

AND MORE ON TRIP
• Manage your booking and reservation details, even offline 
• Plan your upcoming trip or vacation with in-app Travel Guides   

**The maximum value of your reward night is the average daily rate of your ten nights. Your reward night does not include taxes and fees. 

*MOB5 T&Cs: Enter coupon to get 5% off your booking at a participating Best Price Guarantee hotel when you book your holiday on the Hotels.com app. You can’t collect or redeem Rewards nights when you use this coupon. You must pay for your stay when you make the reservation. This coupon can’t be used for package bookings / reservations (e.g. with flights). Go to http://www.hotels.com/page/hotel-exclusions/ for a list of non-participating hotels. There’s a limit of one coupon per booking. It can be combined with discounted prices on Hotels.com but cannot be used with any other promotion on Hotels.com. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) and all bookings are subject to availability. Hotels.com is the promoter of this offer. 

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Hotels.com!

If you love to travel, you'll love our app. We're working hard to make the Hotels.com app the most rewarding place to book a stay. This update includes performance enhancements and bug fixes—so it's even easier to find the perfect place to stay for your next trip.
comments: I know there is the Covid-19 virus going around, and of course the phones are busy, but why doesn't the app or the website let me cancel online? I have been trying since 8 am and I keep getting this error message: This is a new reservation and is currently in progress, please try again after 30 minutes if you wish to cancel. I made this reservation 2 weeks ago. It's now 4 pm and I have until 6 pm or the hotel charges me, non refundable. Fun? No. Can I give 0 stars?

The actual act of reserving rooms at a later date is not as intuitive as it could be. A nice bright button on the home page after signing onto the app would be great, BOOK ANOTHER? Having said that, the app keeps me logged in, so that may be a problem. There's no readily identifiable way to delete mail after having read it.

Got stuck in the cold after they took money for a reservation. 20 minutes on the phone asking where my confirmation is if the money was held only to be told that the system was "updating". On a Saturday night, it was "updating". Not enough to completely shut down the app or website, just enough so that it places a hold on your money while leaving you out in the cold waiting for a confirmation or support to answer your call

This site has the worst useless outsourced customer service and lately I've had nothing but screw ups on their end with bookings. After paying much more due to errors they will not fix on their end with room type and billing, I am uninstalling this app. If you have a problem with your booking (and there's a good chance you will using this app) you'll spend an hour talking to a rep in another country who will tell you how they cannot fix the problem. Also you get worst rooms (handicap, no view)

I've been a long time, regular user of this app/site. I booked a room 2 months ago for a room in a month from now. It was non-refundable but that was before COVID-19 & the closure of the border. I'm self-employed & am now out of work. The money I used to booked a room I am definitely NOT going to use due to a closed border should be returned to me as I clearly had nothing to do with travel restrictions. I can't get anyone on the phone or via web chat. How do I get my money back..?

comments: My clients have given me positive feedback on the app (used to be called Go Site See). It's a good way to keep all travel documents, confirmations, etc. organized with their specific itineraries.
loved it. thanks!!

I installed this and nothing happen did the email and password and nothing after waiting for it to show what was on the screen fix and I will rate it a better score have to find another one that actually work.
waste

title: Track My Trip - GPS Tracking & Online Sharing
description:
The Track My Trip GPS tracker supports tracking of trips and personal points of interest (POI) with high accuracy based on GPS loacations. Photos captured by camera or taken from gallery can be attached to interesting locations. Tracked information can be easily shared online in real-time as well as via social media like WhatsApp or Facebook and via email. Your current location or trip can be shared with friends and family in real-time. Only invited people have access to shared information. Invitations can be sent via email or WhatsApp. You can even share Points of Interests with attached photos.

Features of the Track My Trip GPS Tracker 
• Recording based on GPS locations
• Display trips on map (Google Maps or Open Street Maps - OSM)
• Photos captured by camera or taken from gallery can be attached to interesting locations (Points of Interest) 
• Calculates trip statistics based on recorded GPS tracks (e.g. max/average speed, moving time)
• Various unit systems are supported (metric, imperial, nautical)
• Online sharing of locations and trips with friends and family in real-time.
• Recorded trip information can be shared on WhatsApp and Facebook or via email
• Recording of trips even if application is in the background
• Offline support for Open Street Maps overlays

Visualization of GPS Tracks 
• Browse through available tracks (recorded or imported) and display them on a Google map
• Display defined Points of Interest on map and show attached photos in an info-window
• Display of elevation and speed charts for recorded trips

Import and Export of GPS Tracks 
• Import GPS tracks from Google Drive folder or from local SD card
• Export GPS tracks to Google Drive folder or to local SD card
• Support various file formats for GPS tracks (GPX, KML, KMZ, CSV)
• Export of photos to Google Drive
• Geo-Exif tags (GPS location) can be assigned during export of photos to Google Drive
• Track simplification (reduction of tracked GPS locations) without compromising the overall geometrical GPS track quality

The Track My Trip website provides additional information: 
     http://neocor6.com

Bug reports, support, questions and feature requests can be submitted via contact form or our forums:
    http://neocor6.com/

comments: It is a very good app, works in flight also, but slow updation. Once in a flight it recorded full trip from Nagpur to Delhi but at the time of saving it suddenly saved only about 10% of the track. Don't know what happened, pl improve updation of data like distance, height speed etc during recordings.
It's super useful and great at tracking your ride, but it's extremely annoying that you can't scroll the map without it resetting back to the original current position you're in on the map.
Good useful Apps, is what I wanted track exactly my route or when I not picking any passenger, can find out my wasted trip travelled. FONT NUMBER for building Blk number should be bigger by 3 times.
That polygon lines are not exactly fitting on the roads .that is the only issue
Great and able to tell difference between driving and running and walking

title: Lambus | Travel Planner
description:
Lambus is your new All-in-One travel app: Everything you need for your next trip combined in one platform. Manage expenses, waypoints, travel documents, photos and more of your trip with Lambus. We assist you before, during and after your trip, so you focus on having a great time during your travels! Plan either alone or together - Lambus works either way!

# Plan your next adventure

So much world. So little time. That's why it's important to not spend unnecessary time on complicated route planning. Fina new waypoints and nearby places and add them to your route - route planning has never been so easy. Or just let us inspire you to new goals!

# Import your itinerary

Planning a hiking / bicycle / motorcycle trip? Import your detailed .gpx route into Lambus easily and it will be available for everyone in your trip. Alternatively, plan a new itinerary!

# Bring order to the travel documents

No more confusing lists, tables and missing e-mails. Collect your travel documents in one place only: Lambus! This way, all fellow travelers can access it at any time - even offline!

# Expenses: Having an eye on your private and shared expenses

With Lambus you simply keep track of your expenses, even in the group. The best part: We also do the cost-splitting for you and you can even balance your costs within the app!

# Manage your private and shared notes

Regardless of whether you want to share your Airbnb PIN code with your group or just manage your passport number securely: Lambus is able to satisfy your needs.

# Get inspired

Be inspired by our curated trips, e.g. "West Coast USA Tour" or "Thailand May 2020" and many more!

summary: Manage expenses, waypoints, travel documents, photos and notes within one app!
recentChanges:
• Select past dates when creating trips and waypoints. This was requested many times so far and we listened!
• Import not only whole trips from "Google My Places" but also single waypoints from "Google Maps". Just hit "Share" from the waypoint you want to import and select Lambus in the list of apps. We take take of the rest!
• Minor updates on the COVID-19 (Corona) warning. Please stay save during this crisis!
comments: So far so good in pre planning stage. However, when adding waypoint I wished there's an option that prompt us that we have added 'the place' before and if we like to add again. I now unfortunately have to delete each one that I double save as way point. Also, it would be nice to be able to add option to categorise our waypoint for example by country. And also if the name of the country can come below the city's name. We are not all familiar with these places.

The invitation flow is bad.. The link I got told me to open the app, hit the + button and put in the code. No link to the app on that page, no deep linking to just auto handle adding the trip. Some really low hanging fruit that would make the initial experience wayyyy better. After I downloaded the app manually, there was no plus sign fab until she had already added me manually to the trip by username, then the fab appeared. Overall beautiful design though! I really want this app to improve! :)
Exactly what I've been looking for! This is a fantastic app that will allow you to simply plan every detail of your vacation.
Such an amazing app to help set things up with a group of friends! Makes things so much easier
Awesome app, easy to use with great and helpful feature!

title: ﻿Skyscanner – cheap flights, hotels and car rental
description:
Get inspiration, and plan and book your whole trip—we're here to make it all super easy, wherever you are. Join 90+ million others who use us to find the best flight prices and awesome hotel discounts. Here, you can explore everything the travel industry has to offer. And there are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the best prices.

* BOOK YOUR WHOLE TRIP
Yes, you can. Get where you want to go, stay where you want to stay, and get lots of suggestions on what to do while you’re there—based on other travelers’ reviews.

* FIND THE BEST VALUE FLIGHTS
Search and compare hundreds of flights all in one place. Find the cheapest months and dates to fly, using our color-coded calendar and chart views when you enter your travel dates. Not ready to book right now? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when it changes.

* GET THE RIGHT HOTEL
Thought we were just about flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare great deals from thousands of hotels, resorts, apartments, and hostels all over the world. Or, find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute deal.

* RENT A CAR
Choose where and when to pick up your car rental, and we’ll show you the deals. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type, and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure that you’re not paying too much for fuel—we’ve got your back.

* NO ADDED FEES, EVER
Did we mention that we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all.

* FIND INSPIRATION
Itching to travel, but no idea where to go? We’ve got you covered. Tap “Explore” to check out our inspirational destinations with the best deals. And read reviews from other like-minded travelers so that you know you won’t be disappointed.

* CUSTOMIZE YOUR SEARCH
Know what you’re looking for? Filter your flight search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure times, and arrival times. Easy.

* SAVE YOUR FLIGHTS
Want to look, but not ready to book? No problem. We have a “saved flights” setting that allows you to “star” a flight you like. Then it’ll show up on your home screen, so you can pick up where you left off.

* BROWSE RECENT SEARCHES
Pick up where you left off. Your recent travel searches will be right there on your home screen when you next open the app.

Enjoy!

Edinburgh EH3 9EN.

comments: Skyscanner used to be great. Now it's very slow. Also if I search for fights with 2 adults and 2 children to somewhere that is not a listed destination, it then goes to a new screen where I have to select flights, again, and it forgets that is for 2 adults and 2 children and finds flights for a single traveler. Even if you click on a selection you can't add note passengers and redo the search.

So i have a new phone... When you first install the app, you don't get that screen on first use. You are offered the opportunity to set up an account (which i skipped) then you get a "where do you want to go" screen with no option to tap search, then flights. Only by closing the app and reopening does dialog as you describe it get presented. Maybe you need to rethink the after install use cases?

Terrible app on a mobile phone, text overlapping and filtering is hard to navigate, especially when trying to look at monthly flights. Overall very poor in comparison to the actual website. The whole app GUI needs completely overhauled. Uninstalled & now using the website. Also, judging by other reviews, Skyscanner aren't listening to customers.

Privacy problems. No matter what I do, turn off all location settings and this app can override and figure out the country I'm in. While this is a privacy concern, the third party search results remain in the wrong currency and language despite setting them in the Skyscanner app's preferences. Uninstalled.

I was just told month view available by tapping the dates box? To clarify I was looking for the "anytime in a particular (April) month / whole Month" option as offered in the browser version? Thanks for your explanation I'd already seen the graph view didn't realise it was a replacement.

title: Treya: Itinerary, Travel Planner & Trip Expenses
description:
When research in Treya, you can easily :
📌Find favorites vacation spots, restaurant, and accommodation recommendation from local travel influencers
📌Find the best route and transportation to reach your travel destination on each itinerary
📌Creating your travel profile and share it across the platform
📌Earn money from traveling (coming soon)


When plan trip in Treya, you can easily :
✔️Customize your unique itinerary and create an automated travel plan based on places you want to visit 
✔️Copy other's people itinerary (or even from famous travel influencers) and personalize it to your travel style 
✔️Share your travel plan to family and friends through social media, email, etc
✔️Attach your travel documents inside your itinerary (flight tickets, photos, hotel book docs, etc)
✔️Calculate your travel budget by using our cost estimation feature
✔️Invite your travel buddies (coming soon)
✔️Collaborate with travel buddies to create the most suitable travel plan together (coming soon)

Want to go on a holiday but without the hassle of planning? Treya is a complete travel planner and itinerary application for all who want to plan their trip seamlessly! 

Do you ever have trouble creating the perfect itinerary for your holiday? Ever wish that you can just copy someone else’s itinerary and make it your own? Now with Treya’s new “PLAN ITINERARY” feature, you can do just that!

Now, you can easily find holiday inspirations from itineraries that were made by experts or influencers within their fields. If you love food, look for a food blogger’s itinerary! If shopping is your thing, just copy a fashion influencer’s itinerary in the city of your choice! The possibilities are endless because we have a wide range of itineraries based on cities and interests that were made by experts that you can copy from!

For those who would like to skip all the hassle but with an affordable price, then an Open Trip is the solution for you. You will embark on a trip with other travelers and explore a certain destination together. All of your basic needs during the trip will already be provided by the Trip Organizer, so you just need to enjoy the fun and scenery of the trip. Tour Package also perfect for those who are looking for new travel buddies to go on your holidays!

The tour package has two types. If Open Trips are open for public, then Private Trips are only open for those who are in your group. Here you can ask for any specific requests regarding destinations and special needs directly to the Trip Organizer. Just directly chat with these Organizers and mention your preferences. There are hundreds of Travel Organizers in Treya so you can just pick the one that is most suitable for you. Any kind of transaction is guaranteed to be safe and reliable through Treya!

What's new?

We fight some bugs for you!


Find bugs? Help us be better! You can report any inconvenience in our app to bug.report@treya.io.
comments: Good apps. However, how to change the currency? Is it fixed for IDR currency? One more thing, can we adjust the itinerary? Like the one when you long press, you can move the activity down and up.

It is funny because you cannot actually create a future plan. The date strings are locked onto today. For example today is 16 Feb and you want to create a plan for your trip on 21? Nah this app wont let you do so
Can't even create an itinerary. Just a blank page is showing
good apps for travel planning and reccomendation. It also has automatic plan for itinerary for those who still dont know where to go at their holiday
At 1st i thought it was a good app to help planning holiday, but after i saved my itinerary, and wanna edit it, the apps always forced to close, also when i want to add location. It sucks :(

title: Trip Assist
description:
This app has been designed exclusively for employees of Travelport. Once registered, simply login to the app with your corporate email address. From real time trip alerts, directions
to your hotel or simply calling your travel support at the touch of a button it’s time take control of your travel experience with Trip Assist, the itinerary management app to manage it all.
Here are just some of the ways Trip Assist can make your business travel more efficient:
ALL OF YOUR TRIPS, ALL OF THE TIME
Offline and online access to your Travelport trips wherever and whenever you want
Scroll through upcoming and past business trips to quickly view your travel details
No more paper. No more searching for email confirmations. Everything you need, all in one itinerary management app
TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE
Stay on top of your Travelport trips with detailed segments for your flight, hotel, car hire, rail and ground transfer bookings
Maps, confirmation numbers, gate and terminal info, contact details, corporate travel support and much much more are now in the palm of your hand
STAY IN THE KNOW, EVERY TRIP
All past notifications and updates will be saved in the Messages inbox
Delays, cancellations, check-in reminders and more are all pushed automatically to Trip Assist
Real-time updates throughout your trips
SUPPORT ON THE MOVE
Say goodbye to searching for agent phone numbers, call support at the touch of a button
Manage your Travelport business travel wherever you are



ABOUT TRAVELPORT
Travelport website http://digital.travelport.com/
