It couldn't post trips booked on American Airlines.
Excellent App pull all my trips in very happy so far.

title: Viator Tours & Activities
description:
Discover and book travel activities wherever you go.

Viator, a TripAdvisor company, is the world leader in offering amazing tours, activities, and travel experiences around the world. Discover and book unforgettable things to do—anytime, anywhere—with our app.

Make the most of every trip with instant access to:
●    200,000+ bookable experiences
●    Skip-the-line access and mobile tickets
●    Millions of trusted traveler reviews

Whether you’re planning a trip to Paris, Tokyo, or anywhere else in the world, we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.
descriptionHTML:
Discover and book travel activities wherever you go.

Viator, a TripAdvisor company, is the world leader in offering amazing tours, activities, and travel experiences around the world. Discover and book unforgettable things to do—anytime, anywhere—with our app.

Make the most of every trip with instant access to:
● 200,000+ bookable experiences
● Skip-the-line access and mobile tickets

Whether you’re planning a trip to Paris, Tokyo, or anywhere else in the world, we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.
summary: Travel Deals & Booking
recentChanges: This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Good options to travel and explore. Updated information about tourist places is a good feature of this website.

Love the 3.9.5 version of the app, it gives all of the same info as the website with a great layout. All of the updates are trash. You're best bet is to get the apk of the previous version of the app, otherwise searching for tours on your phone will not be worth it. Oh yeah, and the tours I've booked have gone well, this is just a review of the app.

While all the tickets I bought for Italy worked, it's really annoying that I cannot see the full itinerary on the mobile version and will still need to redirect myself to the web version to fully read up on the tour before I book.

No way to get mobile tickets on iOS or android. In addition, I tried reviewing the tours I took and the app refused to post my review, telling me to try later, then my review is gone and have to type it again. After two trials I have app. One of the worst apps out there!

Sorry to give low rating.... I love Viator, BUT this app is severely lacking... 1) you can search by location OR keyword, not both. If your trip is on Hawaii, and you want to go paragliding, you have to scroll through paragliding in dozens of other places first 2) can't add things to wishlist 3) wishlist can't be divided (e.g. by location when planning multiple trips) 4) setting date of travel should auto populate check availability, yet the ca keeps going to "tomorrow" Just a few major things..

title: Pickyourtrail – Trip Planning Tool
description:
It's time to unwrap the world!

Happiness - that is travel for us. When you use Pickyourtrail to create, customise and book international trips, great care goes into replicating the adrenalin rush and sense of control over self-planning. Our aim is to help folks discover the magic of travel through the logic of tech.

We ensure that technology does all the heavy lifting - right from personalization, curation, booking, reminders to on trip recommendations. Additionally, our trip planning tool also gives you real-time flight status updates, live trip concierge, suggestions on the best food to try out and shopping options to explore. Travel stress-free with our exclusive guides, access  your crucial vouchers and much more -  all of this to give you that hassle-free trip that you worked so hard year long. So what are you waiting for? Go ahead, and unwrap the world.

What makes us awesome?

Trip Feed - Your personal AI assistant
An AI-powered feed to get smart travel tips & other essentials to enhance your on-trip travel experience.

Personalisation engine because it’s your vacation!
Your vacation, your way!  Algorithmically generated travel itineraries based on the interests you pick.

Solving the holy trinity - Time, Cost and Route
Our RMax algorithm uses past data, future pricing and data from over 450 suppliers to suggest the most ideal connection keeping in mind - travel costs, time and intercity connections.

Kitna Deta hai - Price Discovery
Let our price discovery engine find out the best possible online price for you! Give the Trivago guy his much-needed break!

One-Click Booking
As hassle-free as hassle-free can be. Book every line item with just one click. Get instant confirmation and vouchers!

Don’t search for your vouches, ever!
Tired of searching for your vouchers from emails? Stop searching, start travelling. Access all your trip vouchers in one single place!

Your vacation matters to us!
Brace yourself for a hassle-free vacation. Our destination experts will provide live trip concierge during every turn of your travel. We are healthy stalkers, just saying!

Winter is coming? Are you sure?
It’s pouring hard out there and it just occurred to you that you didn’t pack your umbrella? Well, not anymore, you’ll have the weather data right at your fingertips!

Handy Bundle of Tools

• Hola Amigos or Bonjour Les Amis ? - A handy translation app to ensure language barriers are no longer a hurdle
• Money! Money! Money! - Currency converter to calculate the exchange rates in different countries.
• We bet you didn’t know that fact - Read on travel guides to widen your destination knowledge
• Why pack everything? - Packing checklist to help you pack only the essentials

Popular Destinations

Experience the magnificent sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:

• New Zealand – Explore the beauty of fjords and find out the mystery behind the Waitomo Glowworm Caves.
• France – Find your happiness in some of the best culinary tours and museums
• Spain – Discover the attractions with guided walking tours
• Singapore - Get exposed to the magic of Merlion and beyond

Customizable itineraries, travel consultant's support and easy booking options – Ready to unwrap a hassle-free vacation? Download our Pickyourtrail app to discover the benefits of having us as your travel companion. 

We are constantly improving our services and we would be happy to receive any suggestions or feedback at help@pickyourtrail.com.

comments: Amazing app! We had immediate responses from the support team through the app and easy access to all our all our documents!
Had a very smooth vaction using this. Travel checklist and support are the best features.
Wonderful app. Easy and intuitive to use. Will definitely be planning a lot of vacations using this app.
Great service! Also the app is pretty easy to use. Keep up the good work.
I had an amazing trip planned by PYT. Ground breaking and innovative app based concept. Wishes for you to grow higher and higher

title: Puget Sound Trip Planner
description:
Plan your transit trip, find your best stops, and see your next departures no matter where you are in the Puget Sound region, or where you want to go. The Puget Sound Trip Planner app does it all and more. It works with all modes of public transportation – bus, train, light rail, streetcar, ferry, water taxi and the monorail. And, it includes a combination of features not found in any other trip planner. 

Its unique blending of regional trip planning with real-time arrivals lets you navigate the whole region while you’re on the go. Plus, it has all the information and details about your trips – complete route schedules, helpful maps, new ways to customize your trips, service alerts, fares, walking distances and much, much more.    

Whether getting around Seattle, or commuting from Everett, Olympia or Issaquah, the Puget Sound Trip Planner makes the best use of your time and energy. Get this free app for your Android today. 

FEATURES

The Puget Sound Trip Planner app includes data from the following transit agencies:
 
• King County Metro Transit
• Sound Transit
• Pierce Transit
• Community Transit
• Everett Transit
• Intercity Transit
• King County Water Taxi
• Snoqualmie Valley Transportation
• Seattle Streetcar
• Monorail
• Washington State Ferries

Trip Planning:

• Cross agency, regional trip planning
• Fully customizable trip plan preferences, including transportation mode, walking distance and more
• Plan trips using popular landmarks, addresses or your own contacts
• Full trip itineraries with fare information, actual walking distance, and map view
•  List of recent trip plans

Route Schedules:

• Access to scheduled times for all transit agencies in the region
• Create Point-to-Point schedules within a route
• Map based route traces
• Filter by Agency
• Search by route or headway sign

Next Departures:

• Find Next Departures using stop number, address or landmarks
• Estimated (Est) real time departure times available for all Metro and Metro-operated Sound Transit bus service
• Provides scheduled (Sch) departure times for all agencies at a customer selected stop
• Map and List view of Nearby Stops
• Map based vehicle location for those routes where estimated times are available
• List of recent stops

Alerts:

• List of all regional agencies with links to their individual alerts web page

Favorites:

• Save your favorite locations for use in Trip Planning or Next Departures

Info:

• A contact directory of all regional transit agencies with links to their website, customer service phone number and email address

Send Feedback:

• In-app email form for reporting app related comments or suggestions to King County Metro Transit

• Save your favorite locations for use in Trip Planning or Next Departures

Info:

• A contact directory of all regional transit agencies with links to their website, customer service phone number and email address

Send Feedback:

• In-app email form for reporting app related comments or suggestions to King County Metro Transit
summary: Plan trips, see real-time arrivals and find stops for Puget Sound area transit.
recentChanges: Cumulative fixes
comments: This app is useless if you're tryijg to track a King County Metro bus. They only update the est. arrival time after the bus is already late and always by 2-4 minutes. If the bus is late they add 2 minutes, if it misses that they add 2 more minutes, until it actually arrives. The bus can be 30 minutes late and it just keeps telling you 2 minutes. Incredibly useless, especially considering that their busses are never ontime to begin with.
Absolutely sucks. The one redeeming feature is that it shows some options that Gmaps doesn't (and doesn't show some options Gmaps does). Imo, should only be used in conjunction with OneBusAway.

Lately this app has been useless. I try to use the trip planner to go from one address (my work) to another (home) and the plan trip button is greyed out. I close and restart the app and have to enter the addresses all over again. If it starts working as expected, attempting to view the trip on the map crashes the program. This is especially frustrating when one is en-route and the app doesn't remember the last trip. Major debugging needed.

The planner gives good information on all modes of public transpotation unless there are planned reroutes or alerts.As I write this review, there is a parade rerouting at least 5 routes. None of them show an alert with this app. You have to use multiple websites to make make this app accurate or expect to be late to work. Fix the alert and my rating goes to at least 4 stars.

Samsung OS Update Crashes App It used to be useable for me, but once I accepted the recent Samsung software update I no longer am able to even open the app. This isn't the Trip Planner App Devs' fault so much as it is Samsung's. That said, whoever manages the app should make an update. This effects many commuters like myself who use buses to get to work. I do not wish for I or others to have their work or appointments hindered by lacking a reliable bus schedule and route to their destination.

title: Travel Budget - Track Expenses with TravelSpend
description:
TravelSpend makes it incredibly easy to keep track of your travel expenses and manage your budget. It's a free and well designed app packed with useful features for travelers.

Made for travelers 🌍
Specifically designed for travelers. No internet connection required.

Stick to your budget 💰
The app will help you keep track of your travel budget and your expenses.

Don't worry about currencies 💱
You can add expenses in any currency. They will automatically be converted to your home currency.

Gain insights from your spending 📊
Your spending data will be visualized. You'll be able to analyze your spending so you can stick to your budget.

Track costs with fellow travelers 👫  (Premium feature)
Share trips with fellow travelers to keep track of your expenses together and split costs.

Export your data 🗄 (Premium feature)
You can export your spending data to a csv file at any time.
descriptionHTML:

summary: Keep track of your travel budget 🌍
recentChanges:
We fixed a small issue that sometimes caused amounts in certain currencies to display incorrectly. 💱
Any questions or problems? Email us: info@travel-spend.com
comments: Very good app, but missing one feature. There isn't cost split option if you are travelling not alone. For example, traveller 1 paid for meal for himself, traveller 2 and 3, while traveller 4 was not eating. It is really good app and I use it all the time, since most of the time I travel alone, but if I have someone else with me - I need to use different app. One day when you fix it - you will be the best in the market :)

Used it to track my expense for my New York trip last Christmas and it was very easy to use and helped a lot in terms of keeping me on budget. My only dislike is not being able to export the data unless a premium member. Nonetheless a great app highly recommend if you're travelling on a tight budget or you just wanna see how you spent money

I am using the paid version of this and have found it useful, but one thing is frustrating me. I added a category and want to change the icon assigned, but can find no way to do that, or even delete the category I added and re-add it correctly. UPDATE: Thank you very much for your prompt reply. I'm sorry I am so late in letting you know that your suggestion worked perfectly and I have updated my rating from 4 to 5 stars!

I loved using this app to track my spending while travelling. It is easy to use and puts the money in different categories and then allows you to view the break down of your spending. It really makes me accountable when spending abroad and has helped me save money. I love that you can make new trips and set a total budget that automatically sets a daily budget that is then attainable. The free version does have some pop up ads but well worth it to have such a great app for free! Highly recommend

Great App. I am using their free version. And I am 100% satisfied with this app. I make positive impact. And if you are a budget traveller then it is best app for you. To write your day to day expenses. Automatic total calculation helps to find your average daily expense.

title: Trip Planner
description:
Trip Planner app allows users to plan their trips (personal or business). A one-stop shop for trip planning activities. Users can share the trip summary data via email, other sharing apps or upload it on Google Drive. Every aspect of a trip is covered in this app. 

This app has following functions -  

⦁	Trip List: Current, Old and Archived trip listing.

⦁	Trip Detail: Different functions like Trip mode, stay, activity, trivia, to-do, mate, expense, route, odometer, google docs and summary where user can view or define trip details after tapping listed trip. Trip details screen would show the tiles of these functions.

⦁	Settings: Set app configurations as per requirement.

⦁	Help: Help is available for every function of this app. Click '?' to view relevant help screen.
descriptionHTML:
Trip Planner app allows users to plan their trips (personal or business). A one-stop shop for trip planning activities. Users can share the trip summary data via email, other sharing apps or upload it on Google Drive. Every aspect of a trip is covered in this app.

This app has following functions -

⦁ Trip List: Current, Old and Archived trip listing.

⦁ Trip Detail: Different functions like Trip mode, stay, activity, trivia, to-do, mate, expense, route, odometer, google docs and summary where user can view or define trip details after tapping listed trip. Trip details screen would show the tiles of these functions.

⦁ Settings: Set app configurations as per requirement.

⦁ Help: Help is available for every function of this app. Click '?' to view relevant help screen.
summary: Trip Planner app allows users to plan their trips (personal or business).
recentChanges: Allowed Flexible dates for different time zones - Removed conditions that Trip End Date and Trip Mode Arrival Date should be after Trip Start Date and Trip Mode Departure Date respectively.
comments: I like the overall theme of the app, but the listings aren't always in chronological order so it can get confusing. I would also prefer a calender input for setting the date.
Decent replacement for Google Trips...would like fre form option for transport mode as I use ferrys often..now masquerading as cruises!

overall good application. when dates and time entered for different time zones, it changes orginal time marked. Keep option to click photos of tickets, visa, hotel booking confirmation etc. for handy reference.
looks like an awesome app for business or for budgeting a vacation- looking up info as you go. i wanted to plan a road trip. still searching for the right app.
there's actually potential here but the user in interface is just bad

title: Viator Tours & Activities
description:
Discover and book travel activities wherever you go.

Viator, a TripAdvisor company, is the world leader in offering amazing tours, activities, and travel experiences around the world. Discover and book unforgettable things to do—anytime, anywhere—with our app.

Make the most of every trip with instant access to:
●    200,000+ bookable experiences
●    Skip-the-line access and mobile tickets
●    Millions of trusted traveler reviews

Whether you’re planning a trip to Paris, Tokyo, or anywhere else in the world, we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.
descriptionHTML:
Discover and book travel activities wherever you go.

Viator, a TripAdvisor company, is the world leader in offering amazing tours, activities, and travel experiences around the world. Discover and book unforgettable things to do—anytime, anywhere—with our app.

Make the most of every trip with instant access to:
● 200,000+ bookable experiences
● Skip-the-line access and mobile tickets
● Millions of trusted traveler reviews

Whether you’re planning a trip to Paris, Tokyo, or anywhere else in the world, we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.
summary: Travel Deals & Booking
recentChanges: This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Good options to travel and explore. Updated information about tourist places is a good feature of this website.

Love the 3.9.5 version of the app, it gives all of the same info as the website with a great layout. All of the updates are trash. You're best bet is to get the apk of the previous version of the app, otherwise searching for tours on your phone will not be worth it. Oh yeah, and the tours I've booked have gone well, this is just a review of the app.

While all the tickets I bought for Italy worked, it's really annoying that I cannot see the full itinerary on the mobile version and will still need to redirect myself to the web version to fully read up on the tour before I book.

No way to get mobile tickets on iOS or android. In addition, I tried reviewing the tours I took and the app refused to post my review, telling me to try later, then my review is gone and have to type it again. After two trials I have app. One of the worst apps out there!

Sorry to give low rating.... I love Viator, BUT this app is severely lacking... 1) you can search by location OR keyword, not both. If your trip is on Hawaii, and you want to go paragliding, you have to scroll through paragliding in dozens of other places first 2) can't add things to wishlist 3) wishlist can't be divided (e.g. by location when planning multiple trips) 4) setting date of travel should auto populate check availability, yet the ca keeps going to "tomorrow" Just a few major things..

title: Guides by Lonely Planet
description:
What’s new in this update

NEW in Guides 2.5:
Guides now features over 8,000 cities as well as 352,000 places and narratives!
New Home Screen with city collections and navigation by regions to be more inspired than ever before.
Thousands of 360º immersive experiences in 29 cities.

Description

Get to the heart of a destination with Guides by Lonely Planet! Packed with offline maps, audio phrasebooks, a currency converter and advice from on-the-ground experts, our free city guides are the ultimate resource for travelers before and during a trip.


EXPERT-CURATED CITY GUIDES
Our writers live and breathe each city they visit, reviewing every place that makes it into our carefully curated guides. Their essential tips and advice on where to stay, what to do and where to eat will help you discover amazing, off-the-beaten-track places.

TOP RECOMMENDATIONS
Overwhelmed by options for hotels, restaurants and things to do? Guides only surfaces the spots really worth seeing in a city, as chosen by our travel experts.

OFFLINE MAPS
No connection? No problem. Everything, including maps and phrasebooks, works 100% offline so you can avoid extra roaming charges abroad.

AUDIO PHRASEBOOKS
Talk to the locals with more than 10,000 phrases for 19 different languages. Finding the right thing to say has never been easier! 
   • Arabic
   • Czech
   • French
   • German
   • Greek
   • Japanese
   • Italian
   • Korean
   • Polish
   • Portuguese
   • Russian
   • Spanish
   • Spanish (Latin-American)
   • Swahili
   • Thai
   • Turkish
   • Vietnamese
   • Chinese
   • Chinese (Hong-Kong)

SIMPLE BOOKMARKING
Save and organize your favorite hotels, restaurants and things to do so you can visit (or revisit) your personal must-sees while on the road.

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCES
Take a look around these cities with our 360º immersive experiences
   • Amsterdam
   • Bangkok
   • Barcelona
   • Beijing
   • Berlin
   • Bogotá
   • Dubai
   • Florence
   • Hong Kong
   • Kuala Lumpur
   • Los Angeles
   • Madrid
   • Miami
   • Milan
   • Naples
   • New York
   • Paris
   • Pisa
   • Prague
   • Rio
   • Rome
   • Shanghai
   • Singapore
   • Taipei
   • Tokyo
   • Venice
   • Verona
   • Vienna
   • Yerevan

This version of Guides includes 8000+ cities, as well as over 350,000 places and narratives.

Lonely Planet is the world's leading travel content provider, supplying inspiring and trustworthy information for those planning a trip, on the road or browsing as an armchair traveler. We’ve spent the last 40 years traveling the world and crafting the most reliable travel guides, and we put all that knowledge into making the best travel app.

We’re always working to improve this app and would love to hear your feedback. If you have any questions or ideas, please email us at appsupport@lonelyplanet.com

Happy travels!

summary: City guides with offline maps, curated by experts.
recentChanges: This version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Bad app. Useless when traveling. It should have a map like Google maps with all places indicated, filter something and only appear that in the map. The system only allows you to download like cities, but for example when traveling to Bali, we wanted to search places in general, but you can't, you must know in which " city" that place is to find it, and normally you don't know that why you are searching. So the best thing would be to have all places for countries or regions, and have a search box

Wow. Used to be great. But now they're charging 5 bucks (4 pounds) to TEMPORARILY ACCESS guidebooks for a month. For anyone reading this, don't throw money out the window! You can buy ANY used guidebook for that price and its yours too keep 😊 alternatively, use a library! Lonely planet, you did have the option to price fairly, but you didn't. Don't @ me.

I used to love this app - it was easy to use, had lots of information, and helped me plan for a number of trips. Now it's a paid-for subscription service, I'll be uninstalling as its no longer fit for purpose for me - the costs aren't worth the amount I use it (despite Lonely Planet's copy and pasted response to all of the other comments that are the same as mine). There are a number of other free resources (which funnily enough includes LP's own website) that I'll continue to use instead.

The app is now not useful at all, since they implemented new ridiculous subscriptions (way overpriced). I'm very disappointed about Lonely Planet. I will not pay that price for subscription, doesn't matter which reason they give. If nothing change I will simply delete the app. We are in 2020, we can find a lot of travel information on the web without having to pay for. It was a great app, before...

Atleast offer a trial run before charging a subscription. I've installed it, and in 2-3 minutes, I'm getting a window to subscribe to "Must See." I mean these information are also available on other site. So why would I pay for something that doesn't even differentiate you. You have got to come up with a better proposition.

title: EaseMyTrip – Cheap Flights, Hotels, Bus & Holidays
description:
More than 8 million direct customers prefer using EaseMyTrip for the guaranteed best price on travel. Download EaseMyTrip mobile app on your mobile to search holiday packages, book flights and plan your travel. Book cheap flights, bus tickets, hotels and holiday packages with us and enjoy. Being a reputed name in the travel industry of India, we provide attractive offers on travel through our flight tickets booking app.

On EaseMyTrip flight booking app, you are guaranteed to have the best rates on flight booking. So, download our mobile app through play store and not just book flights but also get competitive hotel tariffs, best holiday packages and bus ticket price. You can find-out the cheapest room rates across the web with the best hotel deals & discounts. Our travel app provides a hassle-free flight booking experience to the users on any handheld Android device, including mobile and tablet. You can book domestic and international flight tickets for one way and round trip. However, the best thing about booking flight tickets with EaseMyTrip app is that you don’t have to pay any convenience fee.

EaseMyTrip App Benefits

1.    Flight Booking

Search, compare and book air tickets for domestic and international airlines

Book flights at lowest fares on one way and round trip flight tickets

Book cheapest domestic flights and international flights

Pay no convenience fee on flight booking

Domestic airlines that you can book with us are Air India, Vistara, Jet Airways, SpiceJet, IndiGo, GoAir, Air Costa, AirAsia and Indian Airlines.

You can also book top international airlines like Air Arabia, British Airways, Cathay Pacific, Delta Airlines, Etihad Airlines, Emirates, Gulf Air, Air France, Lufthansa Airlines, Singapore Airlines, Thai Airways, Qatar Airways, Kuwait Airways and much more.

2.    Hotel Booking

Compare room tariffs, search hotel information and book cheap hotels  

Book from a range of domestic hotels ranging from budget hotels to luxury hotels

Get up to 30% discount on online hotel booking

Enjoy early booking bonus stay in hotel

Check TripAdvisor ratings and reviews to choose best hotels

3.    Bus Booking

Book bus tickets with us for more than 1000 bus operators serving around 11,000 bus routes

You can book from wide range of bus options, including AC Buses, Non-AC Buses, Sleeper, Deluxe Buses, Volvo Buses and more

4.    Holiday Packages

Plan your vacation to visit new places in India or go for foreign tours.

Fill the holiday query form and let our experts call you with best holiday deals.

You can know about domestic and international holiday packages from them or ask for customized itineraries

5.    Train Tickets

Book train tickets online with IRCTC train booking option available with us.  

Search trains for all important destinations and upon knowing the availability, book trains online at no convenience fee.

You can easily find and book trains for major train routes available with us. 

6.    My Bookings

Get access to all your past bookings and future trips with EaseMyTrip

Check flight booking details, request for e-tickets and details on SMS

7.    Check/Modify Trips

Get access to all flight and bus options available on your preferred flight and bus route

Explore your booking details, cancellations and more

You can check and modify your journeys by filling your ticket reference number

8.    Web Check-In

Take advantage of web check-in feature on EaseMyTrip app to allow you to check-in within few steps

9.    Quick and Safe Bookings

For enjoying quick bookings, you can save your cards details and book in one go

With EaseMyTrip App, don't worry about any payment fraud as any payment transaction with us is absolutely secure.

We assure safe and secure transactions with up-to-the-minute technology


10. Airplane Chat

Using this exclusive chat feature, privately chat with your co-passengers being anonymous. The chat feature works without internet just using Bluetooth technology

developerAddress: Building No 223, F.I.E  PatparGanj Industrial Area ,New Delhi- 110092,India
recentChanges:
Smoother and Faster
-Free cancellation added to ease the customer experience
-Grab the best offer with multi-coupon selection option on listing page
-New payment integration for all the modules
-Find offerings with the newly added amenities section

comments: An extremely buggy and frustrating application. Showed me a "NullReferenceException" when I wanted to view the ticket I booked. Don't know what that is, but it's definitely not my ticket. Once I logged in to pay for my ticket, I found at least 5 other card details which weren't mine. Are these there for me to use for free? Are these guys being serious? I login and find other card details already saved!!!???

What a bad app, the customer care is slow and unsatisfactory. Booked a ticket, they debited the amount from my bank and didn't give me a ticket. Repeated calls did not help. They do not pick up the line and do not care about customer's. Move to another app unless you want to be scammed. Should shut down business if you can't handle things. Certainly suing you.

I don't know weather this concerns you or not you app is pathetic and so is your customers care. This is my second booking with you and needed assistant for both of them but didn't get for one. App doesn't have cancellation option for me. Site is not working as well and customer care representative are busy. Well Guess it was my mistake then choosing you app for booking..... Hope this ratings and comment warns you upcoming customer

I have booked flight ticket on 13th March through PayPal gateway. After payment there was no confirmation on the ticket booking and I'm unable to login my account. Worst Customer Care!!! They have two landline numbers and they are always busy. Email service is also equally worst, even after multiple mails there is no proper response at all. Now I'm clueless my money is gone 😔

The app is not updated with the revised rules of cancellation. Tried cancelling my booking through the app but the booking still shows the older process of Liberty insurance under 'how to claim' section Booked a fully refundable ticket by paying Rs 1000 extra but while trying to cancel, the refund amount is only rs 400 instead of 3,800 Customer care no. Has busy tone since morning It's just a hassle to use this app

title: MakeMyTrip-Flight Hotel Bus Cab IRCTC Rail Booking
description:
Trusted by over 50 million people😍, MakeMyTrip is a one-stop solution for all travel needs like booking Flight, Hotel, Train, Holiday, Bus, Cab, Experiences, Homestay & a lot more. 😊 Download the app to enjoy exclusive app discounts and seamless booking experience. Works well on Reliance Jio models

Sign Up & Earn Rs.2000 Reward Bonus, use it for instant discount on your ticket 💰

Flight✈️:
✓ Book cheapest domestic & international flights with MakeMyTrip’s Best Price Guarantee
✓ Get flight information, check your flight schedule & web check-in for your flight on the app itself
✓ Great discounts on round trip flight bookings
✓ Domestic airlines on MakeMyTrip: Indigo, Air India, Spice Jet, Indian Airlines, Go Air, Air Asia, Vistara etc
✓ International airlines on MakeMyTrip: Kuwait Airways, Qatar Airways, Malaysia Airlines, Thai Airways, British Airways, Air Arabia, Emirates, Etihad, Singapore Air, Lufthansa etc

Hotel🏰:
✓ MakeMyTrip is the best place for domestic & international hotel booking🌏
✓ Choose from premium 5-star hotels like Taj, Marriott, Radisson, Oberoi, & Hyatt. Or pick from our wide range of budget hotel & Oyo Hotel
✓ Book a cheap hotel of your choice in India and the world’s best cities
✓ Get up to 45% discount on online hotel booking
✓ Choose from MMT Assured Hotels which provide verified rooms, free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning & free breakfast for hotel booking
✓ Refer to the photo gallery, the overview video, & customer reviews by TripAdvisor to select your hotel
✓ Choose to pay for your hotel on the app, opt for EMIs with your credit or debit cards, or directly pay at the hotel
✓ Couple-friendly & family hotel are available at the best rates

Train🚂:
✓ MakeMyTrip is a great place to book IRCTC train tickets
✓ Just login with your IRCTC ID & complete your rail or tatkal ticket booking instantly
✓ You can also check your PNR status & view IRCTC train schedules
✓ Check where is my train with live running status
✓ You can save on IRCTC train tickets by using your reward bonus


Bus🚌:
✓ Choose from seater, sleeper, semi-sleeper, A/C Volvo, Non A/C, Scania, Mercedes bus, Shivneri, Shivshahi, & Garuda buses
✓ You can book tickets for APSRTC, UPSRTC, GSRTC, HRTC, PRTC & MSRTC
✓ To make an informed choice, check the ratings, reviews &
 amenities before booking

Cab🚓:
✓ We offer outstation cabs for travelling across India with special deals for popular routes
✓ MakeMyTrip Cabs are perfect for planning weekend getaways, city tours & airport transfers

Holiday (India/International) 🗽:
✓ Pick from itinerary based group tours, custom holiday packages, & land-only packages
✓ Explore holidays by theme - hills stations, beaches, adventure, romantic, luxury, wildlife & more
✓ You can also choose from couple-friendly holidays, family holidays, group getaways & weekend trips
✓ Choose from a wide range of international destinations like Dubai, Paris, Singapore etc to domestic domestic destinations like Himachal, North East, Kerala and a lot more

Experiences on MakeMyTrip🎡:
✓ MakeMyTrip offers experiences in India & across 30+ destinations internationally
✓ Fill your international & domestic holidays with exciting activities with special deals on city attractions, restaurants, city tours & more
✓ Take a pick from daycations at luxury properties, buffet deals at popular restaurants & entry tickets to entertainment parks, events, & more

Awards won by MakeMyTrip:

🏆 Times Travel Awards 2018 - OTA of the year
🏆 Condé Nast Traveller India - Favourite travel app 2017
🏆 Condé Nast Traveller India - Favourite online tour agent 2017

recentChanges:
A small update for you, a huge leap for effortless travel booking.
- Booking experiences on the app is now easier than ever. Find offerings from buffet deals to daycations right on the app!
- Major updates to hotels, rails and holiday search and booking experience.
- Now take your cancellation money back to your bank account. The latest version allows you to take your cancellation money back from the wallet to the original pay mode
- Bug fixes and under the hood improvements.
comments: Worst app ever... No proper updates of the prior booking that is made useless app just taking space. And the worst company to plans trip with.. When you call on their customer care number they just keep the call transfering from one department to other and if the call gets transfer to the correct department they just give you some lame excuse and no refund received.. Highly frustrated with them.. Instead is good to take some pain and book by yourself..

Worst app! Tried to change my flight and while trying to change it, money was deducted from my account but flight wasn't rescheduled. When I tried to find out what had happened, no one responded appropriately on the call helpline and their so-called support website was of no use and their chat service wasn't of any help. Had to rebook my flight ticket.

Not able to change or cancel flight through app due to corona virus impact imposed in countries. Not able to connect to customer care. Almost tried 6-7 times and was on call for more than 1 hr each time but call not connected and getting disconnected after hour.

Worst app ever! I wanted to reschedule my flight but the app or website did not allow me to reschedule it. Even the customer care service is not picking up my phone and they picked my call on the night of departure only 10 hours left and they are not even try to solve my problem .worst servive mmt. Will definitely file a complaint against you

Worst app for customer service,you just can't connect with them,not on customer care,no revert on emails & chat is just waste of time. Please be careful while booking because God forbid if something happens & u want to cancel or change ur booking be prepared to say goodbye to ur hard-earned money.

title: ViewTrip
description:
Designed exclusively for users booking travel through a Travelport-powered agency, Travelport ViewTrip is the ultimate itinerary app. 
 
Travelport ViewTrip has been completely redesigned to provide a more intuitive and seamless user experience, allowing you to view all aspects of your trip on the go. Here are some of the ways ViewTrip can help transform your travel experience;
 
ORGANISED TRIP ITINERARIES
-      View all your up to date trip itineraries in one convenient place including details on your flights, hotels, car hire, ground transfer and rail bookings



ALL OF YOUR TRIPS IN THE PALM OF YOUR HANDS
-       Scroll through upcoming and past trips for quick visibility of your travel plans
-       Trips are available both online and offline and will be updated automatically with any changes
 
STAY UPDATED
-       Receive real time push notifications for flight delays and cancellations

 
 
YOUR PERSONAL TRAVEL ASSISTANT
-       Easily find your hotel, car rental location etc. with user friendly maps, directions, confirmation numbers and more for all trip segments
 
SECURE AND EASY ACCESS
-       Simply login to your account with your secure password
 
About Travelport ViewTrip
https://viewtrip.travelport.com/

Easy to use, simple and does the job.

title: Planhop - Travel Planning and Holiday Booking App
description:
● Get personalised trips
 • We don't give generalised trip packages, but create a trip plan just for you.
 • Wanted a friend, a friend who is a travel expert? There you have it.

● Group Planning
 • Amazingly simple to decide Time and Venue
 • No need to call multiple times to confirm the schedule
 • Say goodbye to group chats for finalising a trip.
 • Just add your friends to the trip and you can collectively plan your trip together.

● Timeline: Magically Created, Automatically Shared
 • You can add, edit and rearrange the timeline
 • The changes gets published to all the members of the plan
 • Be it flight ticket or hotel reservation, just add it here to share with all the members
 • Timeline is snapshot of your complete itinerary

● Instant Update
 • Get instant notifications for all the updates in your plan
 • Be it flight delay or a canceled concert, we keep you updated about all the important happenings of your trip

● Book with a single tap
 • Book everything in your plan with a single tap
 • Convenient Payment Options

● Personal Travel Guide
 • We will always be there to show you the way.

title: GPS Trip Tracker™ - Record & Review the way you go
description:
GPS Trip Tracker tracks your driving or traveling route(the set of gps coordinates along with your path), speed and travel distance while you walk, run, bike, or do anything else outdoors. While recording, you can view your data live, annotate your path. At the end of trip, you can save the trip details and view them back later. 

     It also tracks your traveling speed and shows in graphical format to review it later.

Features:
--------------
   *  Usability: Simple and easy to use User Interface
   *  Tracking: Tracking trip route, driving speed and travel distance. 
   *  Travel Modes: Different types of modes - car, bicycle and walking
   *  Battery Saving: It saves your battery charge by allowing you to control the location updating frequency.
   *  GPS Accuracy: Gives best gps accuracy when compared to other applications.
descriptionHTML:
GPS Trip Tracker tracks your driving or traveling route(the set of gps coordinates along with your path), speed and travel distance while you walk, run, bike, or do anything else outdoors. recentChanges:
* Now app localized to 9 languages, more language support coming soon.

comments: Simple app that does what it's supposed to. It's fun to see what roads you've been down, also to see any shapes or patterns you may have made while driving, cycling, running, etc. As an Uber driver, looking forward to saving my tracks at the end of each night to see where I've been! Happy driving!

App is good but the problem is with sharing the recorded track, it crashes every time while sharing. Recorded tracks saved location is also not known. No option for saving folder in the settings. Pl rectify these issue to be the best in the peer group.

Samsung galaxy S9 Plus Android 10. Absolutely useless. Reports average speed of 127'000 KM/h. Does not update GPS location nor does it record speed. Avoid this app until the developer makes some serious bug fixes.
It's unreliable. Often it doesn't even start recording,despite saying that it is recording. In other cases an ad appears when you wanna save your trip, resulting in the loss of the trip's data.
Very disappointing app. Keeps showing erratic tracks and hence won't distances and speeds. Problem can't be of gps accuracy as other app worked perfectly fine.

title: Trip Wallet Manager & Travel Expense Tracker
description:
WallTrip is a FREE travel expense manager - tracker, an essential tool for a budget traveller, to help to manage the travel budget and analyze how much money you are spending in the trip or travel as well as control how much money you still have in the wallet without the need to count money.

Easily manage your travel budget and travel expense

Simply inform your travel budget that you can spend in your travel and then register the travel expenses when they happen. We made this as easier as possible in order to let you inform the expenses in just 3 touches, so that you can register your expenses in the moment that you have them and do not need to wait until arrive to the hotel. 

Convert the travel currency to your home currency

You can always register which currency you will use in your travel as well as your home currency, for each wallet that you create. For the expenses, incomes, and goals, you will always inform the values in your travel currency, and WallTrip will show you how much you are spending in your home currency.

Create as many trip wallets as necessary

You can create as many trip wallets as necessary. Use it as a way to also manage different currencies during your trip. For example, if you travel to Russia, Ukraine, Italy, and Brazil, you can create a trip wallet for each of these countries and each one with a different currency.

Organize and group your expenses by categories

WallTrip provides customized categories in order to allow you to track the money usage according to each category.

See statistics of your expenses - with charts and tables

WallTrip provides a series of statistics of your expenses with charts and tables to better let you analyze your spending.

Create trip goals to save money

One plus of WallTrip is the possibility to create goals and save money for them. How does it work? The idea is simple: you can basically create a goal (e.g., "dinner in a fancy restaurant") and inform how much money you want to save for that goal (e.g., 100 U$). The app will block this value from your available money and, as soon as you reach your goal, you need to edit your goal and mark it as achieved, which will make those 100U$ available again. After that, remember to create the real expense related to your goal (e.g., "94 U$, Dinner at restaurant XYZ") as soon as you actually have the dinner, so these 94 U$ will be debited from the available money.

Let WallTrip be your travel expenses tracker and help you in your next trip!

Supported languages
English
Portuguese (Português)
Russian (Русский)

recentChanges:
Fixed app icon;
Fixed problem with decimal separator;
comments: Best, simple budget tracking app. Use this for travel, and project budgets. Very useful, especially in the customization of everything.

Great little app to track your budget whilst away.  I was looking for something that allows to see how much cash I have remaining and this looks like it does the trick.  Will mainly be using it simply for cash but like the ability that I can break that down should I need. I say looks like as I haven't used it anger yet but will soon.  What I would like to see is an item on the summary screen showing what the daily limit is for the remaining budget as well but I think that would need a start and end date to be put on the trip.  Also a desktop widget showing remaining budget/daily limit and the ability to quickly enter an expense (or income) item

love this app! simple, easy to use. I would love to be able to share my wallets with other people so they can add to them too, for example a communal wallet for a trip. And send myself the data so I have a backup or record elsewhere. But the app itself already fulfills the purpose that I need of recording my spending in a simple way, so for that 5 stars!
Excellent app! Does the job perfectly! One star reduced for the lack of facility to generate and save report of a completed trip.
Fantastic. All the information I wanted. Easy to setup and use. Just wish it could sync to Google drive or export.

title: My Trip Coordinator
description: you’ve made the booking for your trip, but now what? For a busy schedule like yours a constant reminder of the important itinerary, flight timings, pickup locations are important to ensure your trip is smooth and comfortable. My Trip coordinator app is your travel partner on the go. No matter where you are, the app perfectly reminds you of your schedule, always. So whether it is a vacation you’re looking forward to or an important business trip; with My Trip coordinator app, always be informed, tracked and assisted.

comments: This latest app by Technohaven is perfect for travellers and tourists. It is simple and easy to use, and takes care of your entire trip. Right from sending me notifications to reminding me of dates and times, My Trip Coordinator is my perfect travel partner.

I swear by My Trip Coordinator app for all my travel needs. It is simple to use and once I have put in my scheduled, I can truly relax. The app becomes my personal assistant, keeping track of all my scheduled activites.

This is a great app for frequent travellers, even those who travel regularly for business purposes. I have been using this app for my business travels for the past three months and it has been really helpful. I will definitely give it a 10/10!

My Trip Coordinator is my go-to app every time I go on a holiday. It allows me to enjoy my holiday completely, without worrying about the itinerary. The app takes care of my schedule and has never failed me.

Holidays have never been so simple. I downloaded this app for my last holiday and am really impressed. I was able to enjoy my trip completely without worrying about anything, as My Trip Coordinator helped me at every step.

title: trivago: Compare hotel prices
description:
Discover the great deals, compare hotel prices & save money on your next holiday or trip –  get savings when you hotel search with trivago! 

Find hotels for your holiday or business trip, discover a last minute city break or a winter sun weekend deal. With more than a million hotels to choose from and hundreds of worldwide booking sites to compare, plan your next trip stress-free with the world’s famous hotel and travel app! 

Compare hotels & find your ideal hotel at great price before you book. Discover hotels and great deals with trivago!

Hotel Search and Save Money: Top 5 Reasons to Download trivago:
1. Compare hotels and find rooms from hundreds of bookings sites worldwide. 
2. Discover hotels for great prices, find travel discounts, deals & savings from hotels worldwide  so you can travel cheaply.
3. Compare hotel prices to find rooms near attractions – search with your budget in mind by setting a trip itinerary for that last minute getaway.
4. Save money on vacation and travel sites so you can book your ideal hotel at your convenience.
5. Hotel search with the trivago Rating Index® – see the combined online ratings of all available hotel review scores so you feel confident before you book.

Find hotels, motels or B&B’s and compare prices across all the top bookings sites including Expedia, Hotels.com, Holidaycheck, ebookers, AlphaRooms, LateRooms, Travelrepublic, Amoma.com, Booking.com, Priceline, HotelTonight and more.

Find rooms in hotels near well-known sights and set a maximum price. Keep your hotel search within budget and easily compare hotels and search by both location and price. Discover hotels, savings & travel discounts for your cheap last minute trip.

Compare hotel prices & travel discounts, plan your trip with confidence and save money while on vacation. Our massive workforce will always find the great deals on hotel prices to make your next vacation stress-free.

Find hotels with one of the world’s best travel app’s:
- The Guardian lists trivago among the “10 best money-saving apps.”
- Tech Times calls trivago one of the “must have apps for frequent travelers.”
-  Lifehacker lists trivago among the “best price-comparison apps you need to download.”

Download trivago to discover hotels and compare prices for great deals. Save money and plan for future holiday bookings while on the go!
descriptionHTML:
Discover the great deals, compare hotel prices & save money on your next holiday or trip – get savings when you hotel search with trivago!

Find hotels for your holiday or business trip, discover a last minute city break or a winter sun weekend deal. With more than a million hotels to choose from and hundreds of worldwide booking sites to compare, plan your next trip stress-free with the world’s famous hotel and travel app!

Compare hotels & find your ideal hotel at great price before you book. Discover hotels and great deals with trivago!

Hotel Search and Save Money: Top 5 Reasons to Download trivago:
1. Compare hotels and find rooms from hundreds of bookings sites worldwide.
2. Discover hotels for great prices, find travel discounts, deals & savings from hotels worldwide so you can travel cheaply.
3. Compare hotel prices to find rooms near attractions – search with your budget in mind by setting a trip itinerary for that last minute getaway.
4. Save money on vacation and travel sites so you can book your ideal hotel at your convenience.
5. Hotel search with the trivago Rating Index® – see the combined online ratings of all available hotel review scores so you feel confident before you book.

Find hotels, motels or B&B’s and compare prices across all the top bookings sites including Expedia, Hotels.com, Holidaycheck, ebookers, AlphaRooms, LateRooms, Travelrepublic, Amoma.com, Booking.com, Priceline, HotelTonight and more.

Find rooms in hotels near well-known sights and set a maximum price. Keep your hotel search within budget and easily compare hotels and search by both location and price. Discover hotels, savings & travel discounts for your cheap last minute trip.

Compare hotel prices & travel discounts, plan your trip with confidence and save money while on vacation. Our massive workforce will always find the great deals on hotel prices to make your next vacation stress-free.

Find hotels with one of the world’s best travel app’s:
- The Guardian lists trivago among the “10 best money-saving apps.”
- Tech Times calls trivago one of the “must have apps for frequent travelers.”
- Lifehacker lists trivago among the “best price-comparison apps you need to download.”

Download trivago to discover hotels and compare prices for great deals. Save money and plan for future holiday bookings while on the go!
summary: Find your ideal hotel and compare prices from different websites
recentChanges: Thanks for using the trivago app. We always take our users' reviews into consideration as we make improvements, so be sure to let us know what you think. From now on, you can expect fixed monthly releases based on what we learn from you. Just go to your settings and enable automatic updates.
comments: Enable Install on External Drive. Storage is tight on my Android phone. Many apps allow installs on external drives. They get to stay on my phone. Trivago had to be removed. :( PS - your support site is kinda useless. Had to lower my rating due to your generic response.
Very useful, contains all the info you want, offers comparison function of hotels and prices. Easy to interrogate - good user interface.
I like things simple, this app let's me search hotels, compare and book. Perfect.
Great app for finding best prices for weekend getaways and vacations. I love you this app ...
Tribago is the best app to know and comparero the hotel price at the same location on the spot. Usable app for the travel lovers

title: HOTSGO PLAN : Travel Planner & Travel Expenses
description:
Are you looking for a perfect partner app to organize travel?
Don't be worried anymore! Here is 'HOTSGO PLAN' for your trip!
Manage your travel plan and track your travel expenses easily!

1. EASY! Manage & Optimize & Find a direction
Just touch and slide your finger. You can rearrange the order, delete and add details(memo, photos, set a time). 

Oh, and! No more get stressed from thinking a perfect route. Just touch the magic wand beside each date on your plan! That magic wand optimizes your trip route perfectly! 

Do you want to know how to get there? Just push a button. We lead you to Google map right away and you don’t need to enter from where to where yourself. We did it already for you there :)
 
2. FAST! Check & Add
Check the itinerary including all Must-See-List and get information about your desire city! And Just pick a date! Then, it will be added on your own travel plan right away! The recommended itineraries are updating! 

3. Finally! Track your TRAVEL EXPENSES!
Hey, there! We got it for you, the “WALLET” to manage and track your travel expenses!! Manage your travel budget, and track your expenses during travel easily. You can add a location for each spend so you can see where you spend your money during travel at a glance! Isn’t it NEAT? and you can enter your expense on Plan menu. then the detail will be saved on your travel wallet! oh and one more thing, you can see the graph of your expenses. EASY PEASY LEMON SQUEEEZY!

4. SIMPLE! Share & Download
If you want to share your travel plan, your travel expenses or try someone else’s plan, travel budget plan, use a share code! Each plan and each travel wallet has its own code. Get a code to share and type a code to download! 

If you are travel blogger or want to share your trip itinerary and tracking your travel expenses on a community, just let them know your plan code. It’s easy!

5. SPECIAL! Download your trip itinerary as a PDF file!
You can download your itinerary which you made for your trip. You can print it out and use it when your phone battery has gone. 

Do you like write down something by hand? Then, you must like this!   

HOTSGO, we only care about your safe and enjoyable travel!
HOTSGO TRAVEL WITH YOU!

Please Love and Use 'HOTSGO PLAN'! 
Through your love and use, we can grow up faster!

comments: This is the most useful travel itinerary planning app I've used without all those useless extras.

Absolutely Amazing! Only been using a few minutes and I love it. It's time consuming to set up but worth it for planning a big trip. If you like to have all the info in front of you for sights you will be seeing and how to get there but want to go digital then this is the app to use. I appreciate it's free and can be used offline with the exception of planning to get to your destination because you need to be online for Google maps, oh using Google maps is another great thing about this app! I can't wait to share my trip plan when I'm done, yet another feature it has! Thanks!

Just started using this because I needed an app to plan my trip without having to book anything yet, and this is perfect! I could map out my days with or without specific timings, plan my budget, share with friends... Superb app. I only hope to be able to find more locations because there's too many specific places that I can't find probably due to them being lesser known spots. Other than that, it's perfect and I might just go pro for it.

Perfect app for all planning and travels. would be 5 star if the distances and transportation mode is able to be selected within the app so users could see at a glance the distance and transportation modes. Google should have acquired you guys to work on their Google Trips! with Google tickets, passes, flights etc. sync to the app via. Gmail would be perfect!!

very easy to use. I would love it more if we could create group or share our travel profile with partner soo they have it on their phone and can look or add whenever and see updates. Id also wish you could link website or google photos instead of screenshoting a must see and then loading it. Money input in US $ would be great. view option button nd see plans in photo version not just text

title: CityMaps2Go  Plan Trips Travel Guide Offline Maps
description:
Your reliable and easy-to-use global travel companion. Find directions with detailed offline maps, in-depth travel content, popular attractions and insider tips. 
Plan and have the perfect trip! Book your hotel or guide and enjoy restaurant reviews and shared user content.

Here is why 20+ million travelers love City Maps 2Go:

Didn’t you always want to have an easily portable and compact travel assistant that allows planning your trips to foreign countries and cities upfront? So turn your smartphone or tablet into a digital guide and planner leading you through YOUR choices of restaurants, hotels and which attractions to visit. Enjoy recommendations and reviews of other enthusiastic travelers and tourists. Always keep your orientation and find the direction to the next place; completely without roaming and offline.

With City Maps 2Go you enjoy a wide variety of advantages:

FREE
Simply download and try CityMaps2Go for free. There is absolutely no risk, and we’re sure you’ll love it!

WORLDWIDE MAP COVERAGE
Thousands of destinations available worldwide, covering virtually the entire globe. Paris, France; London, UK; Rome, Italy; New York, USA and all other major and many not so major destinations in Europe, Asia, the Americas, Africa and Oceania. Major tourist destination regions such as Hawaii, Mallorca, the Canaries, the Greek islands, the French Riviera, Thailand, the Tuscany or the Caribbean can be covered by downloading a few maps.

DETAILED MAPS
Never get lost and keep your orientation. See your location on the map, even without an internet connection. Find streets, attractions, restaurants, hotels, local nightlife and other POIs – and get guided in the walking direction of places you want to see. 

IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT 
Have all the information offline and freely portable. For each destination, access comprehensive and up-to-date guide information covering thousands of places, attractions, points of interest and many hotel booking options.

SEARCH AND DISCOVER
Find the best restaurants, shops, attractions, hotels, bars, etc. Search by name, browse by category or discover nearby places using your device’s GPS – even offline and without data roaming.

GET TIPS AND RECOMMENDATIONS 
Find tips and recommendations from locals and tourists. Browse for the most popular attractions, restaurants, shops, hotels, nightlife places, etc. 

PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS
Save places you want to visit, pin existing places, like your hotel or a recommended restaurant, to the map. Add your own pins to the map. Find and book hotels from within CityMaps2Go in all major regions from Hawaii to the French Riviera, from Scandinavia to Mallorca, from the Caribbean to the Tuscany and for all countries like Thailand, France, Germany, Italy or Spain.

OFFLINE ACCESS
Maps and guide content are fully downloaded and stored on your device. All features, such as address searches and your GPS location also work offline and without data roaming (an internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels).

DATA QUALITY:
Map data and POI are provided by OpenStreetMap and are regularly updated by us. To check the level of detail, go to www.openstreetmap.org. 

Use this offline map app and you will never have to carry around a paper city map or guide book. No matter whether you travel to top destinations in the USA, Europe or Asia. Have reliable, interactive offline maps always available in your pocket, on your smartphone or tablet.

Enjoy your travels. Your Ulmon team! :-)

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out
support@ulmon.com

recentChanges:
We are regularly updating our apps to fix bugs, make the apps faster and improve the user experience. If you have suggestions or questions please write to support@ulmon.com. We love to talk to you!

Happy travels,
the CityMaps2Go - Ulmon team.
comments: Support answered back and it appears that even with the Play account download, it doesn't restore the purchase. You have to download the app from the account you purchased from. Open up the app, and then logout and then log back I. After getting my purchase restored, the app works like a champ and is a must have if you go places where there is really bad internet or no internet.
What's the point of having this App if it won't help you navigate to the points of interest. This is pretty much a step up from having paper maps and a notebook organizer..
Download your map before you go and navigate without using your data. Excellent!
Needs to have a better off line version Generally a good app but it could be better.

Very useful! Used it in Tokyo, Berlin, Rome, Florence, Venice and will use it shortly in Paris. Love the offline feature, it's super simple to plan and navigate. Well worth the money. Indespensible in Paris, especially during 2019/20 metro strikes. Very responsive and helpful customer service. Helped me with setting up App when I changed from ios to android without having to pay again. Highly recommended!

title: Travel Weather - Forecast plan for your trip
description:
Taking the road? Check your route forecast and be prepared for any weather!

Its super simple: you just need to set the start and finish position and the app will get forecast all through your travel.

On this app you're gonna be able to set an initial and a destination point for your trip on the map by dragging two flags into it, with this information the app is going to calculate the route, draw it into on the map and gather forecast all through the route, you can even click each of them to read more details.

It is a easy and quick way to plan your trip inter states and be prepared to whats coming. Be a planner!

Today, tomorrow or after, when you best need it to check it out the conditions.
The app is totally free!

Create a route -> Select a day -> Check forecast through the route -> Enjoy your trip

recentChanges:
Temperature is now displayed at the dialog;
Current position is displayed;
English is now the default language.
comments: Interface is easy to use. Would be good to have 10 day forecast as well as option to add mulriple destinations.
Very helpful during trip planning.
Great app, will be using often. Thanks
Makes no sense and you cannot change your route and difficult to drag you end point and certain parts of the map weather are locked.

The app sucks. The app requires you to drag pins from your point A to point B if you want to see weather along a route at any time except right now. I guess? Because the app also doesn't give you any indication of time along the route. It completely fails its one function, find a different app.

title: Amtrak
description:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

• Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes - no need to print
• Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets with dollars or Amtrak Guest Rewards points
• Check train status
• Find station information
• Edit and manage your account profile
• Save credit cards for quick checkout
• And so much more...

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
descriptionHTML:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
summary: Managing your travel should be easy.  With the Amtrak app, it is.
recentChanges: Thanks for choosing the Amtrak app. We continue to fix bugs and improve the experience. Please check for updates frequently to take advantage of the improvements.
comments: Patience helpful, but considering the complexity and enormity of content, it works. Train Status function very helpful, as most trains are reliably not on time. Can be clunky. Useful to browse routes, learn about connections, make reservations. Many, many rules apply; critical to understand before purchase. App details most of it.

Convenient but Glitchy. It is a must if traveling on Amtrak, but it will often display an outdated trip count for multi-ride passes, 1 out of 10 times ticket purchasing doesn't work, and some days the app will not let either of my two phones login to show the conductor my ticket. Always keep a paper copy on hand or a receipt with the QR code in your email as a backup. But even with those issues, I use it every day and it is great for tracking and using Amtrak on the go.
This app is almost useless unless you know where the train routes go. There's hundreds of stations that don't connect so you have to play a guessing game for hours to attempt to plan a trip.

Terrible. Glitchy. Round trip tickets do not show up. every time I want to use a multi-ride ticket, I have to search through my email, find the number, go back to the app, then search for the ticket. it's insane. Also it doesn't show how many points my account has. That's not really important, but the fact that the app doesn't update from whatever database they have just shows another flaw. Sometimes it crashes without reason, other times it won't let you buy tickets without any error codes.
You can check the train schedule, buy your tickets and use this app to board the train. Really convenient! No standing in line to buy tickets.

title: TripBudget
description:
You like to travel, don't have unlimited supply of money and wonder how to plan a trip? This budgeting app will help you a lot. Make trip budget plans and track trip expenses in the most fast, easy and stylish way.  

For the most quick trip planning the expenses are divided into categories to be added as fast as possible. You can create several versions of the same trip and compare final estimated values. After planning a trip you can switch from plan mode into spending mode and track actual expenses. You can compare the final trip budget cost with the plan at any moment and access full statistics for each trip expense category. 

This trip planner app has options for traveling in group - you can create the list of trip participants and count the debts and log collective expenses. 

The app automatically converts expense values into base currency using public rates from open sources (like European Central Bank, etc) which are updated every day (internet connection is required). You can also set your fixed currency rates for each trip budget.

When you travel TripBudget uses GPS to track expense locations. When you enter money amount you can also set discounts and taxes. If you travel with friends you can enter information about expense sharing.

Incoming updates will also provide cloud synchronisation of trip budgets across your devices (including iOS client, which is coming soon). 

Supported languages: English, Russian, Español, French, Dutch, Italian  (more will come soon)

This trip planning app is one of easy ways to save money.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Current version is BETA - any reports and suggestions are welcome. Trip Budget XDA discussion is here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2644669

v1.020
+ New view mode for expenses list - view on map
+ Ability to modify section of expense
+ Click on maps will open system map or navigator
+ Optimizations for large lists of expenses

comments: The app was last updated in 2014!! Doesn't even work on my huawei p20 pro
Little slowly but TOTALLY FREE Thank you !
always ask for updates and please activate sync with google drive
The best app

The UI is beautiful and it's easy to use, no need to spend too much time learning how to use the app. I wish there are more categories than just transportation, accommodation, food and fun though. I at least wish there's a Miscellaneous/Other category that I can put weird expense types in there. I mean, insurance, which is a default expense type, doesn't really fit into any of the above categories, but it's in transportation. I'll be nice if you can do more than 30 days for multiples for long trips, and it would be even better if you can enter a total budget amount for a type of expense, tell the app the number of days you're traveling and the app breaks down the average for you. It'll also be great if these budgets and real expenses logged can be exported to a spreadsheet or something. Or... even just exported so you can continue recording on another device... I know it says cloud sync is coming soon, but not sure what "soon" is.

title: JAPAN Trip Navigator -travel guide,chat
description:
JAPAN Trip Navigator is a Japan travel guide application developed by JTB Corp., the No.1 travel agency in Japan. 
Unique travel information exclusively from JTB is widely provided. Also the AI (Artificial Intelligent) assistant called “Miko” will assist you as a knowledgeable travel guide during your stay in Japan. 

Overview
■ ASK: our chatbot about Japan
■ FIND: tourist spots you want to visit
■ BOOK: a room, tour, activity, restaurant and more
■ CREATE/EDIT: a custom travel plan


Features 
■ ASK: our chatbot about Japan
・ By asking the AI chatbot Assistant “Miko” any questions on the App, you will receive detailed answers related to Japan travel, such as must-see spots nearby, unique model plans, rules and manners in Japan, etc. 
・ By uploading a photograph of a place you would like to visit, “Miko” will recognize the picture immediately with answering the detail information of the place. 

■ FIND: tourist spots you want to visit
・ This app covers full of Japan travel information selected by JTB, Japan's largest and most prestigious travel agency.
・ Depending on the purposes and interests of your trip, you can find recommended spots, model plans, tours and activities, and accommodations.
・ Route search from current/specific location to the spots found is available to guide your Japan travel smoothly. 
・Based on your current location, specific regional information is provided. Also you can search your favorite areas in detail.

■BOOK: a room, tour, activity, restaurant and more 
・ Within the plan or near the places selected, you can book your accommodation directly from wide variety of Ryokan (Japanese inn) and hotels via “JAPANiCAN”, Japan’s largest travel booking site.
・ Various tours and activities specific for Japan travel are provided based on your interests and places from your customized plans and favorite spots.
・You can search and reserve restaurants in accordance with your preference.

■CREATE/EDIT: a custom travel plan
・ Customization of your own travel plans by choosing attractive spots of Japan you want to visit. 
・ Travel time and means of transportation are automatically calculated if you change your plans.
*The routes between spots of the created plan can be searched in more detail by installing “NAVITIME for JAPAN Travel” app.

NOTICE - By using this app, you will be asked to agree to the terms of use. Please confirm them in the link below.
(http://www.jtb.co.jp/inbound/appli/terms_en.asp)
- This App uses the GPS function of the user’s device to collect location data about the user.
- This App will collect data concerning search time and date, and the location of the user at time of search, but no personally identifiable information will be collected.
- Content of this App is accurate when the data is collected. Changes may apply after that. Please note that there will be no compensations made for any loss or damages caused by the content.

・Based on your current location, specific regional information is provided. Also you can search your favorite areas in detail.

■BOOK: a room, tour, activity, restaurant and more
・ Within the plan or near the places selected, you can book your accommodation directly from wide variety of Ryokan (Japanese inn) and hotels via “JAPANiCAN”, Japan’s largest travel booking site.
・ Various tours and activities specific for Japan travel are provided based on your interests and places from your customized plans and favorite spots.
・You can search and reserve restaurants in accordance with your preference.

■CREATE/EDIT: a custom travel plan
・ Customization of your own travel plans by choosing attractive spots of Japan you want to visit.
・ Travel time and means of transportation are automatically calculated if you change your plans.
*The routes between spots of the created plan can be searched in more detail by installing “NAVITIME for JAPAN Travel” app.

NOTICE - By using this app, you will be asked to agree to the terms of use. Please confirm them in the link below.
(http://www.jtb.co.jp/inbound/appli/terms_en.asp)
- This App uses the GPS function of the user’s device to collect location data about the user.
- This App will collect data concerning search time and date, and the location of the user at time of search, but no personally identifiable information will be collected.
- Content of this App is accurate when the data is collected. Changes may apply after that. Please note that there will be no compensations made for any loss or damages caused by the content.
summary: JAPAN Trip Navigator is a travel guide app from Japan's No1 travel company, JTB

title: TravelTriangle - Holiday Travel & Tour Packages
description:
TravelTriangle - Your Ideal Holiday Planner 
	
Connecting more than 40 lac happy travelers to 650+ verified agents, TravelTriangle, is an online marketplace which empowers the travelers with customized holiday packages. You can avail the best holiday deals and book cheap holiday packages to more than 65 destinations in India & abroad.
 
Offering enticing international tour packages & domestic tour packages, TravelTriangle encourages you to customize your own holiday travel packages. Be it international holiday packages, domestic holiday packages, international honeymoon packages, or domestic honeymoon packages, you can book a personalized travel package through this Travel App.
 
Whether it’s a honeymoon, a family or a solo trip, you can find packages for all kinds of holidays. Inclusive of flight tickets, hotels, meals & transfers, this Travel App offers a unique experience in tours and travels by providing multiple budget-friendly travel deals from handpicked agents. 
 
From cheap domestic flights to online hotel bookings, TravelTriangle thrives to craft memorable holiday experiences. Whether you’re looking for places to visit near Delhi, or to explore any international destination, enjoy the personalized & easy holiday booking experience with TravelTriangle.

• Pay in easy installments, get your money safe guarantee, and enjoy a hassle-free holiday booking experience

• Hassle-Free Holiday Booking - We make sure there are no detours in your journey through our in-house expert guidance, who are available 24x7 to assist you throughout your journey
 
• Pay In Installments - Pay in easy installments as per your convenience & chase the pre-holiday blues with TravelTriangle’s 100% Money Safe Guarantee
