I have staryed receiving calls from different travel related businesses after installing this app. Uninstall the app and never do business with these fraud people and company.

title: TripPlanner - Trips & Travel planner(no sign-in)
description:
TripPlanner makes your trips and travel planning easy by helping you create, store and manage the locations you want to visit. The clean and simple UI is easy to use and distraction-free.  

TripPlanner helps you organize multiple locations in a plan by the most convenient and efficient order of visiting them. The app is useful not only for travelers but also for truckers, delivery guys, etc..

AUTOMATIC ROUTES

Multiple locations in a trip plan are automatically arranged to give you the most efficient way to visit them all. With TripPlanner all you have to do is to set a starting location as well as select all points of interest you want to visit and the app recommends a route. You can also get turn by turn navigations based on the routes suggested. 

You can always change the starting location and once you visited a place, you can mark it as complete so that it will no longer be included in the route.

INTERACTIVE MAP

Plans inside TripPlanner are equipped with a map view where you can visualize the different stops in your schedule and its area coverage.

PLANS OVERVIEW

As you start to create and update your plans in TripPlanner, the app will inform you about your complete and incomplete stops in your plan. You will also have an overview of the plans that you have completed and are pending.

CREATE NOTES

You can write your own notes on each location inside a trip plan. 

SIMPLE AND CLEAN UI

TripPlanner is completely distraction-free and simple to use. It helps you plan the best route of your trips and travels, and nothing else.

FIND HOTELS NEARBY TRIP LOCATIONS

TripPlanner helps to find accommodations nearby the locations in a travel plan.

OPTIONAL SIGN-IN

TripPlanner works without logging in. The app is free, and upon installing you can start to make your plans immediately. 

QUICK LOGIN WITHOUT IDENTITY INFORMATION

Optional quick login with which you will be able to backup travel plan and share it with other TripPlanner users.

BACKUP PLANS

Logged in users has the option to back up their travel plans and retrieve them when needed.

SHARE AND DOWNLOAD PLANS

Logged in users can share their travel plans to any other TripPlanner user. They can also download plans from other TripPlanner users.

NO USER TRACKING

TripPlanner does not track its users and it does not store identity information online. Plans are backed up and stored online only if you opt to log in and backup/ share your plans.

Enjoy planning!

title: Trip Tap Toe - Flights, Hotels, & Travel Deals
description:
Trip Tap Toe is a travel concierge app which we will help you book & personalise your hotel & flight bookings as you want. Be it an early check-in request or a room upgrade, just chat with our operator and we will get it done!

* Book Hotel & Fights on a Chat: Real people, accurate information. Right from your smartphone.

* Negotiate Bookings in Real-Time: You have the power in your hand. Unleash it to negotiate the best prices for your hotel room or flight bookings on chat.

* Global Help: Get Instant information on worldwide destinations from our worldwide support.

* Researched: Save the headache of searching for reviews online. We have done the science.

* Experienced: We have a team lined up of cool Supermen & Superwomen worldwide to assist you with the best simply on a chat.

What you can do on Trip Tap Toe Concierge Chat App

Hotels:

* Book global hotels
* Negotiate hotel prices
* Request room upgrade
* Personalise your hotel booking
* Ask for reviews on chat
* Ask for hotel directions
* Assistance with hotel & room pictures


Flights:

* Chat for flight schedules
* Ask flight status 
* Book flights
* Negotiate flight prices & discounts
* Personalise your airfare booking
* Reserve seats
* Web check in on Chat


Free Tavel Assistance:

* Chat for destination information
* Ask for recommended activities
* Book activities on Chat
* Book sightseeing tours on Chat
* Chat for directions. 
* Ask for recommended restaurants 
* Book hop on hop off tours worldwide


Corporate Travel

* Instant travel assistance in booking hotels & flights
* Save time & hassle of exchanging emails. 
* Regular updates on flight schedules & status

Looking for a hotel within your budget with perfect location in Amsterdam? Or don't know where to chill after a long sightseeing tour in Hong Kong? Trip Tap Toe Travel Concierge will help you get the best possible hotel prices & travel advise on a chat. Clichéd as it may sound but that is true. We have tied up with suppliers worldwide to achieve this feat.

title: TravelPirates Top Travel Deals
description:
🏆 Winner of World Travel Awards 2018 🏆

Whether you’re looking for a last minute beach vacay, discounts on train tickets, rental cars, or cheap flights with a budget airline, TravelPirates has you covered! We're constantly scouring the web to find you the very best travel deals for vacation packages, flights, hotels & more!

How does the TravelPirates App work? 

STEP 1 – We find the best trips by identifying combinations of flights, hotels or vacation packages with the best price value
STEP 2 – We post these travel deals on our TravelPirates App, including customization options such as departure airports, destinations, and travel dates
STEP 3 – You book – the faster the better as the best deals expire quickly! 

What can you do on the TravelPirates App?

🔥 HOTTEST TRAVEL DEALS

Check out our latest deals to find the trip that best suits you! We always provide you with extensive information on destinations, prices, and accommodations. As we’ve done all the hard work for you, you won’t have to research further. Simply click and book your dream vacation. The abundance of customization options regarding travel dates, departure airports, and destinations allows you to select the ones that suit your travel needs best.

✈️ TRAVEL DEAL CATEGORIES – FLIGHTS, HOTELS, AND PACKAGES

Browse our travel categories to find the type of trip that you’re looking for. We have flight deals, hotel deals, vacation packages, and more! You can either have a look at our best deals across all categories or select the category that you’re interested in.

🔎 USE OUR SEARCH ENGINE TO FIND YOUR PERFECT TRIP

Haven’t found any travel deals for the destination you had in mind? Struggling to find a flight from your nearest departure airport? No worries! You can search for customized deals in the Booking section of the TravelPirates App. Search in our categories of Vacations, Flight + Hotel combinations, Flights only, Hotels only, and Rental Cars to find a trip that suits your needs.

⏰ TRAVEL ALERTS – DON’T MISS OUT ON YOUR DREAM VACATION

With our amazing travel alerts you'll never miss out on a deal again! This feature allows you to set up alerts based on your travel preferences. Simply choose your preferred destinations, departure airports, and budget. As soon as we find a deal that matches your requirements, we'll send you a notification.

⭐ USE THE FILTERS TO SEE TAILORED VACATION DEALS

If you have a clear idea of the trip you want, our filters will help you find the perfect vacation. For example, if you want to look at beach vacays in the Bahamas during July or low budget flights to New York City, then simply click on the filters and enter your requirements. You can filter by deal category, departure airport, destination and travel period.

😊 THE TRAVELPIRATES APP CATERS TO ALL YOUR NEEDS

TravelPirates provides you with the best deals for cheap flights from well-known airlines including Delta, United, and Southwest.

We’ll keep you updated on the latest travel deals, packages & last minute offers from renowned vendors, such as Expedia, Kayak or Skyscanner.

💪 WE’RE THERE FOR YOU

Have any questions about our app? Send us an e-mail at insert contact mail, we'll do our best to address your question as soon as possible!


Follow us on:
➡️ Facebook  www.facebook.com/Travelpirates
➡️ Instagram www.instagram.com/travelpirates
➡️ Twitter www.twitter.com/TravelPiratesUS

You can also sign up to receive our hottest deals via WhatsApp or FB Messenger: www.travelpirates.com/pages/whatsapp

Sign up for our newsletter and have the best vacation deals sent directly to your inbox: www.travelpirates.com/newsletter/subscribe

Are you a fan of our pirate app? Leave us a review in the App Store and tell us what you love about it! 

So jump aboard our deal hunting pirate ship and book your perfect vacation today!

title: FindPenguins – Travel Tracker
description:
FindPenguins effortlessly and automatically tracks your travels. FindPenguins creates your beautiful travel journal, simply with your phone in the pocket. Travel together with friends and share your memories – or keep it all private, it's up to you!

”The perfect network for globetrotters”
[Lonely Planet]


AUTOMATIC TRAVEL TRACKING

Turn on our travel tracker and your phone automatically logs your travel route and most important places during your travels. Through smart technology and artificial intelligence (automatic flight recognition, ...) we are producing an optimal result, consuming only approx. 4% extra battery life per day!


BEAUTIFUL PHOTO BOOKS

At the end of your journey you can order a beautiful photo book of your FindPenguins travels into your home: Through a brilliant algorithm, your book is automatically and professionally designed, with your stories, photos, visited places and if you like, even the comments of your friends.

Receive a $10 discount on your first photo book with the code EARLY10.


INTERNET IST NOT REQUIRED

Track your route in the wilderness, in the desert or on the ocean! The FindPenguins travel app doesn't need internet, it works completely offline. Simply upload your posts and travel route whenever you are online.


FULLY AUTOMATED

Travel route, world map, photo albums, statistics? Blog your “Footprints”, all the rest comes entirely automated.


MORE THAN A TRAVEL JOURNAL

FindPenguins is not only for journeys lasting for months. You are on a two week holiday? Why not blog? Capture your life’s travels, whether a city trip, summer holiday or backpacking the world ✌️


BLOG YOUR FOOTPRINTS

Posts on FindPenguins are called “Footprints”, with your stories, favorite photos or videos and the location. Footprints represent your visited places around the world, a beach cabin, your favorite café, a city, a national park, all is possible.


FOLLOW YOUR FRIENDS

Did you ever wonder, what your friends or fellow backpackers do during their travels? Which cities, bars, national parks, beaches – places in general they visit? Follow travels of like-minded and let others follow you.


JUST THE RIGHT APP FOR YOUR TRIP

• Automatic GPS Tracking of your travels
• Create journeys together with other travelers
• Unlimited posts, photos and videos
• Get a beautiful printed book of your travels
• Sleek, elegant and easy to use
• Everything works offline
• Full privacy control of your posts!
• Neatly visualized travel maps, interesting travel facts and statistics
• Fully synchronized website and apps
• One account for all your trips, short or world trips!
• Auto-translation of posts to those not speaking your language
• Follow, like and comment – explore your friends’ travels
• All-in-one free travel journal, travel tracker & travel log


PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

If you decide to subscribe for a Premium Membership, payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your monthly subscription is $4.99 per month, while the yearly subscription is $19.99 per year (price may vary by location).  Auto-renewal may be turned off in your Google Play Store account settings any time after purchase.


INSTALL OUR APP, IT'S EASY AND FREE!

descriptionHTML:
FindPenguins effortlessly and automatically tracks your travels. FindPenguins creates your beautiful travel journal, simply with your phone in the pocket. Travel together with friends and share your memories – or keep it all private, it's up to you!

”The perfect network for globetrotters”
[Lonely Planet]


AUTOMATIC TRAVEL TRACKING

Turn on our travel tracker and your phone automatically logs your travel route and most important places during your travels. Through smart technology and artificial intelligence (automatic flight recognition, ...) we are producing an optimal result, consuming only approx. 4% extra battery life per day!


BEAUTIFUL PHOTO BOOKS

At the end of your journey you can order a beautiful photo book of your FindPenguins travels into your home: Through a brilliant algorithm, your book is automatically and professionally designed, with your stories, photos, visited places and if you like, even the comments of your friends.

Receive a $10 discount on your first photo book with the code EARLY10.


INTERNET IST NOT REQUIRED

Track your route in the wilderness, in the desert or on the ocean! The FindPenguins travel app doesn't need internet, it works completely offline. Simply upload your posts and travel route whenever you are online.


FULLY AUTOMATED

Travel route, world map, photo albums, statistics? Blog your “Footprints”, all the rest comes entirely automated.


MORE THAN A TRAVEL JOURNAL

FindPenguins is not only for journeys lasting for months. You are on a two week holiday? Why not blog? Capture your life’s travels, whether a city trip, summer holiday or backpacking the world ✌️


BLOG YOUR FOOTPRINTS

Posts on FindPenguins are called “Footprints”, with your stories, favorite photos or videos and the location. Footprints represent your visited places around the world, a beach cabin, your favorite café, a city, a national park, all is possible.


FOLLOW YOUR FRIENDS

Did you ever wonder, what your friends or fellow backpackers do during their travels? Which cities, bars, national parks, beaches – places in general they visit? Follow travels of like-minded and let others follow you.


JUST THE RIGHT APP FOR YOUR TRIP

• Automatic GPS Tracking of your travels
• Create journeys together with other travelers
• Unlimited posts, photos and videos
• Get a beautiful printed book of your travels
• Sleek, elegant and easy to use
• Everything works offline
• Full privacy control of your posts!
• Neatly visualized travel maps, interesting travel facts and statistics
• Fully synchronized website and apps
• One account for all your trips, short or world trips!
• Auto-translation of posts to those not speaking your language
• Follow, like and comment – explore your friends’ travels
• All-in-one free travel journal, travel tracker & travel log

Your monthly subscription is $4.99 per month, while the yearly subscription is $19.99 per year (price may vary by location). recentChanges: This version fixes a few minor bugs.
comments: Great app, my family loves it as they can always see where I am. It's a lovely way to blog and does exactly what it says on the tin. Would definitely recommend.
Great app to keep track of my travels. Would recommend everyone to use it, whether it's for sharing it for yourself as a diary.
Great experience in tracking a travel!
Things are going great so far. I love that others travelling with each other are all on the same page...

Answer to dev: Thank you for your reply, it's much appreciated. My problem is, I've paid a lot of money for a 40MP phone camera. It's useless if I can't zoom in without seeing pixels instead of fine details. But I also understand that you need to make money, and if everyone gets the free eBook, then you won't make money. But I would GLADLY pay for a high quality eBook. My rating is based on the future I would use the most, and at this point it doesn't meet my expectations.

title: Road Trip - Scenic Route Planner
description:
Breathtaking landscapes, beautiful viewpoints and awesome roads. The developers of the world's most successful motorcycle app are on the fast lane and present the next genius idea: Road Trip.

Make every ride a perfect roadtrip, whether it's a one way trip or a whole organized roundtrip. We deliver the best rides for all car enthusiasts, no matter if you're into classic cars, convertibles or sports cars. Road Trip is the answer for all needs. Discover beautiful places in your surroundings and let us inspire you.


Your tour planner on your smartphone
-        Our unique algorithm will guide you to your destination along the nicest roads.
-        Create your own custom tour with unlimited via points.
-        Combine different route options like "most beautiful way" or "fastest way" in just one trip. They can be set for the whole trip or even sections of the route between each waypoint!
- Find POIs like beaches, parks or gas stations, and integrate them into your route.

Looking for a spontaneous round trip
-        Simply provide the desired length and our unique algorithm will do the rest.
-        You want to stop on that really good beer garden you like? No problem! Simply drag the via points of your tour to the preferred location.

Turn-by-turn voice navigation
- Your fuel light comes on? The next gas station is only 3 clicks away. Afterwards Road Trip directs you right back onto the route.
- Get notified about danger zones (e.g. speed cameras) directly during your navigation.

World's most beautiful places
-        Discover marvelous beaches or solitary bays.
-        Create amazing rides along viewpoints or mountain passes.
-	       For the little snack on your ride we provide a variety of POI like beer gardens or ice cream shops.
-	       If you’re looking for tourist attractions,
-	 we also show old castles, beautiful parks and picnic areas in your area.

Tour catalog
-        Save your favorite road trips and explore them as many times as you want.
-        Your past rides are analyzed and saved neatly in your own tour catalog.

Tour analysis
- Check out your maximum velocity or acceleration for each tour.
- Visualize your speed, altitude and acceleration for each tour in graphs. 

Share your adventures
-        Share your favorite travels with Facebook, WhatsApp or directly inside the app.
-        Become a part of the community and take advantage of the experience of thousands of other car enthusiasts.

Tracking
-        Just riding? Road Trip will take care of tracking your adventure.
-        Always have an overview of your time on the road, the places you've already been to and your average speed.

Sign up to our community
- Create a profile and we show you how many kilometers you have driven with Road Trip.
- Digitalize your garage and save your vehicles with pictures and additional information.


Try Road Trip for free and discover beautiful roads, interesting places and astonishing natural sights. Become a Premium member now and get unlimited access to all maps and exclusive features like danger zone alerts (e.g. radar warnings). Road Trip, the answer to everything for all those with gasoline in the blood!

title: Wanderu
description:
Search, compare and book buses, trains and flights across North America and Europe.

Wanderu searches hundreds of ground travel and flight options to find you the best travel deals. Search bus, train and plane routes in the United States, Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Belgium, The Netherlands, Iceland, Ireland, Poland, Austria, Switzerland, Italy, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Croatia, Serbia, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Romania, Greece and many more.

• Best New App - Google Play
• Favorite New App - TIME
• Best Travel App of 2019 - PC Magazine
• Best Travel App to Use in 2019 - Newsweek

Score awesome deals on tickets from Wanderu’s official partners, including Amtrak and Deutsche Bahn trains, Greyhound buses, Megabus, Boltbus, Peter Pan Bus Lines, Adirondack Trailways of New York, Turimex Grupo Senda, Red Coach and many more in North America. European Partners include Flixbus, OUIBus, National Express and others. Wanderu offers the widest selection of trips available - online or in-app! Find bus tickets as low as $1 and hit the road.

NEW: Find and book flights to thousands of destinations across North America, Europe and beyond. Search flights right alongside bus and train routes to discover the travel option that fits your needs and budget in the best possible way. Flights on Wanderu are currently in BETA mode as we continue to expand our trip inventory and further enhance the user experience.

What the media has to say about Wanderu:
• “Wanderu is easy to use.” - The New York Times
• “Makes finding and booking cheap tickets for buses and trains super simple.” - Lifehacker
• “It helps travelers find the best ticket prices, at the most convenient times.” - TIME
• “Providing a more enjoyable and cheaper form of travel.” - Elite Daily
• “It can be frustrating to switch from site to site looking for a cheap, convenient option. Wanderu solves that problem.” - The Economist
• “Wanderu makes it much easier to book bus trips” - Mashable

FEATURES:
• Easily FIND, COMPARE and BOOK bus, train and plane tickets.
• No booking fees and always the lowest prices.
• “My Trips” section to keep all of your reservations in one place.
• View your past searches and save your favorite frequently searched trips for quick reference in the search history.
• Mobile boarding available for some carriers - just show your app to board!
• Choose your options based on the amenities and extras that matter to you - free WiFi, extra leg room, in-seat power outlets and more.
• Wanderu combines, in real time, itineraries from multiple bus and train lines to create a unique journey, not available anywhere else!
• Find the best walking or driving directions to or from the station/airport to your final destination.

COME WANDER WITH US:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoWanderu
• Instagram: http://instagram.com/wanderu
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoWanderu
• Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/Wanderu/
• Flipboard: https://flipboard.com/@Wanderu

Skip the lines and enjoy the ride. Wanderu is the simplest way to book buses, trains and flights!

comments: This app is awesome! Was able to get a greyhound ticket that departed that same day & was sold out on greyhounds website. Not only that, but it was also for less than half the price too! I hope one day it will expand to include even more modes of travel & companies. Oh by the way, I actually found wanderu through their website, not the app, & for some reason I could not purchase the ticket through the browser on my PC or my phone browser but it worked in the App I don't know why....
worked flawlessly for booking an urgent ticket- would reccomended this app over the Amtrak App, Greyhound App and others. Extremely useful! Thanks, developers
Very smooth interface. Provided a variety of options and quick booking response.
Was easily able to find my tickets for a cheap price. Made it very simple to compare and sort the tickets from different carriers.
Very easy to use, would definitely use this app all the time for bus and train bookings.

title: TourScanner - Compare Tours & Travel Activities
description:
TourScanner aggregates the world largest catalogue of skip-the-line tickets for attractions, city tours, guided visits, outdoor and sport activities, cooking classes, food tours, day trips, excursions, shows and much more. You can search from a large variety of things to do in popular cities, locations and holiday destinations abroad.

TourScanner’s search allows users to compare the prices from hundreds of booking sites in just a few clicks, including 300,000 tours, things to do and attractions in over 5,000 destinations. Type Paris or New York City in the search bar and you can find the right travel activity quickly and easily on TourScanner. Compare prices and let TourScanner help you finding the best price from thousands of deals.

title: OHAMBO - Trip planner, multiple destinations
description:
Trip planning made easy!

At OHAMBO, we are passionate about traveling. That's why we made this app in the first place! To help you (and ourselves) plan your next trip in the most efficient way.

OHAMBO will help you plan your next trip.

Key features of OHAMBO trip planner:

•	Free version available.
•	Keep track of all locations you will visit during your trip.
•	Find out the best transport option for your itineraries.
•	Organize and safely store all your valuable documents like flight tickets, hotel and restaurant reservations, event tickets, ...
•	Take notes and store web links while planning your trip.
•	Share your trip plan with your fellow travelers.
•	Access all this information on any device (smartphone, tablet, desktop computer).
•	OHAMBO trip planner will work with or without internet connection, so you can avoid expensive roaming costs while traveling.

On the road, OHAMBO will give you access to all your information and documents you need every day of your trip.

recentChanges:
- NEW: See your expenses for each category (food, accomodation, transport, ...) in the Expenses tab.
- NEW: Quick actions menu when you long-press a date/destination in the trip overview.
- NEW: GDPR compliant.

- When defining your transport from A to B, you can now specify different legs of your route. This makes it possible to define a stop in between when going to the next location.
- Bug fixes, stability and performance improvements.
comments: I like the app. It could have gotten five stars but I docked it a point because a window keeps popping up every few minutes insisting that I rate the app. Its far too intrusive and obnoxious, despite my being on the Plus plan. Edit: I docked it another point because the pop up keeps appearing prompting me to rate the app even after I've already done so. Down to three stars now.
I like the app. I let me create multidestination trip, calculating destination between point as time and km (also approximate price). Easy (and beautiful) notes.

Can't set start and end time when adding travel details. I just want to add these, along with reservation number, airline, stopovers etc. Instead you just have useless fields like duration and distance which are meaningless when I don't even know what time my flight leaves
Surprisingly flexible and complete. Also beautifully designed.
scrollimg is a bit buggy but the app is very useful amd intuitive.

title: Travel Expenses - Expense Manager & Trip Budget
description:
Travel Expenses is your expense manager to save on trips. Set a trip budget when you travel, add every expense, get automatic currency exchange and split money on group journeys. 

Download Travel Expenses for free now, your expense manager to save on trips .

FREE FEATURES

· Set a Trip Budget

Set an allowance and see how much you have left to get to your limit. The best way to save on trips and manage your expenditures.

· Get Payment Statistics

Your expense manager tells you on which categories you spend the most.

· Track Illimited Expenses and Journeys/b>

Add every expenditure, with notes, payment method, categories and much more. You can track as many expenditures and journeys as you want, for free. 

· Automatic currency exchange
With Travel Expenses you can add costs in any currency. Your app will do the maths and will do an automatic currency exchange, so you can relax and save on trips.

· Split money for group trips

If you are in a group journey, you can invite your fellow travelers to use the app. This way you will be able to split the costs and know who pays what. 

· Use the App with Offline Features

The app works offline too. You can use every feature without an Internet connection.

· Get Trip Budget Notifications

If you are close to reaching your trip budget limit, your app will notify you. This way you will stick to your trip budget and save money on trips.


PREMIUM FEATURES

Access to the Premium version of Travel Expenses and enjoy even more features on your expense manager app. 

· No ads experience

Enjoy Travel Expenses without ads or publicity.

· Export your travelling data

Export your travelling data as a CVS file, to have your travels also on other platforms.

ONLY WITH TRAVEL EXPENSES

This app is the best way to save money on trips. Set an allowance and your app will warn you when you are about to reach it. This expense manager does an automatic currency exchange, so you don’t have to do the maths every time you add an expenditure.

Traveling can sometimes be expensive, but with Travel Expenses you will have your allowance always in line and you can save money on trips. Keep an easy and simple accounting, split money on group trips and enjoy your holidays.

Travel Expenses is the best app for travelers who want to save on trips. You will have every feature, offline too - automatic currency exchange, statistics, spending plan, split money and much more.

Download the app for free now and start saving money.

title: Road Trip Travel Games
description:
• Play 11 different awesome road trip games
• Keep track of your score with an easy to use score keeper
• Add a little more excitement to an already fun road trip game using our easy game timers 
• Use the simple gas trip calculator to find a quick estimate of how much your trip will cost  

Based on the popular site http://www.TopRoadTripGames.com


THE GAMES
These games are outlined in an easy to read article style, with game instruction and variations.   Here are some of the games:

• The Storyteller
• Spot It Game
• Word Puzzle
• Memory Word Game
• Abc Game
• Name That Tune Game
• Riddle Games
• Slug A Bug (car bounty version)
• Cloud Shapes
• ISpy Games
• More coming soon!  

We tried to add most of the popular road trip games currently being played and the more we looked, the more we found.  Expect more games to be added in the future.  In addition to compiling some of the most fun road trip games out there, we tweaked a few of them to make them more family friendly.  The traditional Slug a Bug game is fun the first couple times with your siblings, but when dad plays, arms start to turn colors faster than a 2 week old banana. So to prevent World War 3 on your arms, we have come up with and tweaked many road games that should be fun for the whole family. This includes both the younger and older folks.

While most of these games can be played on the road, they can also be played at home or even while you're sitting in the doctor's office! Either way, these games are simple, easy to play and should provide hours of entertainment.


THE TIMERS

Game Stop Watch and Count Down Timer
Games are fun, they are even more fun when time is taken into the equation.  Game timers are like salt and pepper to your meat and potatoes, they can make a fun game even more fun.  


THE SCORE KEEPER (Game Scoreboard)  

Never dig around for a pencil and paper ever again.  Simply add in the number of players playing and how many points you’re playing too.  Set up a player profiles for later game play.  There is an auto sort feature in the scoreboard that will always show you the leading players.  Playing road trip games has never been easier!


THE JUST FOR FUN NICETIES

Road Trip Gas Calculator
Why?  Because it’s cool.  It’s not just a calculator to help determine how much in money your trip may cost in gas, we also listed the top five ways to conserve gas on the road. 

I had a lot of fun building this app and would love to expand it if people are using it.  I welcome your feedback, good or bad!  

Thanks!!
descriptionHTML:
• Play 11 different awesome road trip games
• Keep track of your score with an easy to use score keeper
• Add a little more excitement to an already fun road trip game using our easy game timers
• Use the simple gas trip calculator to find a quick estimate of how much your trip will cost

Based on the popular site http://www.TopRoadTripGames.com


THE GAMES
These games are outlined in an easy to read article style, with game instruction and variations. Here are some of the games:

• The Storyteller
• Spot It Game
• Word Puzzle
• Memory Word Game
• Abc Game
• Name That Tune Game
• Riddle Games
• Slug A Bug (car bounty version)
• Cloud Shapes
• ISpy Games
• More coming soon!

We tried to add most of the popular road trip games currently being played and the more we looked, the more we found. Expect more games to be added in the future. In addition to compiling some of the most fun road trip games out there, we tweaked a few of them to make them more family friendly. The traditional Slug a Bug game is fun the first couple times with your siblings, but when dad plays, arms start to turn colors faster than a 2 week old banana. So to prevent World War 3 on your arms, we have come up with and tweaked many road games that should be fun for the whole family. This includes both the younger and older folks.

While most of these games can be played on the road, they can also be played at home or even while you're sitting in the doctor's office! Either way, these games are simple, easy to play and should provide hours of entertainment.


THE TIMERS

Game Stop Watch and Count Down Timer
Games are fun, they are even more fun when time is taken into the equation. Game timers are like salt and pepper to your meat and potatoes, they can make a fun game even more fun.


THE SCORE KEEPER (Game Scoreboard)

Never dig around for a pencil and paper ever again. Simply add in the number of players playing and how many points you’re playing too. Set up a player profiles for later game play. There is an auto sort feature in the scoreboard that will always show you the leading players. Playing road trip games has never been easier!


THE JUST FOR FUN NICETIES

Road Trip Gas Calculator
Why? Because it’s cool. It’s not just a calculator to help determine how much in money your trip may cost in gas, we also listed the top five ways to conserve gas on the road.

I had a lot of fun building this app and would love to expand it if people are using it. I welcome your feedback, good or bad!

Thanks!!
summary: Fun Road Trip Travel Games to play with the whole family. Scoreboard and Timers.
recentChanges:
-Now Free!
-Few other bug fixes

It's just instructions what a rip of
The idea of game timers or  gas trip calculator to find a quick estimate of how much trip will cost in gas is so much funny ever. A complete family pacage game. Keep it up
The Storyteller, Spot It Game, Word Puzzle, Memory Word Game and many more trip games in one place.
very addicting, awesome to play them. great graphical appearances attract to keep playing us continuously. love it...

title: JetBlue - Book & manage trips
description:
Take JetBlue everywhere you go! Download our award-winning app to book, manage and check in for your trips, access boarding passes and more.

Day of travel – Your day of travel is a breeze with key information right on the home screen.

Manage trips – Update your seat selection, add extras or make changes to your itinerary with just a few taps.

Boarding pass – Check in and get to your gate quickly without the hassle of printing a boarding pass – one less thing to carry on!

My trips – Add your upcoming and past itineraries to access everything you need to know.

Book flights – Search and book your next trip with ease.

Chat with us – Connect with a JetBlue crewmember quickly through live chat and get your questions answered.

Airport pickup – Rent a car with Avis/Budget or schedule a shuttle.

Inflight experience – View your flight’s DIRECTV® schedule, SiriusXM Radio® channels and free snacks and drinks onboard.

City guides – Learn about hot spots by tapping on city names in My trips.

My TrueBlue – Enroll or sign in to TrueBlue to keep track of your TrueBlue points, request points for past trips and enjoy a more personalized experience.

& More – Access our flight tracker, travel tools and other content.

Ranked #1 in Customer Satisfaction by J.D. Power among Airline Travel Apps based on ease of navigation, overall appearance, range of services and clarity of information.

For J.D. Power 2019 award information, visit jdpower.com/awards.

recentChanges:
• Various updates.
• Fixed a bug with updating your TrueBlue profile photo.
• But we really don't have anything against bugs
comments: Locked up right before we were boarding. Had to get out of line & print our tickets. A year later, app is still garbage. We boarded an hour late, my boarding pass was open the whole time. Shut down when I went to board, instead of boarding pass, kept giving me city info. Was told to wait for her to adjust it. came up again a couple minutes later.

Nice when it works. Unfortunately that is not the norm. Often shows no trips booked when there should be several. Screen cap your boarding passes as they may not be there when you need them. Unreliable airline apps are pointless.

Everytime I need this app they are always having issue... and when the app updates it's the same message "we fixed some bugs" did you really because every time I have to book a flight with points or true blue banks it's an issue.

POS. try to set up an account on my friends iPhone and it says there was a connection error no matter what Wi-Fi or Data Network. I installed this on my Android phone to create an account for her and when you go to select the airport it's just blank.

Not sure what happened but upcoming flights no longer show. I have to continually add the flight info to see it. I even uninstalled and re-installed and it never shows in my list. This is annoying, please fix.

title: TRIP: Book a ride in Ethiopia
description:
TRIP is a ride sharing app in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for easy and reliable ride in just minutes - day or night. 

There's no need to park or wait for a taxi or bus. With TRIP, you just tap to request a ride. Whether you are going to the airport or to the embassy, there is always a TRIP for every occasion. Our taxi service is available in all Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. Download the app and take your first travel today.

Requesting TRIP taxi is easy — here's how it works: 
- Just open our cab app and tell us where you’re going 
- The app uses your location so your cab driver knows where to pick you up. Anywhere in Addis Ababa.
- You’ll see your driver’s picture, vehicle details and can track their arrival on the map. 
- Payment can be made by cash directly to the driver. 
- After your cab travel, you can rate your driver and provide feedback to help us improve your trip experience. You’ll also get a receipt by email.    

Are you individual? Book “Classic” travel, our most affordable individual option. 
Are you enterprise? Book “Enterprise” service — you’ll travel with other riders headed your way and enjoy your ride. 
Are you on a hurry? Try a fast motor bicycle. You will never be late with TRIP Moto. There are even more services — whether you’re traveling alone or traveling in a group.

Any questions? Contact us!
Email: info@mytriptaxi.com 
Phone: 251932214742
http://mytriptaxi.com/

recentChanges: We updated the app to make trip costs transparent — all the additional fees will be shown as part of the whole sum on the screen. Also, the Romanian language added, stabilization improved and no bugs left unnoticed. Be safe on the roads!

Very easy to use and "TRIP" is a good transportation option for Addis ! keep moving 👌

Very bad app
I like this app easy to access👌👌👌

title: 트리플 - 해외여행 가이드
description:
180개 도시 무료 가이드와 일정짜기
맛집 탐색, 가계부, 항공권 예약과
호텔, 투어·티켓 할인까지 한 번에!

처음 뵙겠습니다. 트리플입니다.

★ 180개 도시 무료 가이드
잘 만든 여행 가이드를 무료로 보세요.
이제, 비싼 가이드북과 작별.

★ 동선 보며 짜는 일정 플래너
일정짜기 스트레스는 이제 그만.
갈 곳만 선택하면 동선과 일정이 뚝딱. 쫙-
*동행인과 동시에 짤 수 있답니다.

★ 함께 쓰는 여행 가계부
"우리 총 얼마 썼지?"
복잡하게 계산기 두드리지 말고
트리플 여행 가계부로 경비 계산까지 완벽하게!

★ 내 주변 맛집, 관광지 탐색
갈 곳 찾느라 헤매지 마세요.
위치에 따라, 실시간으로 좋은 곳만 알려드려요.

★ 항공권 예약도 역시 트리플
검색부터 발권까지 쉽고 빠르게
트리플 전용가로 더 가볍게 떠나세요!

★ 호텔 할인 넉넉하게 챙겨드려요.
트리플은 365일 연중무휴 호텔 할인! 
여행자 클럽에서 최대 9만 원 추가 할인까지.

★ 각종 서비스 예약 혜택
투어 & 액티비티 할인 뿐만 아니라
여행자 보험 등 여행에 필요한 각종 혜택을
묻지도 따지지도 않고 드립니다. 

★ 장소별 리뷰
당신의 실패 없는 여행을 위해.
먼저 다녀온 사람들이 성심껏 리뷰를 남겨주었어요.
별점부터 리뷰, 꿀팁까지. 참 든든하죠.

★ 날씨, 환율, 번역, 시차, 길 찾기
일일이 찾기 귀찮은, 하지만 꼭 필요한!
여행 필수 기능을 하나에 모았어요.


자, 이제 설치 버튼이 보이네요.
바로 꾹- 눌러주세요.


설레는 여행, 우리 함께 시작해요.
그럼, 안녕히 받아 가세요!


*서비스 오픈 도시
나트랑, 라오스, 치앙마이, 다낭, 방콕, 세부, 코타키나발루, 싱가포르, 하노이, 호치민, 발리, 푸켓, 보라카이, 칭다오, 홍콩, 마카오, 타이베이, 상하이, 베이징, 샌프란시스코, 하와이, 뉴욕, 로스앤젤레스, 라스베가스, 시드니, 멜버른, 괌, 사이판, 리스본, 포르투, 파리, 프라하, 로마, 런던, 바르셀로나, 빈, 피렌체, 베네치아, 인터라켄, 마드리드, 부다페스트, 블라디보스토크, 취리히, 프랑크푸르트, 뮌헨, 암스테르담, 베를린, 오사카, 교토, 후쿠오카, 도쿄, 오키나와, 삿포로, 나고야, 그라나다, 세비야, 이스탄불, 푸꾸옥, 마닐라, 미얀마 포함 180개 도시


-------
트리플에서는 서비스 제공을 위해 아래의 접근권한을 필요로 합니다.


[선택적 접근 권한]
- 위치 : 주변 관광지와 맛집 추천 등을 위한 현재 위치 자동 수신
- 저장공간 : 사진 리뷰 및 프로필 이미지 설정 시 이미지 첨부


* 위 접근권한은 특정 기능을 사용할 때 허용이 필요하며,
허용에 동의하지 않으셔도 트리플을 이용하실 수 있습니다.

title: Ready Set Vacation!
description:
Join over 2 million travelers who are just as excited about their vacation as you are.

Download “Ready Set Vacation!” travel app and start the countdown to your vacation in style.

Browse through thousands of tours and activities already prepared for your vacation. Book experiences for an unforgettable time.

Gather your to do’s in the integrated travel checklist and stay informed with the built-in temperature and weather indicator.


You’ll love “Ready Set Vacation!” 👇
😍 It keeps you motivated until your vacation starts.
⏳ Counts down for you until it’s time to hop off.
🌞 Shows you the current weather for your destination.
🌍 Has 60,000+ exciting experiences around the world.
👀 You can easily check the countdown and weather on the widget.
📷 You can customize the background pictures.
🎉 You can share it on social media.


The vacation countdown will tell you exactly how long until you should be ready for your trip.

Check the temperature and weather indicator to pack accordingly. Don’t forget a thing with the integrated travel checklist. Use the reminders to complete your tasks in time.

Browse through thousands of tours and activities already prepared for you, such as skip the line, hop-on-hop-off and private tours.

While you check your countdown and eagerly wait for departure time, share a screenshot of your stylish vacation countdown with your friends on social media.

Use beautiful pictures as backgrounds for your countdown. Upload photos, search for pictures in the Unsplash collection or pick one from our selection. Enjoy the beautiful background photos and count down to your spring break or summer vacation in style.
descriptionHTML:
Join over 2 million travelers who are just as excited about their vacation as you are.

Download “Ready Set Vacation!” travel app and start the countdown to your vacation in style.

Browse through thousands of tours and activities already prepared for your vacation. Book experiences for an unforgettable time.

Gather your to do’s in the integrated travel checklist and stay informed with the built-in temperature and weather indicator.


You’ll love “Ready Set Vacation!” 👇


😍 It keeps you motivated until your vacation starts.
⏳ Counts down for you until it’s time to hop off.
🌞 Shows you the current weather for your destination.
🌍 Has 60,000+ exciting experiences around the world.
👀 You can easily check the countdown and weather on the widget.
📷 You can customize the background pictures.
🎉 You can share it on social media.


The vacation countdown will tell you exactly how long until you should be ready for your trip.

Check the temperature and weather indicator to pack accordingly. Don’t forget a thing with the integrated travel checklist. Use the reminders to complete your tasks in time.

Browse through thousands of tours and activities already prepared for you, such as skip the line, hop-on-hop-off and private tours.

While you check your countdown and eagerly wait for departure time, share a screenshot of your stylish vacation countdown with your friends on social media.

Use beautiful pictures as backgrounds for your countdown. Upload photos, search for pictures in the Unsplash collection or pick one from our selection. Enjoy the beautiful background photos and count down to your spring break or summer vacation in style.
summary: Stylish vacation countdown with tours, weather, checklist, widget and more
developerAddress:
Republic Boulevard 6, 2nd Floor, Apartment 10
300002 Timisoara, Romania, European Union
recentChanges:
This version includes a number of improvements and stability enhancements throughout the app. 🎉

We worked on:
- Small crashes occurring in some app pages;
- UI improvements;
- Performance & stability issues.

Love the app? Leave a review and share your thoughts with us! 🧡
comments: I paid for the pro version. The local time of the destination is not correct. It's off by 4 hours. I contacted the apps customer service and was told they are aware of the problem and will fix it. It's been over two weeks and the app still doesn't work properly. This app is a waste of time & money.
Brilliant app. Never had a problem with it. I always use it for when I've booked my holiday 😎
Easy to use. Not a single problem. Plenty info I can add about my trip so yup Thumbs Up from me.
Ready, Set, Vacation! is an amazing app. It is easy to use for planning trips too. 🙂
Love this app, like the picture, countdown and also temperature of resort when I look.

title: Birdy Trip
description:
You are not alone in the sky!

It’s time to migrate to sunny lands. Grab your cute friends on the way and be careful, many dangers could smash you during your journey.

Features:
• One-Touch control
• Enjoy an original atmosphere & colorful graphics
• Discover & catch more than 50 birds
• Complete dozens of missions
• Beware of eagles!
• Google Play Leaderboard

summary: Lead a flock of tiny birds!
recentChanges:
- Various bug fixes

Thanks for playing!
comments: I am devastated. I loved this game. I was obsessed. It was... Beautiful. It made me so happy in times of sadness. Through my great storage purge, this was one of the 3 apps I decided to keep. I had my most prized possession. My piggy. I was on my way to golden piggy. Then I lost everything. I logged in. I had no stars. No birds. It was like I had never played. I'm honestly so sad. I burst into tears and am disappointed, depressed and overall just so sad that this has happened.
Its a fun and relaxing game that never seems to get boring and can be used to consume time.....a little bit of ads but not to many......overall it is a great game
It's actually a really good game! I kinda thought this game was going to be like flappy bird but better and I didnt expect this! It's way better!
This game is one of the best games I have ever played its a bit hard but amazing grafics:super EVERYTHING IS SUPER DUPER I would recommend this 111% out of 100%
I just love this game and all the other bloop games and the graphics are amazing .

title: Travelzoo
description:
Join 28 million people worldwide and discover the latest Travel, Entertainment and Local Deals. Travelzoo's global team of Deal Experts scours the market every day for the most outstanding deals and recommend only the best. Now, the free Android app makes it easy to find and take advantage of great deals!

With the FREE Travelzoo® Android app you can:

    -Find high-quality travel, entertainment, dining and spa deals.
    -Book a hotel or purchase Local Deals fast and securely in under four taps.
    -Browse the definitive list of the week's most amazing deals with the Top 20®.
    -Easily access My Vouchers to view and redeem vouchers directly from your phone.
    -Quickly tab between the Top 20®, Local Deals, Travel Deals and Hotels to discover deals.
    -Effortlessly find the most important information when booking and purchasing a deal with a beautiful details      screen: gorgeous photos, deal highlights, instructions to book and source of deal.
    -Search for hotels that are available for your specific travel dates.
    -View deals in your current location or nearby sorted by proximity (handy to look for immediate getaways in your
    traveling area).                                               
    -Map deals based on location, right on the details screen of each deal - one of the most requested features from our subscribers.

Get exclusive deals in these international app editions:

    United States
    United Kingdom
    Canada
    Spain
    France
    Germany
    Australia
    Japan
    Hong Kong

A bit more about Travelzoo...

Since 1998, Travelzoo is the most trusted publisher of travel, entertainment deals and local deals. Our deal experts research, evaluate and test thousands of deals to find those with true value. We recommend only the very best deals whose price and availability we can confirm. We never publish a deal we wouldn’t book ourselves.

comments: Travelzoo has been incredibly useful for planning trips, and they always update me with the weekly deals. Super helpful!
The best deals I've ever seen! Deals are listed clearly and it's so simple to book. I check the Top 20 deals religiously.

All prices are fake. They advertise one price, Once you open the site, nothing close to that price even exists. It's all a sham to drag ppl to commit to false advertising. This is gross misrepresentation!
Love the deals but sharing still doesnt work from the app. Would like to be able to send the info to my friends!

The deals look great but are not promising at all. I got the app based on recommendation and first thing is it's extremely slow. Further more, if you find a deal, plan on 3x that price because this is all false advertising. I've even tried options that would give the lowest price advertised and I don't know where they're making theses prices up because the most basic options don't give the price the advertised. Too good to be true unfortunartely.

title: Highway Weather
description:
Arrive safely.

Travel weather forecasts for your entire road trip at the time you will arrive. Weather alerts, radar, traffic cameras, and plan for rests.

Family vacation? Long-haul trucking? Touring in an RV? Heading to a motorcycle rally? Whatever your passion, we want to ensure that you arrive safely.

There's nothing like the uncertainty of knowing if weather will disrupt your trip. Instead of searching for weather forecasts city-by-city, get all the information you need all at the same time, in an easy to understand display.

Free features for planning a trip:
• Compare forecasts for your entire trip.
• No limitations on trip length.
• Get recommendations for the best time to start your trip.
• Adjust your departure time instantly and see updated forecasts.
• View live outdoor cameras for your trip.
• Get severe weather alerts along your route.
• Add rest stops to long trips.
• Wind and precipitation levels also inform whether travel is safe.
• Global weather forecasts, for all regions of the globe.

All planning features are provided free of charge!

For the hands-free active driving mode, a subscription is required.
• Receive automatic updates while on the road.
• See updates instantly in the app.
• Get notifications when the app is running in the background.
• More features currently in development!

recentChanges: This release fixes a few display problems when using Night Mode.
comments: Latest update crowds screen has complicated the simplicity of the app. Now more money grabbing by creator to silver line pockets for driving features. Pay to remove ads one thing but now taking away a free feature and charging to have it in the app is shameful, you creators are just turning into Trucker Path mentality
Great service to plan your trip with! As for improvement, it could get speed limits and traffic info from maps, and allow you to select additional area's that concern you.

I really like the app's ability to show weather forecasts for the time I'm supposed to be driving through a city. I do wish it allowed me to block out certain driving times (I'm not going to be on the road at 3 in the morning) or would allow me to bound the departure or arrival time a bit. (I plan to leave during the weekend but not today.)

Not only can you see current forecast along route, but you can also run the start time up a day or more and check the forecasts along your route for the entire trip or for each hourly waypoint along the route. Also great for RVs in that you can set your speed and select truck driving mode which is sensitive to winds.

Easy to use accurate information and you can set it for your 10 hr dot and reset breaks along route. To actively deside where you will be better off and not get stuck with a road closure. Wind warning have been on point too for high profile vehicles. I actively use this app winter months for my Trucking business. Outstanding job. Let me know if you need any beta testing.

title: Delicious - Emily's Road Trip
description:
Enjoy this game for FREE – or unlock ALL Original Stories games with unlimited play and no ads by signing up for a GHOS Subscription!

Climb aboard for a nostalgic road trip with Emily and her family in the latest Delicious time management game!

Travel through the American heartland along Route 66 and discover what is truly important in life. Sometimes it’s not the destination, but the journey and those who make the journey with you.

In your new favorite time management game, Delicious – Emily’s Road Trip, Emily’s summer vacation plans have fallen through. Also, Patrick is struggling with his career as a florist. It’s time to get away from it all and take a trip to remember! 

Patrick fixes up Emily’s van and the O’Malley girl s and boys pile into it to tour the “Mother Road”! Along the way they’ll meet friends, old and new, and help them all in true Emily style!

Are you game to master the challenges of being a chef, wife, mother AND vlogging celebrity? This is no simple cooking game. Use your time management skills while cooking all the delicious dishes and serving your customers their food in time. Do you have the passion and fever to dash around the kitchen, cooking up a storm? To survive the craze, you’ll need to be on top of your game.

Get cooking and work hard to upgrade your food and equipment. Plan girl time with Paige and play a game with the twins. Can you manage to have a relaxing break while you dash from place to place at a fever pace in our cooking game?

🔪  Face daily cooking game challenges to earn extra diamonds!
🏕️   Decorate the camp site and make it a home away from home
🚗  Cruise through 60 story time management levels and 30 challenge time management levels
🛣️  Experience the iconic Route 66 as it winds its way through 6 gorgeous locations
📸 Collect and enjoy all the Route 66 photographs, featuring the highlights of the vacation
🍔 Make traditional American food, showcasing local specialties

*NEW!* Enjoy all GameHouse Original Stories with a subscription! As long as you’re a member, you can play all of your favorite story games. Relive past stories and fall in love with new ones. It’s all possible with a GameHouse Original Stories subscription. Subscribe today!

comments: Used to play Delicious on PC & loved every series. Installed this game on Galaxy tab & though is Delicious it seems glitchy & difficult to manuver. Also click play a level, watch the advert but after advert sometimes click play it takes me to yet another advert. Game itself a bit overdone with added task & no explanation on how to complete or the meaning of or help for particular task making it impossible to advance level. 3 star due to other Delicious PC games played otherwise 2 star.
Love the delicious series my only problem is that I mistakingly uninstalled my game and when I reinstalled it I had to start at the beginning😔. Is there anyway we can get the old game data?
It ok u just need to make it better for when you play on it on beginner
Like the game and the story, but dont like the 5th location with the spooky products.
Fun as always. I love all the Emily's games!

title: Trip Checker
description:
TripChecker is the take-anywhere transit app. Get live bus, subway and train departures plus key travel info for cities around the world, including London, New York, Sydney, Chicago, Washington DC and Baltimore - plus the whole of Great Britain.

See instantly when your bus or train is going to arrive, as well as live journey planning to help you get around. TripChecker also displays instant updates on disruptions, traffic reports and stop alerts.

Download TripChecker today to transform the way you travel.

 • From the makers of BusChecker, as featured on BBC Click, Telegraph Online, The Independent & Wired •

MAIN FEATURES

• Live, updated vehicle departures, direct from official data.
• Real-time GPS map of nearest stops.
• Plan your journey anywhere in the world by bus, tube, rail and more.
• One-tap 'get me home' journey planning.
• Service disruptions including diversions, closures and cancellations.
• Stop Alerts - get woken up when you've arrived at your stop!
• A handy widget lets you view live departure times on your home screen.
• Full 3D route maps for all routes - see exactly where you're heading.
• Live Cycle Hire dock locations and availability in key cities.
• Favorite the places and bus stops you use regularly.

Download Trip Checker today - and never miss that last ride home. Although if you do, we're not paying for your trip!

______________________________________________ 

PROBLEMS WITH THE APP? 
Please uninstall then re-install the app - this resolves the vast majority of issues. For more help, please see our support site or get in touch. (and please try this before leaving bad reviews! We do read every support request we receive) 

______________________________________________ 


NOTES
- Data provided by official feeds as described at www.tripchecker.co
- Trip Checker can send anonymous usage stats and crash reports to us so that we can improve the app; no personally identifiable information is collected or transmitted, but you can opt out of this at any time via the app's settings page.

comments: This app is fantastic for getting public transport. Even better in cities where the buses have GPS.
Great app for exploring.
don't waste your time on this app
Good app real bus times

An odd bug: When planning journey if I turn off bus travel (eg: I want to walk and train) the journey still shows some bus travel! If I allow buses the journey includes more of it by bus. But why does it show ANY bus travel (even if less) if I have turned that off?

title: WishTrip - Travel Album Auto Creator
description:
Effortlessly log your travels and get photo albums, trail maps and personalized videos of your trips anywhere in the world. Take pictures and videos as you normally would and we’ll turn them into beautiful travel albums that are ready to view and share in a matter of minutes. Simply open the app and hit record as you start your adventure. We’ll do the rest! 

* Automatically transform the content you create during your trip into a travel photo album, video and geo-tagged trail map.

* Get the best travel videos. WishTrip automatically aggregates your trip’s most memorable images into a minute-long highlights video, including a map of your travel.

* Don’t spend hours editing your travel photos after a trip. WishTrip does it for you. No sorting, cropping or filters required.

* Always remember where you found that amazing little shop or cafe. The map creator  geo-tags every photo with an exact location on a map of your adventure. 

* Broadcast your walk, hike, ride or drive in real-time to friends and family anywhere in the world with WishTrip Live Broadcast.

* Chat with other travelers nearby.

* Get inspiration for your next trip. Follow the locals, travelers and tour guides with their travel albums on treks and tours all over the world. Search by interests, region, difficulty and much more. 

Never spend hours creating travel albums and videos of your trips again. Download WishTrip and start creating memories today!



*Named one of the UNWTO’s Top 20 TravelTech Companies Worldwide*

*Welcome Challenge Top 10 Hospitality and Travel Industry Startups and Innovators*

recentChanges: WishTrip is now sleeker than ever. We threw in a few bells and whistles and squished some pesky bugs, too!
comments: I can't find an option to export a trip I've made. The share button just creates a URL back to the wishtrip service. So if I use this app to record the trip of a lifetime my record of the trip is entirely at the whim of the company behind the app. An export function of some sort is a requirement for anything more than superficial use. It's useful to share with friends and family close to the time of your trip but not to document your memories.

Really great app for saving all your memories, you can record your treks on the map, navigate, add images/video, voice and notes. I liked the live sharing feature. You can also discover sites and explore them. I really enjoy this app, and it keeps improving all the time.
Very helpful and practical tool
this ad sucks pop out my screen each minute

Update 1: Had some issues with the app at the beginning but after emailing the support team of WishTrip, they found out there was a bug but they managed to rectify the problem quickly. They also explained carefully how to use the system as I misuderstood some of the app features. Now it seems better and perfect especially knowing that I can also access my account in a web browser and its potential for my future treks. Thanks

title: Trips - Travel Planner for Google

Discover an amazing range of activities, restaurants, culture and history. There's simply so many things to do on your trip. We will organize popular attractions, activities and travel tips.

If I want to add my own activity, I can't do that. Would be great to have an actual trip planner and not just the items Google thinks I should have.
Terrible - Website shortcut. It is not a proper standalone app. Just a "Web page app"
Good one..But we cannot modify/add/edit day plans for a place.But that feature existed in Google Trips
Not a real Google app I think. Lost all my trips
Didn't like it.

title: packed: Group Trip Planner
description:
BETA: The packed Group Trip Planner is in beta but that shouldn’t stop it helping you get your next trip sorted. We’d love you to try it out and let us know what you think!


The best travel planner app for organising and scheduling group trips. Use holiday polls to agree with friends when you should get away, where you should go and what you should do.

Invite your friends and get everyone voting on the right dates, destinations and budget to make your holiday happen. Find out which dates people are free, which destination they'd prefer and how much they'd be willing to spend so you can get scheduling your group's holiday.

The packed app is designed to help the planning and scheduling of group travel. Ideal for coordinating friends, family, stag & hen groups, company or corporate trips, boys & girls holidays, reunions and other great escapes. A group travel trip planner for any occasion.					

All features in this app are completely free. Don’t let another group trip fall flat on its face - save yourself time and hassle and set up a trip.

Group travel made easy.


HOW IT WORKS

CREATE A TRIP - Name it and add a range of dates, destinations and budgets 🗺

INVITE FRIENDS - Whoever they are, get them involved and voting on what matters 🥳

PLAN, DECIDE, AGREE - Create polls to clearly see everyone's preferences and who can make it. Chat amongst friends within each trip 💬

GET READY TO BOOK - Gather full names, dietary requirements and dates of birth, all at the tap of a button 🤩	

FIND THE BEST OPTIONS - Make use of a curated area of travel providers - flights, transfers, accommodation, activities and more - or chat to an expert via WhatsApp or Messenger about your specific requirements 😎


OTHER COOL FEATURES

Did we mention is was completely free? It is 😋

Never mind travel planners, this is one of the first apps ever to offer WhatsApp notifications

Clarify details and chat to friends in each trip

The polls in this travel planner app mean scheduling holidays for big groups has never been so easy. Create a poll for anything

This app is designed with the organiser in mind. When you set up a trip and start polling friends, you get to decide whether they can vote for one option, more than one option or whether your polling is anonymous.

Don't want all the responsibility? Create a trip and invite friends to be fellow group leaders, so you can get polling the group together on important stuff like whether you want a self-catered apartment, a villa or a hotel for your summer reunion.

Take advantage of an easy to use date picker and preloaded polls so you can save time in the travel planning process


QUERIES, COMMENTS, QUESTIONS? GIVE US A SHOUT

We'd love to hear from you! If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please fill out this form (https://packed.co/app-feedback) or chat to us in WhatsApp (02039000223), Messenger (@all.packed) or email (hello@packed.co)
descriptionHTML:
BETA: The packed Group Trip Planner is in beta but that shouldn’t stop it helping you get your next trip sorted. We’d love you to try it out and let us know what you think!


The best travel planner app for organising and scheduling group trips. Use holiday polls to agree with friends when you should get away, where you should go and what you should do.

Invite your friends and get everyone voting on the right dates, destinations and budget to make your holiday happen. Find out which dates people are free, which destination they'd prefer and how much they'd be willing to spend so you can get scheduling your group's holiday.

The packed app is designed to help the planning and scheduling of group travel. Ideal for coordinating friends, family, stag & hen groups, company or corporate trips, boys & girls holidays, reunions and other great escapes. A group travel trip planner for any occasion.

All features in this app are completely free. Don’t let another group trip fall flat on its face - save yourself time and hassle and set up a trip.

Group travel made easy.


HOW IT WORKS

CREATE A TRIP - Name it and add a range of dates, destinations and budgets 🗺

INVITE FRIENDS - Whoever they are, get them involved and voting on what matters 🥳

PLAN, DECIDE, AGREE - Create polls to clearly see everyone's preferences and who can make it. Chat amongst friends within each trip 💬

GET READY TO BOOK - Gather full names, dietary requirements and dates of birth, all at the tap of a button 🤩

FIND THE BEST OPTIONS - Make use of a curated area of travel providers - flights, transfers, accommodation, activities and more - or chat to an expert via WhatsApp or Messenger about your specific requirements 😎


OTHER COOL FEATURES

Did we mention is was completely free? It is 😋

Never mind travel planners, this is one of the first apps ever to offer WhatsApp notifications

Clarify details and chat to friends in each trip

The polls in this travel planner app mean scheduling holidays for big groups has never been so easy. Create a poll for anything

This app is designed with the organiser in mind. When you set up a trip and start polling friends, you get to decide whether they can vote for one option, more than one option or whether your polling is anonymous.

Don't want all the responsibility? Create a trip and invite friends to be fellow group leaders, so you can get polling the group together on important stuff like whether you want a self-catered apartment, a villa or a hotel for your summer reunion.

Take advantage of an easy to use date picker and preloaded polls so you can save time in the travel planning process


QUERIES, COMMENTS, QUESTIONS? GIVE US A SHOUT

We'd love to hear from you! If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please fill out this form (https://packed.co/app-feedback) or chat to us in WhatsApp (02039000223), Messenger (@all.packed) or email (hello@packed.co)
summary: Make group holidays happen. Sidestep the chaos of WhatsApp groups & email chains
recentChanges: MySwft has rebranded to packed and we've rolled out some small improvements!
comments: Used this app to arrange a trip for 10 people. Made it much easier to get everyone signed up and agreed on dates. Will definitely be using again and would definitely recommend!
At last I can get the pressure of organising the trip off me and onto the others!!!! Great idea! So far seems easy to use!
Every time I change a date the app freezes! I can only edit picture name and description of the trip (how about the dates!) . I cant enter an alternative date because....IT FREEZES!
Bit like doodle for group vacations, very handy! Also the personal service really helped get the holiday organised in a jiffy, thanks MySwft!
Such a good app! Made it really easy to organise the group

title: myTrip - Travel Organizer
description:
myTrip is the easy way to plan, organize and share your trip plans.

The Trip before your Trip: The beginning of each travel does not occur in the start date, occurs before... Every travel begins with initial planning, where we define the period of travel, destinations, what do we do, hotels where we stay, airlines, car rentals, shopping list, etc.. We search information with friends, books, magazines and blogs. How to access all this information during your trip ?

The app myTrip provide all information that travelers will need, you can create a travel plan with information about the destinations, hotels accommodation, flights, Places to visit, things to do, shopping list, information about car rentals and more!

Main features
  – Travel Plans.
  – Places Explorer, find restaurants, attractions, bar, etc.
  – Hotels information.
  – Extensive database of Hotels around the world.
  – Flights information.
  – Flight status.*
  – Things To Do (restaurants, Tourist Points).
  – Information of places, like opening hours, address, phone, etc..
  – Shopping List.
  – Products search , including description and value.
  – Travel Finances.
  – Cloud services, share travel plans on multiples devices.
  – Notes and To Do Lists.
  – Get directions, maps and weather for each destination

* Feature not available in the Beta version yet.

Organize your travel plans in one place with myTrip.

Share your travel plans with other travellers!
The Cloud Service from myTrip, enables you to share and sync your trip plans on multiple devices, automatically and transparently.
 Features:
     – Automatic Synchronization.
     – Share your Trips with others users.
     – Backup safely and simply.
     – Without limits devices.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using myTrip! We're hard at work on some awesome improvements.

Check out upcoming events, weather informations, suggestions of attraction near you, quick route to your hotel.

comments: Worst app. Mytrip team couldn't provide the correct airline information. The information provided by them regarding the flight are wrong. If anyone will book any flight from this site, one thing is sure that you will waste your money and will end up paying more money.

!!!! they cheat!!! Don't you use myTrip exactly. I wanted to cancel my flight, I sent a message to mytrip and then they canceled. But they said me, we will never return the money. If you do not come back my money, why cancel the ticket. After again i called to them if so you will not come back my money I want to use ticket then myTrip said to me" we canceled your ticket you don't fly. " If you wouldn't come back to my money, I was going to use that ticket. I was going to fly. I don't recommnd

I've been using this app for the last four year's trips, and it is so convenient having flights, and car reservations, and hotel reservations easily accessible on the fly. I also enjoy the ability to make notes and essentials lists, as well as itineraries that can easily be edited as the need arises. One small gripe is that I upgraded so as to make the data available on my wife's phone, but when I changed phones, I lost that ability. One improvement I would suggest would be more categories for event/ location details. I think this would especially be helpful for business users. Another might be adding GPS info to the locations database. Just a thought...Oh yeah! And make it sync to your laptop! And be able to add a photo with each itinerary location or event!
Great app. Has all the features I need without trying to sell me tickets like other apps. It just needs to add a terminal space for departure since this is also important

Flight from Auckland to San Fransisco not accepted as flight lands in San Fransisco before it leaves Auckland. This is due to crossing date line and going back a day. Fix that and I'll reinstall and have another go.

title: Couchsurfing Travel App
description:
Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 14 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

Find hosts in your next destination
Browse the millions of local hosts offering a place to stay in thousands of cities around the globe

Make New Friends
See who's nearby and wants to meet up by becoming available on Couchsurfing Hangouts! Also check out the thousands of events planned by Couchsurfers in your hometown or upcoming travel destination.

Meet Travelers Without Traveling
Can’t travel right now? Host or meet up with incoming travelers coming to your city

And More
• Plan your next trip
• Share photos from your travel adventures

summary: "A fantastic and unique way to make friends with people from around the world "
recentChanges: • Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: It's very very helpful application guys, it helps you to know more people and get new friends also it helps you finding your hosts all over the world i recommend it and give it 5 stars

Editing my previous review. I haven't used this app for long, but recently have discovered a massive glitch. It's tedious to make profile changes, cos the changes don't get properly saved. I have shifted to another place, literally 1000 kms away in another country, and yet I cannot update my home address. No matter what, the changes are "saved" but they are never "stored" and hence jump back to the previous address almost immediately.

Couchsurfing really has a great potential to have an amazing positive impact on the way you travel and maybe even see life. As long as you keep one thing in mind: at the start it is frustrating that you won't get anywhere without having reviews and being verified. But it is free to get verified if you host someone. Once you have been verified and gotten a review it will be easy to find a couch. It really makes sense actually as it is supposed to be a two way system.

I want to edit my review and dis-rate the app now because a big problem I have noticed with this app which I don't receive any notification shows that I received a message from someone unless I go to my inbox and check myself and which can be after so many days because I don't keep in my mind that I have to check my inbox all the time because it has to be automatically. According to me, it's a huge mistake and am very sure that all the people are facing the same problem. Hope you work on it..!!

I get no notifications at all. My changed in the profile are not getting updated and saved. I can not upload more than one picture for some weird reason. Everytime I go to a screen I get this notification of agreeing to share data- how many times do I really need to tap on that? The app is too slow, it takes forever to load.

title: Packing List for Travel - PackKing
description:
PackKing helps people around the world to organize their packing list for their holidays. Whether you’re planning a vacation with a loved one abroad or inland, the app generates your personalized packing list based on destination, planned activities, transport, and other personal needs. PackKing makes it easy for you to figure out what items you shouldn’t forget to pack into your backpack or suitcase for your weekend, business or holiday trip.

Supported activities of this packing list app are:
+ Essentials
+ Beach
+ Outdoor
+ Sightseeing
+ Going Out
+ Photography
+ Swimming
+ International
+ Hiking
+ Backpacking
+ Mobile Office
+ Cooking
+ Baby
+ Fitness
+ Camping
+ Business
+ Running
+ Diving
+ Festival
+ Cycling
+ Dog
+ Fishing
+ Surfing
+ Riding
+ Instrument
+ Golf
+ Wintersport
+ Boat

Supported transportation:
+ Air
+ Car
+ Public
+ Motorcycle
+ Camper
+ Cruise

Types of weather:
+ Cold
+ Mild
+ Warm
+ Hot
+ Rain

Key PackKing Features:
+ Configure your trip profile with destination, duration, activities, transport and laundry frequency
+ Easily scroll through the generated lists
+ Add items you want to pack
+ Check Items that you packed (like a checklist)
+ Add your custom items to the list
+ Create and manage custom luggage types
+ Manually sort the items of your list
+ Generate a PDF with all added items to pack
+ Export your list to other applications
+ Login to Backup and Restore your trips
+ Create multiple packing lists
+ Add your own custom topics and reuse them in your future trips
+ Switch between lists based on Topics (Essentials, Cruise, Beach, etc) to lists based on Categories (Hygiene, Health, Gadgets, etc) or Bags (Main bag, Carry-On, On person, etc)

PackKing is free to download and use. The free version has limited functionalities. Upgrade and have access to:
+ Unlimited packing lists
+ Export (PDF / other apps)
+ Backup your data by logging in
+ Reset and Copy existing lists
+ No ads
