recentChanges: I am always making changes and improvements to PackKing. Based on user feedback I continuously add new features with the mission to make PackKing the best packing list. Feel free to get in touch with me by mail (hello@packking.info) if you have feedback.
comments: Buggy backup. I really liked the app at first as there are ample options to customize items and add categories. Being able to add custom bags is nice, although the app added several copies of the same bag. But when my phone crashed and I tried to get back my data, I got back my list, but not the content. I tried to send several emails to the developer to resolve the issue, but didn't get a response.

Frustrating!!! I paid money for this app thinking that it would save all of my lists. I added a Vacation list of 143 items or so and when I went back into the app to add more items, everything was lost and I had to start from scratch. There was no retrieval of it. I re-entered the list, went back in a few days later to add a few more items and same thing again - I lost everything. Wrote to the seller, never heard a response....terrible app! Waste of money and time!!!

Biggest problem for me with all these packing apps is that they come pre-configured with literally hundreds of items under sections that I will never ever use. As such I look for apps that allow me to edit Categories and the items in them so that when I select 'Beach' or whatever I only have to scroll through the items that I might normally take, not the 200 items I won't. Couldn't find a way to do this even with the paid version so, refund and delete. Far quicker to write a list out with pen and paper.

Very helpful app! Easy to customize to your specific needs. This will help you remember all of the essentials for your trip as well as helping you to not overpack. Once you compile your list, you can generate a shopping list of all the items that you need to purchase.

Probably the best packing list app I've ever tried. Being able to choose the items you need from a predetermined list is an excellent way to prevent forgetting important items or having to remove a large amount of items that don't fit your lifestyle. I definitely recommend this app for anyone who has difficulty packing or simply wants to make the process more efficient.

comments: Great idea, and reasonable user interface. Much less useful for large countries requiring multiple days of travel. For geographically smaller countries. For instance, all activities are for the entire country of destination, instead of limiting the scope to the geographic location. A trip entirely in the state of Minnesota USA will show activities in California and Florida (thousands of kilometers away)
Ứng dụng rất logic. Lên lịch chuyến đi và quản lý chuyến đi hiệu quả. Dễ sử dụng, chỉnh sửa.
Cùng nhau lên plan cho chuyến đi, tính năng này rất hay nha
App ok do

title: CheckandPack: Travel Planner & Checklist
description:
Are you planning for a backpacking trip? You know it is really stressful to remember everything you need to pack without a travel packing checklist app. No matter if it is a vacation, road trip, camping, holiday, overseas travel, this efficient travel planner and checklist app is sure to be of extreme help. Plan vacation or important trip with Check and Pack!

600+ BACKPACKING RELATED ITEMS
If you are planning to write down everything that you need to do and remember, do not worry anymore as this backpacking checklist and planner app comes pre-loaded with 600+ backpacking trip related items. Whether it is trekking or cruise vacations, this free holiday checklist app ensures that you don’t forget anything during your travels. Save hours of typing down the list of things to do before your backpacking trip with this best holiday packing app. 

CHECK / UNCHECK WITH HELPFUL TRAVEL PLANNER & CHECKLIST TRIP ORGANIZATION OPTIONS
Check/uncheck and reuse this luggage packing organizer app every time you go on backpacking trips. As a passionate traveler, you need this adventure-travel checklist app for planning, organizing, and packing everything to make your next hiking trip successful. 
Avoid expensive mistakes and be stress free with this camping holiday checklist app and travel planner app. One of the most enjoyable packing organizers apps!

11 CATEGORIES FOR PERFECT TRAVEL PLANNING & TRIP ORGANIZATION
You get specific advice for your exotic travel holidays with this free trip checklist app. This trip list app has more than 650 entries in 11 categories. With this travel-checklist app by your side, you can plan your summer vacations or any vacations really well. You can also easily add your own items and categories to this travel organizer app.

CREATE MULTIPLE LISTS
You can create multiple lists for different types of trips - like 2 day trip or 1 day trip etc. with this checklist app for holidays. Just create your list from the pre-loaded list of this best packing list app for travel or from your personal list and use the editing features of the travel checklist app to customize your very own travel packing checklist. This free checklist app has unlimited trip planners no matter whether you’re camping in the wild, spending time on a luxury cruise, or backpacking for a road trip.
Have friends travelling with you - Just share this best travel planner app with them.

ADD AS MANY LOCATIONS AND ITEMS AS YOU WANT
This vacation checklist (packing list) and luggage organizer app has no restrictions on the content. So no matter where you are planning your next sightseeing vacations, this travel-checklist app will never let you miss a thing while you are on the move.
You are free to add as many items as you want to this free checklist app and free holiday packing app. Do not know what to take on holidays? Family camping checklist and backpacking planner app is here for you.

KEY FEATURES OF OUR BACKPACKING LIST MANAGER APP
- More than 600 items in 11 categories
- Easy to use and customize
- Great interface
- You can add items and categories 
- Edit existing items 
- Edit existing categories 
- Delete existing items
- Delete existing categories
- Reuse the vacation planner list multiple times
- Vacation checklist app comes pre-populated with lots of items that can save you typing
- You can have unlimited number of lists on this packing planner checklist app. 

EXTRA FEATURES OF THIS HIKING AND BACKPACKING LIST APP
- Photo Backup
- List with expense tracking
- Your travel schedule
- Add notes

In short, this packing pro travel planner app has everything for your holiday in one place.

Follow Us:
Website: http://checkandpack.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CheckandPack/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/checkandpack

comments: I can't create a packing list without giving it my email address, birthday, gender, etc??? This is supposed to help me pack not set me up for identity theft. I expected a simple app that would let me select what I needed to take and then let me check it off as I packed it. I don't understand why such an app is impossible to find. I couldn't even get to the part of the app that dealt with packing without going through the third degree. I deleted it within minutes.
Can not create list due to error in city and date selection. No matter what I choose it does not work

such an amazing app, I would like to download all the information to excel, let me know if I can
Perfect app

title: Hopper - Book Flights
description:
Relax — booking travel just got easy.

Hopper predicts prices for flights with 95% accuracy up to 1 year in advance. You can watch a trip right in the app and we’ll send you a notification when it’s the best time to buy — recommending you to book now, or maybe wait just a little longer.

We’ve helped over 30 million travelers book trips around the world, saving them more than $1.8 billion to date. That’s a saving of up to 40%.

Hopper features the major airlines in the US, Canada and around the world such as American Airlines, United Airlines, JetBlue, Alaska Airlines, Air Canada, Frontier, Spirit Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, Air Transat, WestJet, British Airways, Air France, Lufthansa, KLM & many more.

Search Flights
Millions of flights from around the world, at the best possible price.

Plan Less, Travel More
Instantly identify the cheapest dates with our calendar.

Buy, or Watch and Wait
Book flights straight away, or wait for a better price.

Get Notified
When it’s the best time to buy, our bunnies will let you know.

Book in App
Grab flights quickly and securely, right in the app with a swipe.

Some of the other awesome things you can do with Hopper:
• Find the cheapest days to travel using our color-coded calendar.
• Use filters to get custom predictions that suit your trip — removing long layovers, stops, or basic fares that have extra fees and restrictions.
• Get information and tips about airports.
• Compare prices and amenities from hundreds of airlines around the world.
• Receive personalized recommendations about deals you might like based on previous trips and your budget.
• Save your bunny profile and payment details securely for even faster booking. 
• Our gentle Fair Bear will give you an overview of all the important details in the fine print. He’ll let you know about all the bits and pieces, like carry-on allowances to seat selection.
• Get help 24/7 from our support agents, made up of actual, real bunnies, sorry no, real humans.

Hopper has no ads, no spam, and no stress — just accurate predictions and the easiest way to book and save on flights.

So relax — booking travel just got easy. Oh, and it’s free! So download Hopper and let’s start planning your trip.

Hopper predicts prices for flights with 95% accuracy up to 1 year in advance. You can watch a trip right in the app and we’ll send you a notification when it’s the best time to buy — recommending you to book now, or maybe wait just a little longer.

We’ve helped over 30 million travelers book trips around the world, saving them more than $1.8 billion to date. That’s a saving of up to 40%.

summary: Find the cheapest prices
recentChanges: Bug fixes and UI improvements.
comments: Mostly awesome...I just wish the menu was easier to navigate. For example, when I open the app and I have a flight THAT DAY, it should be the first thing I see (i.e. You have a flight today! Here's the details etc) instead of having to look all over the app for my confirmation number when I'm at the airline kiosk. Other than this, it's a stellar booking app

This app is good for monitoring flights but if they want more people to use it to actually book their flights, they have ALOT of work to do. Customer service is terrible. If something changes with your flight and you need to talk to someone, GOOD LUCK. Response times take weeks and theres no actual phone number you can call to talk to someone. They need to hire more staff to manage the large chat volumes, or get an actual call center. I will never be using the app again to book my flights.

There app charges double / doesn't find the best deal. Booked montreal to Miami for May and app said $500 was good and to book. When I did a simple Google search, I found the EXACT same flight for half the price. I thought Hopper was supposed to give us the best deals, I guess not. Last time I'll be using the app to book a flight.

I also use Google's tracker & find it more reliable since it'll email me almost everyday when prices have changed. So to my surprise when Google told me the lowest price, I was disappointed that hopper didn't send me notifications. I had to open the app to find out they also agreed it was the lowest time to buy. Another unfortunate thing is that they don't have an option for which class u want, unlike Google. I still have this app around to compare prices, but didn't use it to buy our flights

Nothing but confusion. I booked my trip a week ago and have had minimal communication. Trying to contact customer support is near impossible. They have no telephone numbers. Currently experiencing a full on nightmare trying to book a trip. 0/10 do not book with this app. Should have went with Expedia my God.

title: Japan Official Travel App
description:
Find reliable information and navigation for your trip to Japan.
“Japan Official Travel App” is the official smartphone app provided by JNTO, delivering up-to-date information about traveling in Japan for a safe and comfortable journey. 

App Overview:
-Travel guide contents
-Route Search and navigation

About the Features:
[Travel guide contents]
Regularly updated articles and tourist spot information, maps, and route search features help you plan and travel your journey across Japan. Transit search is compatible with Japan Rail Pass.

Explore Japan through content-rich articles introducing big cities to small rural towns and events. The articles are selected by JNTO for the app to enrich your journey.

The app contains basic information about Japan that may be helpful for tourists, such as general rules and manners, medical assistance, and embassy contact details. Links to helpful services also provided.

[Route search]
-The app navigates you from your preferred point of departure to your destination.
-Search covers all modes of public transport (trains including JR and subway lines, airplanes, taxis, and ferries), and is compatible with Japan Rail Pass
-Provides useful information such as the most convenient carriage number for train transit, platform information and station lists.
-Search directly from a zoomable interactive train map
-Allows you to save searched routes. You can also see them while offline.

[Offline Spot Search]
-Search offline for the following spots:
*Free Wi-Fi hotspots
*Tourist Information Center
*Station
*Hospitals

[Notice]
-At the time of your initial access, we ask users to participate in a survey, which is used for enhancing tourism experience in Japan. This survey is optional, and you will be able to use the app without answering them.
-This app uses GPS in the background for enhancing user experience.

summary: Must have app for traveling in Japan. Guides and transit search with JR pass.
recentChanges:
Updated offline spot data.
Minor fixes.
comments: Super useful and easy to read UI to find transit routes. There is a JR option to search for routes and you can view the timetable incase you miss your train. I have also showed the routes provided by this app to employees to reserve Shinkansen tickets.

Overall a very helpful app that provides detailed instructions and routes. Very useful for those with a JR pass since it indicates which suggested routes are JR only. One suggestion would be to improve how ticket prices are indicated; it can be confusing at times to figure out the exact fare required for a trip that requires transfers.
Easy to use and very informative, really helped plan our trip.
Great app for route planning with the JR pass. Could show more info when you search.
Extremely useful and well done app. Everyone who is traveling to Japan should have it installed.

title: GetYourGuide: Activity tickets & sightseeing tours
description:
Looking for the best things to do on your trip?

Download the GetYourGuide app to easily find and book the world’s top-rated tours and activities. 

From skip-the-line tickets at must-see attractions to unique experiences that offer you exclusive access and insight, our app will help you discover the best of every destination. 

What makes GetYourGuide your go-to travel app for tours and activities?

FIND OVER 40,000 ACTIVITIES

Must-see attractions — Book tickets for can’t-miss sights like the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.
Top-rated tours — Explore what makes each destination special. Find tours in Paris, Dubai, New York City, Amsterdam, and more.

PLAN ON THE GO

Instant confirmation — Whether you book in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.  
Offline access — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device — no printer needed. 

BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and WhatsApp across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation —  Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities around the world, we’ve helped millions of customers discover the best of their destinations. 

Whether you want to explore the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter tour, discover delicious culinary treats on a food tour of Barcelona, or simply skip the line to see the Vatican and Sistine Chapel, we guarantee you’ll find something incredible to do. 

Don’t just take our word for it, though. Check out over 2 million trusted customer reviews to help you decide which activities will make your trip unforgettable.

“Had an excellent experience. The GetYourGuide app is a must for city travel. 10/10 from me.”
– David, United Kingdom

“From the day we booked to being dropped off at our hotel, everything was perfectly organized. We had an amazing time at the Grand Canyon, and our pilot was a great guide.”
– Cecilia, Sweden

“I saved a ton of time by purchasing the fast-track entry tickets ahead of time.”
– Teresa, United States

Discover some of our favorite destinations: 
Rome, Sydney, Naples, Krakow, Florence, Reykjavik, Tokyo, Prague, Berlin, Venice, Bali, Chicago, Granada, Budapest, Athens, Milan, Cape Town, Lisbon, Vienna, Las Vegas, Orlando, Edinburgh, Hamburg, San Francisco, Dublin, New Orleans, Los Angeles, Miami, Auckland, Istanbul, Mexico City, and more. 


Explore some of these incredible attractions: 
Burj Khalifa, Acropolis, Caminito del Rey, Uffizi Gallery, Royal Palace in Madrid, Milan Cathedral, Prague Castle, Alcazar of Seville, Musée d'Orsay, Alhambra, Doge’s Palace, Empire State Building, Florence Duomo, Louvre Museum, Palace of Versailles, Park Guell, Pearl Harbor, Pompeii, Statue of Liberty, Tower of London, and more. 

Tell us how we’re doing
Has our hard work paid off? We love hearing from you. Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience.

Happy to help
Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

recentChanges:
We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here’s a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

comments: This app makes it so eazy to book last minute attractions and plan yor trip. The mobile vouchers are awesome and the prices are decent, most of it is cheeper than trip advisor! I used this app for my study abroad semester and i booked all kinds of stuff in lots of different countries.

Very good and easy to understand . I use GYG.. everywhere I go.. I've had full refunds on cancelled bookings..You can reschedule your tour times and dates without any issues.. Highly recommended. Reputable and reliable tour operators and guides, knowledgeable with detailed historical and modern informative. Good with time keeping on pick up and drop off .. GYG customer service is excellent.. I love this app ❤️

Misleading trip in Rome. They sold me tickets for the Colosseum and advised to download them and go straight in. Only to then be told AT THE ENTRANCE that you have to collect them away from the Colosseum, about 10/15 mins away. I cannot stress enough that people do NOT use this app, I paid 30€ only for a trip and ticket I couldn't use.
Booked and paid for a trip through this site and then when we turned up there was no record of our booking. A wasted journey and still haven't received a refund.

When we arrived for our tour, the tour guides had us down for the March when we booked for February. Not what you want when you're planning a weekend away! However the staff where great and we got to go on the tour, the tour guide Maggie was fab well worth the trip. However I will be booking direct with the host in future, we have another tour booked tommorow so hopefully we don't have the same issue!
